tata ūrdhvaṃ evamukta ityādinā subhūteḥ sādhukārapūrvakaṃ vacanam / tatra vistareṇa codyakaraṇāt sādhukāraḥ / api tvityādinā parihāraḥ / artha eveti / asmadiṣṭameva / icchālakṣaṇatvādarthasya
# de'i 'og tu de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / rab 'byor gyis legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig sngon du 'gro ba ste de ni rgyas par dro ba yin pa'i phyir legs so zhes bya ba byin pa yin no / / 'on kyang zhes bya ba sogs pa ni lan no / / don de nyid ces bya ba ni 'di 'dod pa nyid de 'dod pa nyid mtshan nyid kyi phyir lan no /
bhūtapadābhidhāneneti vikalpamanasikārasya viparyayo bhūtapadaṃ bhūtaṃ vastu
# yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa'i mi mthun pa yang dag pa'i tshig ste yang dag pa'i dngos po'o /
tasyābhidhānena savistareṇa
# de'i brjod pa ni rgyas ba dang bcas pa'o /
aniṣṭāpādanaṃ hi / codyam / neṣṭābhidhānamityupālambhaḥ / yuktitaśceyamicchati darśayituṃ svayameva pṛcchati
# nges par 'byung ba yang ma yin pa la ni rgol ba'o / / nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba ni dris pa'o / / de ni rigs pa ston par 'dod pa yin te / / rang nyid 'dri ba ste /
tatkasyetyādi / tabhdū tapadaṃ kutaḥ? sattva ātmā sa iha dṛṣṭāntaḥ
# de ce'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba smras te / / yang dag pa'i tshig de gang las shes she na / / sems can ni bdag ste de ni 'dir dpe'o /
manasikāro vikalpaḥ / sa dārṣṭāntikaḥ
# yid la byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa des de ni dpe can no /
asvabhāvatādirvaiditavyeti sādhāraṇaṃ hetukaṃ netavyaḥ
# ngo bo nyid med par rigs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs brtag par bya'o /
tatra asvabhāvatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā / lakṣaṇamanayorgrāhakatvam
# de la ngo bo med par ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'di dag gis 'dzin par nyid do /
ataśca yathā ātmano 'svabhāvatā tathā manasikārasyāpi / grāhakatvāyogāditi hetuḥ
# des na yang ji ltar bdag ngo bo nyid med pa de bzhin du yin la byed pa yang 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so /
śeṣeṣu asvabhāvatvāditi hetuḥ / sabhdāvo bhāvatvaṃ tadviraho 'sadbhāvatā / viviktatā abhāvatā acintyatā tadīyacintāyāṃ nirviṣayatvāt
# lhag ma rnams la yang ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs su sbyar ro / / dngos po yod pa ni dngos po nyid do / / de dang bral ba ni med pa nyid do / / dben pa ni dngos po nyid do / / bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni de'i bsam par bya ba'i yul med pa'i phyir ro /
anabhisaṃbodhanatā samyagjñānāviṣayata / ayathābhūtārthatvena mithyāvastutvenā bhisaṃbodhanaṃ saṃyagjñānamasyeti ayathābhutārthābhisaṃbodhanatā / aneneti (RSt_20) yathoktena / evaṃrūpeṇeti bhūtārthapratyavekṣakeṇa / vihāreṇeti śamatharūpeṇa
# mngon par byang chub pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi yul la ma yin pa nyid do / / yang dag ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi don gyis te / / mngon par byang chub pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi yin te yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin gyi don ma yin pa ni nyid kyi phyir ro / / 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni 'di skad bstan pa'o / / yang 'di lta bus zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i don la so sor rtog pas so / / gnas pa zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyi tshul gyis so /
itiśabdaḥ parivartaparisamāptyarthaḥ
# 'dod do zhes bya ba'i sgras ni le'u yongs su rdzogs pa'i don to /
sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caryā caraṇam / cittotpādādayo daśārthāḥ
# rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyad pa spyod pa sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bcu'i don to /
taddyotakaḥ parivartastatparivartaḥ / [āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ] sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāṃ prathamaḥ parivartaḥ / 2. śakraparivarto nāma dvitīyaḥ / uktā sarvākārajñatā / itaḥ prabhṛti mārgajñatā vaktavyā / tasyāmekādaśavastūni / yataḥ śāstram-
# de gsal bar byes pa'i le'u ni le'u'o / / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel snying po mchog ces bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar pa las le'u dang po'o / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bstan pa 'di nas btsams te lam shes pa brjod par bya ste / / de yang dngos po bcu gcig gis bstan te / / gang gi phyir bstan bcos las /
[31] dhyāmīkaraṇatādīni śiṣyakhaṅgapathau ca yau / mahānuśaṃso dṛṅmārga ehikāmutrikairguṇaiḥ / [32] kāritramadhimuktiśca stutastobhitaśaṃsitaḥ(tāḥ) / pāriṇāme 'numode ca manaskārāvanuttamau / [33] nirhāraḥ śuddhiratyantamityayaṃ bhāvanāpathaḥ / vijñānāṃ bodhisatvānāmiti mārgajñatoditā / 'dhyāmīkaraṇatādi' śrāvakamārgaḥ / 'mahānuśaṃso ' bodhisattvasya darśanamārgaḥ / bhāvanāmārgasya 'kāritram' / 'adhimukti'manaskāraḥ / 'stutastobhitasaṃ(śaṃ)sitāḥ' / 'pariṇāmanā'manaskāraḥ / 'anumodanā'manaskāraḥ / 'abhinirhāraḥ' / 'atyantaśuddhiśce 'ti / ekādaśavastūni 'mārgajñatā' sā ca 'bodhisattvānāṃ' ityarthaḥ / tatrodau dhyāmīkaraṇatādīni yataḥ śāstram- / [34] dhyāmīkaraṇatā bhābhirdevānāṃ yogyatāṃ prati / viṣayo niyato vyāptiḥ svabhāvastasya karma ca / (RSt_21) / asyāṃ 'yogyatāṃ' cittotpādaḥ dvitīyo (prathamo)'rthaḥ / 'tāṃ prati' tadartham / 'dhyāmīkaraṇatā' mandacchāyīkaraṇaṃ 'devānām' / 'bhābhiḥ' iti bhagavataḥ prakṛtiprabhayā sā dvitīyo 'rthaḥ / 'viṣayo niyataḥ' iti / tasyā eva viṣayapratiniyamastṛtīyo 'rthaḥ / viṣaya'vyāpti'ścaturthaḥ / 'svabhāvaḥ' pañcamaḥ / 'kāritraṃ' ṣaṣṭhaḥ / yadyamī ṣaḍarthāḥ kathametadekaṃ vastu? iha mārgajñatāyā mūlaṃ cittotpādaḥ / tada(d) rahitānāṃ tasyāmayogyatvāt / ata evāsau yogyatocyate / tata evāsau pradhānam / śeṣastasyāḥ paricchedaḥ / pradhānena ca vyapadeśādekavastūcyate
# mog mog bor byed la sogs dang / / slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang / / 'di dag gzhan pa'i yon tan gyi / / phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam / / byed pa dang ni mos pa'i lam / / bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang / / bsngo dang rjes su yid rang ba / / yid la byed pa bla med dag / / sgrub pa shin tu dag pa zhes / / bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam / / byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyi / / lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad / / ces bya ba gsungs te / / nyan thos kyi lam dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang phan yon che ba byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba'i lam dang; bsgom pa'i lam gyi byed pa dang mos pa yid la byed pa dang bstod pa dang bkur ba dang bsngags pa dang bsngo ba yid byed pa dang rjes su yid rang ba yid la byed pa dang sgrub pa dang shin tu dag pa ste dngos po bcu gcig po de dag ni lam shes pa nyid de de yang byang chub sems dpa'i yin no zhes bya ba don to / / de la dang por / / mog mog por byed la sogs dang / / zhes bya ba la gang gi phyir bstan bcos las / / lha rnams rung bar bya ba'i phyir / / 'od kyis mog mog por mdzad dang / / yul nges pa dang khyab pa dang; / / rang bzhin dang ni de yi las / / zhes bya ba gsung te / / rung bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni sems skyed pa ste / / don dang po'o / / phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i don du'o / / mog mog por mdzad ces bya ba ni lha rnams kyi 'od dman pa'o / / 'od kyis zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis te de ni don gnyis pa'o / / yul nges pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi yul so sor nges pa ste don gsum pa'o / / yul la khyab pa ni bzhi pa'o / / rang bzhin ni lnga pa'o / / las ni drug pa'o / / gal te 'di dag don drug yin na ji ltar sngos po gcig yin zhe na / / 'di lam shes pa'i gzhi ni sems skyes pa ste / / de dang bral na de mi rung ba'i phyir ro / / des na de nyid rung ba zhes brjod de de nyid ni de la gtso bo yin no / / lhag ma ni de'i 'khor ro / / gtso bo yang dngos po gcig la gtsor 'dogs pa yin no /
tatra dhyāmīkaraṇatāmadhikṛtyāha / tena khalu punarityādi / tena samayeneti tasmin kāle / vivakṣātaḥ kārakāṇi bhavantīti karaṇatvam / khalu śabdo vākyālaṅkāre / punaḥ śabdo viśeṣārthaḥ / abhisamayabhedo viśeṣaḥ / sannipatitaḥ samāgamāt / sanniṣaṇṇo niṣadanāt / trayastriṃśānāṃ kāyo nikāyaḥ / tasmin bhavā iti ṭhal / catvāro mahārājā vaiśravaṇadhṛtarāṣṭravirūḍhakavirūpākṣā caturādiṣu dikṣu
# de la mog mog por mdzad pa'i dbang du byas nas yang de'i tshe zhes bya ba gsungs so / / de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni de'i dus so / / yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par gyi don mngon par rtogs pa'i don gyi bye brag go / / 'dus te zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'o / / 'khod pa ni 'dug pa'o / / sum cu rtsa gsum ris zhes bya ba ni sde tshan no / / de'i dngos po ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o / / rgyal po chen po bzhi ni rnam thos sras dang yul 'khor skyong dang 'phags skyes po dang spyan mi bzang la sogs te byang la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams kyi'o /
teṣāṃ kāyaḥ / tasmin bhavāḥ / eṣa eva trisāhasro lokadhātuḥ sahā / tasyāḥ patiḥ / brahmaṇaḥ kāyastasmin bhavāḥ / iha tūttarapadavṛddhiḥ / caturthasya dhyānasyāśrayaṃ ca śuddhāvāsāḥ / avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāśceti / kutaḥ śuddhāvāsāḥ? āryāṇāmeva teṣūtpādāt / teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ nikāyānāṃ pañcaiva sahastrāṇi / etāvanta eta rūpiṇo devanikāyā yathodhvamutkṛṣṭāḥ prabhāprabhāvādibhiḥ / yopītyādi / tepi sanniṣaṇṇāḥ
# de dag gi tshogs kyi dngos po ni ris so / / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid mi mjed de de'i bdag po ni tshangs pa'o / / de'i tshogs ni de'i ris so / / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i ris kyi gong du gnas gtsang ma lnga ste / / mi che ba dang mi 'dud pa dang gya nom snang ba dang shin tu mthong ba dang 'og min no / / gtsang ma'i gnas gang zhe na; 'phags pa rnams 'di nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro / / de dag ni rigs lnga dag las stong phrag lnga yin te / / gzugs khams kyi lha'i ris las 'di tsam nyid de / / gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du 'od dang nus pa las khyad par du gyur pa yin no / / gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la; de yang 'khod pa ste /
yopi teṣāṃ avabhāsaḥ sopyabhibhūto dhyāmīkṛto 'bhūt
# gang de dag gi 'od de yang zil gyis mnan te zhes bya ba ni mog mog por byas par gyur ro /
samakālameveti yopisopi śabdārthaḥ / yogyatā hi cittotpādastadartha dhyāmīkaraṇam / sarvābhibhūrbhagavāniti viditvā tabhdāve spṛhotpādanāt
# dang yang de zhes bya ba ni dus mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to / / gang gi phyir rung bar bya ba yin zhe na / / sems bskyed pa de'i don du mog mog por byed pa'o / / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mngon par zil gyis mnan par shes pa ni de la thams cad kyang dad pa skye ba'i phyir ro /
avabhāsaḥ prabhā / svakarmaṇo vipaktirvipākaḥ / tasmājjātaḥ sahajo nābhisaṃskārika ityarthaḥ
# 'di ni snang ba'o / / rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni rnam par smin pa'o / / de la skyes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa ste / / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / gang gi rgyus zil gyis mnan pa yin zhe na /
kena kāraṇenābhibhūtaḥ? buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhasannidhānena / kena kartrā? buddhatejasā buddhasya bhagavataḥ prakṛtiprabhayā
# sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis so / / byed pa gang gis she na / / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis so /
nanu tepi mahānubhāvāḥ kasmānna praticakrurityata āha buddhānubhāveneti
# de dag kyang mthu chen po yin na ci'i slad kyis gnon par byed pa ma yin zhe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes gsungs te /
buddhānubhāvena sarvānubhāvaḥ pratihanyataḥ iti bhāvaḥ
# sangs rgyas kyi mthu ni thams cad pas mthu che ba yin te / / de dag gi mthu zil gyis gnon par byed zhes bya bar bsams te /
dhyāmīkaraṇatā / atha khalvityādi / antikāditi sakāśāt
# de ni mog mog por byed pa nyid do / / yang de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / drung nas zhes bya ba ni nye ba las so /
prajñāpāramitāmiti bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāmityanena sambandhaḥ
# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar te lam shes ba zhes bya ba'i don to /
mārgajñatāmityarthaḥ / (RSt_22) upadiśyata iti upadeśaḥ / tasyā evārthasyāvagamāya vādo 'vavādaḥ tadanubandhāya śāsanī tatsahitā seti samāsaḥ / sthātavyaṃ śrutamayyā prajñayā / śikṣitavyaṃ cintāmayyā / yogamāpattavyaṃ bhāvanāmayyā / ānubhāvādayaḥ prabhāvaparyāyāḥ
# man ngag ces bya ba ni nye bar ston pa de nyid kyi don te / / rtogs pa'i phyir smra ba ni man ngag go / / de dang rjes su 'brel bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ni rjes su bstan pa'o / / de dang lhan cig pa'i bstan pa ni rjes su bstan pa zhes tshig bsdus pa'o / / gnas par bgyi zhes bya ba ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bo / / bslab par bgyi zhes bya ba ni bsams pa las byung ba'o / / rnal 'byor du bgyi zhes bya ni bsgoms pa las byung ba'o / / mthu zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'od la sogs pa'i rnam grangs so /
tadānubhavenetyuddeśaḥ
# de la mthu zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
itarābhyāṃ nirdeśaḥ / tejaseti pratibhānaśakte rodhāya
# cig shos gnyis ni rjes su bstan pa'o / / gzi brjid ces bya ba ni spobs pa dang nus pa skyed par byed pa'i 'od kyis so /
kena prabhāvena? adhiṣṭhāneneti prabodhakena / iyatā granthena yogyatāyāḥ prastāvanāṃ kṛtāyāṃ tāmāha / yairityādinā utpāditavyāntena iti yogyatā / yetvityādi / hīnamārgalabhyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ samyaktvam tasmin niyamaḥ samyaktvaniyāmaḥ
# byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu zad par byed pa'o / / de yan chad kyi tshig gis ni rung ba nyid kyi skabs su byas nas / / byang chub sems dpa' gang gis zhes bya ba sogs pa gsung te / / sems bkyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rung ba nyid do / / gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / dman pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni yang dag pa nyid do /
taṃ avakrāntāḥ prāptāḥ / baddhasīmāno baddhasetavaḥ / tadyathā śrotaāpannasaptaktabhdavaparamaḥ / dvitrijanmā kulaṃkulaḥ / anuttarā (ra)samyaksaṃbodhinimittaṃ yat punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇaṃ tasmai cittamutpādāyatumabhavyāḥ / iti śamaikayānaiḥ śrāvakairuttamabodheḥ kadācidapyakāmanādyogyatāyā viṣayapratiniyamaḥ
# de yang nges pa ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'o / / de la zhugs pa ni thob pa'o / / mtshams bcad pa ni zam pa bcad pa'o / / gang yang dper na rgyun du zhugs pa srid pa lan bdun pa dang skye ba gnyis pa dang gsum pa 'khor bar rigs nas rigs su skye ba de la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu mtshan gyi sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med de / / de ni nyan thos zhi ba gcig tu nges pa'i theg pas byang chub par byed mi nus te / / nam yang 'dod pa med pa'i phyir rung ba nyid kyis yul nges pa'o /
api tvityādi utpādayerannityetadantena vyāptiḥ / śrāvakairapi bodhipariṇatikaiḥ samyaksambodhau cittasyotpādanāt / te hi svāṃ bodhimadhigamyāpi buddhabodhisattvānāṃ lokottarāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā vañcitamivātmānaṃ manyamānāstathāgatairadhiṣṭhitāstadvodhau cittamutpādyācalyabhūmikabodhisattvavannirmitābhirupapattibhirbodhicaryāṃ caritvā parāṃ bodhimadhigacchantīti vyāptiḥ / nāhaṃ kuśalamūlasyāntarāyaṃ karomīti
# 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas rjes su yi rang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis khyab pa bstan to / / nyan thos kyi byang chub rjes su bzung nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro / / de dag gis rang gi byang chub rtogs par byas nas kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor pa mthong nas rang nyid kyis bslus pa bzhin du sems pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te / / byang chub sems bskyed nas mi gyo ba'i sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du sprul pa'i gzugs dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas byang chub mchog rtogs pa ni khyab pa'o / / de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs la kho bo bar chad mi byed do zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin no /
svabhāvaḥ kuśalarāśiḥ / sarvakuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakatvāccittotpādasyeti kuśalapakṣatvaṃ yogyatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ
# dge ba phyogs de ni dge ba'i tshogs te dge pa'i chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir bskyed pa ste de'i phyir dge ba'i phyogs skye bar rung ba nyid kyi rang bzhin no /
viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyā iti kāritram
# khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par zhes smos pa ni de'i las so /
viśiṣṭebhya iti bodhicittasaṃgṛhītebhyaḥ / hetau pañcamā
# khyad par du 'phag pa las zhes bya bar sbyar te des ni byang chub kyi sems bzung ste de las byung bas ni rgyu'i lnga pa'o /
viśiṣṭatamā dharmā iti mahāyānasaṃgṛhītāḥ phalahetubhūtāḥ
# chos rnams las zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyur gyur pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos bzung ba yin no /
adhyālambitavyā iti prāptavyāḥ
# dmigs par bya zhes bya ba ni thob pa bya'o /
tasmānnāntarāyaṃ karomīti śabdārthaḥ
# de bas kho bo bar chad mi byed do zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi sgra'i don to; /
iti dvividhamahāyānaprāpaṇaṃ bodhicittasya kāritram / tadevaṃ kecidvodhicittotpādanārthamutsāhitāḥ purvamutpāditabodhicittāstu saṃpraharṣitāḥ / evamutpāditabodhicittvatvādubhayepi te bodhisattvā (RSt_23) mahāsattvāḥ santo mārgajñatāyāmutsāhitāḥ / ata āha
# theg pa chen po ni rnam pa gnyis ka thob par bya ba yin te / / de yang byang chub kyi sems kyis so / / byang chub kyi sems de nyid bskyed pa'i phyir spro bar byed pa ni sngar byang chub sems bskyed pa la yang dag par mgu bar byed pa yin no / / de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de gnyis ka yang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ba yin la / / lam shes pa nyid la spro bar byed pa yin te des na des de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
atha khalvityādi / sādhustvamiti mahataḥ parārthasya karaṇāt / bhagavataḥ kṛtajñairit / yathā pūrvaṃ jinaputrasya bhagavatastacchrāvakairbahukṛtaṃ tathāsmābhirbhagavataḥ śrāvakairbhagavatputrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bahukartavyamiti kṛtajñatārthaḥ
# khyod legs so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don chen po byed pa'i phyir ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gzo bar bgyi zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi nyan thos rnams kyis rgyal ba'i sras la bkur sti mang du byas pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes bya ba ni byas pa gzo ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
tatkasya hetoriti / tatkṛtajñatvaṃ kena prakāreṇa? pūrvakā eva paurvakāḥ
# de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni byas pa gzo ba de nyid rgyu gang gis so / / sngon zhes bya ba ni snga ma'o /
brahma nirvāṇaṃ tasmai caraṇaṃ brahmacaryam / taccaraṇaṃ bodhāyeti bodhaye
# tshangs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o / / de'i phyir spyod pa ni tshangs par spyod pa'o /
bodhicaryāṃ caratīti yāvat / yairiti vibhaktipratirūpako nipāto yathārthaḥ avodita iti samprasāraṇam / vada vyaktāyāṃ vācityasya yajāditvāt / avavadita iti kvacitpāṭhaḥ / tatra vada sthairya ityayaṃ dhāturanekārthatvāt / anuparigrahītavyā ityavavaditavyāḥ
# de spyod pa ni byang chub kyi phyir te / / de bas na byang chub kyi phyir byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad ces bya ba'i don to / / gzhan dag gis zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba dang 'dra ba'i tshig gi phrad de ji ltar gyi don to / / rjes su gzung bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni gdams par bya ba'o / / rjes su yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su bstan par bya'o /
anuparivārayitavyā iti anuśāsitavyāḥ / uttarayoḥ padayoḥ saṃśabdaḥ samyagarthaḥ / asmābhirapīti śrāvakairapi / ātmasa [jā]tīyeṣvapyātmavyavahārāt
# tshig 'og ma dag las sam zhes bya ba'i sgra ni yang dag pa'i don to / / bdag cag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyis kyang ngo / / bdag cag ces bya ba ni rigs mthun pa dag gi nang gi tha snyad do /
sādhu cetyavahitaśrotratayā / suṣṭhu cetyavahitamanaskatayā / manasikurviti cintābhāvanābhyām / prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyamiti mārgajñatāyāṃ veditavyam
# legs par nyon la zhes bya ba ni rtse gcig par nyon cig pa'o / / shin tu zhes bya ba ni rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis so / / yid la zung shig ces bya ba ni bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'o / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni lam shes par bya ba la spyad par bya ba'o /
tatrādau śrāvakamārgaḥ / tatra darśanamārgamadhikṛtyāha / śūnyatāyāmityādi
# de la dang po nyan thos kyi lam la mthong ba'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas / / koo shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
aviparītatvāccatvāri satyāni / āryāṇāṃ satyatvena pratibhānti na bālānāṃ tasmāttānyevāryasatyāni / duḥkha samudayo nirodho mārgaśca
# stong pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa bzhi ni phyin ci ma log pa yin pa'i phyir 'phags pa rnams la bden pa nyid kyis so sor snang gi byis pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no / / de'i phyir de nyid 'phags pa'i bden pa yin te / / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam mo /
tatra duḥkhaṃ saṃsāriṇaḥ skandhāḥ
# de la sdug bsngal ni 'khor bar gtogs pa'i phung po rnams so /
duḥkhahetuḥ samadayaḥ / duḥkhakṣayo nirodhaḥ
# sdug bsngal gyi rgyu ni kun 'byung ngo / / sdug bsngal zad pa ni 'gog pa'o /
tatprāpakaṃ jñānaṃ mārgaḥ
# de thob par byed pa'i shes pa ni lam mo /
eṣāṃ caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ ya ākārāsteṣāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ tiṣṭhatā śūnyatāṃ paśyatā prajñāpāramitāyāmiti śrāvakīye darśanamārge sthātavyaṃ samāhitena cetasā
# 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di'i rnam pa gang yin pa de dag gi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa'o / / de lta bu'i stong pa nyid mthong nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi mthong ba'i lam la gnas par bya ba ste mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis so /
śūnyatādarśanaṃ cānupalambha eva
# stong pa nyid mthong ba yang mi dmigs pa'o / / de bzhin du bstan bcos las /
tataḥ śāstram- / [35] caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ ākārānupalambhataḥ / śrāvakāṇāmayaṃ mārgo jñeyo mārgajñatānaye
# lam shes nyid kyi tshul la ni / / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag gi / / rnam pa mi dmigs sgo nas ni / / nyan thos lam ni shes par bya / / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
śrāvakapiṭake ca satyanāṃ ṣoḍaśākārāḥ paṭhayante
# nyan thos kyi sde snod la bden pa'i rnam pa bcu drug tu brjod de / / 'di lta ste sdug bsngal ni mi rtag pa ste /
duḥkhamanityato duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ śūnyataśca parijñeyam
# sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa dang stong pa de ni shes par bya ba'o /
samadayo hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataśca / nirodho nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥśa(sa)raṇataśca / mārgo mārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito niryāṇikataśceti / amī neha gṛhyante
# kun 'byung ba ni rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen dang 'gog pa ni 'gog pa dang / / zhi ba dang gya nom dang nges par 'byung ba dang lam ni lam dang rigs pa dang sgrub pa dang nges par 'byin pa'o / / de dag ni spangs pa dang mngon sum du bya ba dang bsgom pa dag go rims bzhin te / / de dag ni 'dir mi bzung ngo /
ye tu mahatyorbhagavatyoḥ paṭhitāsta iha gṛhyante
# gang yang bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag las gsungs pa de 'dir bzung ste /
pratyāsatteḥ śrāvakabodheśca lāghaveneti (RSt_24) prāpaṇāt
# nyan thos kyi byang chub de ni myur du thob par byed pa'i phyir ro /
tatra duḥkhaṃ caturbhirākārairmanasikaroti pūrvavat / anityato duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ śāntataśca yathākramamudayavyayayogitvāt pratikūlatvāt ātmavilakṣaṇatvāt / ātmaśūnyatvācca / ātmaśūnyo hi śāntaḥ / tadyathā kuṇapaḥ / samudayamekādaśabhirākāraiḥ / tatra caturbhirākāraiḥ prahāṇārhattvajñāpanārtham / rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataśca duḥkhahetutvāddaḥkhotkarṣahetutvāduruddharatvāt / aihikāmatrikaduḥkhahetutvena pāpasādharmyācca / punaścaturbhiḥ śa(sa)kya(tya)tvaparijñāpanārtham / parataḥ pralobhadharmataścalataḥ prabhaḍgurataśca
# de la sdug bsngal la rnam pa bzhis yid la byed pa yin pa ni snga ma bzhin te / / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa dang stong pa dang bzhi pa'o / / rim pa bzhin du skye ba dang 'jigs pa dang 'brel ba'i phyir dang mi mthun pa'i phyir dang bdag gi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang bdag gis stong pa'i phyir dang gang gi phyir bdag nyid kyis stong pa ni zhi ba ste shi ba'i ro bzhin no / / kun 'byung la rnam pa bcu gcig tu mdzad nas bstan te / / des na rnam pa bzhi spang bar bya ba'i don du nad dang shu ba dang zug rngu dang sdig pa'o / / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir dang sdug bsngal gyi khyad par can gyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir dang 'di dang phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nyid kyi sdig pa dang chos mthun pa'o / / yang bzhis bden pa nyid yongs su shes pa'i don du dgra dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid dang gyo ba dang rab tu 'jig pa las so /
ātmā hi hātumaśakto 'yaṃ tu paraḥ / pratikṣaṇavināśitvāt / pralopadharmā ca / arhabhdirunmūlitatvāt / calaśca prakṛtena mārgeṇa bhaṅgitvāt prabhaṅguraśca / ātaptakāritārtha punastribhiḥ / bhayata upadravata upasargataśca / aśanipātādivabhdayahetutvāt / bhūtarākṣasādisādharmyāt durbhikṣaparacakrādisādharmyācceti / pratilomaḥ pratītyasamutpādo avidyānirodhāt saṃskāranirodha ityata ārabhya evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavatīti yāvat / tatra niruddhirnirodha iti nirodhasatyam
# gang gi phyir bdag 'jig par nus pas dgra'o / / skad cig re re la 'jig pa'i phyir 'jig pa'i chos nyid do / / dgra bcom pas lam gyi rang bzhin gyis rtsa ba nas bton pa'i phyir gyo ba'o / / 'jig par byed pa'i phyir rab tu 'jig pa'o / / rtun pa'i don yang rnam pa gsum ste / / 'jigs pa dang 'tshe ba dang 'go ba'i nad de thog 'bab pa la sogs pa 'jigs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang 'byung po dang srin po la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir dang mu ge dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lugs las bzlog pa ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas brtsams nas / / de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du de la 'gog pas na 'gog pa ste 'gog pa'i bden pa'o /
nirudhyate 'neneti nirodho mārgasatyaṃ saptabhirākāraiḥ
# 'dis 'gog pas na 'gog pa ste lam gyi bden pa'o / / de la 'gog pa'i bden pa ni rnam pa bdun te /
anātmataḥ śāntato viviktataḥ śūnyata ānimittataḥ apraṇihitato 'nabhisaṃskārataśca / ātmā hi yogino duḥkhātmanaḥ skandhāḥ
# bdag med pa dang zhi ba dang rnam par dben pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o / / gang gi phyir rnal 'byor pa'i bdag nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po'i bdag nyid do / / de nas sdug bsngal med pas bdag med pa'o /
ato duḥkhābhāvādanātmā kleśopaśamācchāntaḥ / duḥkhakleśāvaśucī tayorūpaśamādviviktaḥ / śūcirityarthaḥ
# nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bas zhi ba'o / / sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa ni mi gtsang ba'o / / de dag nye bar zhi bas rnam par dben pa ste gtsang ba zhes bya ba'i don to /
ātmātmīyavirahācchūnyaḥ
# bdag dang bdag gi dang bral bas na stong pa nyid de /
sarvasaṃskṛtanimittābhāvādānimittaḥ
# 'dus byas thams cad kyi rgyu mtshan med pas mtshan ma med pa'o /
traidhātuke praṇidhānaṃ praṇihitam / tat kṣayādapraṇihitaḥ
# khams gsum du smon pa ni smon pa ste de zad pa ni smon pa med pa'o /
āyatyāṃ karmābhisaṃskārābhāvādanabhisaṃskāraḥ / mārgasatyamapyebhireva saptabhirākāraiḥ / nirodhaprāpako hi mārgaḥ / tato 'nātmaśāntaviviktādiprāpakatvānmārgopyanātmā śānto viviktaḥ śūnya ānimitto 'praṇihito 'nabhisaṃskāraśca / evamekonatriṃśadākāra iha śrāvakamārga āsu tabdodhiprāpaṇāt / sa caiṣāmākārāṇāmanupalambhena mārgajñatāyāṃ praviśati / tena hītyādi / yena hīnamārgaṃ bhāvayato bodhisattvasyānupāyakuśalasya hīnabodhau pāta āśaṃkyate / tena hi kāraṇenāsyāṃ mārgajñatāyāṃ mahāsannāho mahadupāyakauśalam / sannaddhena taddharmitena bhavitavyamātmarakṣārtham / tatrāyaṃ mahān sannāho yaduta sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairbhāvanā karttavyā
# ma 'ongs pa'i las mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i phyir mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o / / 'gog pa thob par byed pa'i lam gyi bden pa yang rnam pa bdun po de nyid de des na bdag med pa dang zhi ba dang rnam par dben pa la sogs pa thob par byed pas lam la yang bdag med pa dang zhi ba dang rnam par dben pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste / / rnam pa nyi shu rtsa dgu po de dag dang ldan pas / / nyan thos kyi lam gyi byang chub myur du thob par byed pa'i phyir ro / / de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mi dmigs pas / / lam shes pa nyid la 'jug par 'gyur te des na koo shi ka de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir theg pa dman pa'i lam bsgoms pas byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pas dman pa'i byang chub tu ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes dogs par byas nas / / koo shi ka de'i phyir lam shes pa 'di la go cha chen po thabs la mkhas pa chen po'o / / de gyon pa ni gos pa na bdag nyid srung ba'i don du'o / / de la go cha chen po ni 'di lta ste / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas sgom par byed pa'o /
vyutthitena ca sarvaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyam
# langs nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya ste /
taccānupalambhayogeneti
# de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so /
iti śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanamārgaḥ / (RSt_25) / ita ūrdhvaṃ nirodhabhāgīyāni
# de ni nyan thos kyi mthong ba'i lam mo / / 'di'i 'og tu nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bshad par bya ste /
na rūpe sthātavyamityetadārabhyānena manasikāreṇeti yāvat
# gzugs la gnas bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas / / 'dis gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan to /
tatra na buddhatve sthātavyamityetadante ūṣmā
# de la sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dro ba bstan to /
tata ūrdhva iti hi buddhatvamiti na sthātavyamityetadantena mūrdhā / tato vijñānaṃ śūnyamupalabhyate vetyetadantena kṣānti
# de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rtse mo bstan to de nas rnam par shes pa stong pa'o zhes dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bzod pa bstan to /
śeṣāṇyagradharmaḥ
# lhag mas ni chos kyi mchog go /
tatra rūpādiṣvasthānama [na] bhiniveśa ūṣmā
# de la gzugs la sogs pa la gnas pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa med pas dro ba'o /
rūpādīnāmidantayā svalakṣaṇānupalambho mūrdhā
# gzugs la sogs pa de dag gi mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa ni rtse mo'o /
rūpādīnāṃ dvayānupalambhaḥ kṣāntiḥ
# gzugs la sogs pa la gnyis su mi dmigs pa ni bzod pa'o /
śūnyaṃ ityanupalambha upalabhyata iti upalambhaḥ / tasmāt śūnyamupalabhyatevetyapi dvayam / śrotaāpattiphalādīnāṃ viśeṣeṣvasthānamagradharmaḥ
# dmigs par byed pas na dmigs pa de bas na stong pa nyid la dmigs pa nyid kyang gnyis so / / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'i khyad par dag la mi gnas pa ni chos kyi mchog go /
tasmādasyāṃ bhagavatyāmanyathaiva śāstrapāṭha unneyaḥ- / asthānamūṣmā rūpādau mūrdhā taditi hīti yat
# bcom ldan 'das yum de dang des bstan bcos gzhan du drang bar bya ste / / gzugs sogs mi gnas pa ni drod / / de bzhin zhes gang rtse mo yin /
kṣāntirna nityaṃ nānityaṃ rūpādītyasthitidvaye
# gzugs sogs rtag dang mi rtag ces / / mi gnas de ni bzod pa yin /
phala (laṃ) puṃsāmihāryāṇāṃ viśeṣeṣvasthitistu yā
# 'dir ni skyes bu 'phags 'bras dang / / khyad par dag la mi gnas pa /
saivāgradharmo vijñeya āryaśrāvakavartmani
# de nyid chos mchog ces bya ste / / 'phags pa nyan thos lam yin no /
atra na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśe sthātavyamiti / indriyaviṣayavijñānasannipāte sati yaḥ sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlasyendriyavikārasya paricchedakaḥ sādṛśyamātreṇa sa sukhādivedanājanakaḥcaitasikaḥ sparśa ityucyate
# 'dir mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni / / dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa tshogs pa gang yin pa'i bde ba la sogs pa dang mthun pa'i dbang po'i 'gyur ba yongs su gcod pa 'dra ba tsam gyis de bde ba la sogs pa skyed pa'i sems las byung ba'i reg pa la brjod do /
indriyavikāraṃ sādṛśyena spṛśatīti kṛtvā
# dbang po'i 'gyur ba dang reg pa zhes bya ba nas /
ata indriyabhedāccakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśaḥ
# des na dbang po'i dbye bas mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du yin te /
ukta cābhidharme "trikasannipāte idriyavikāraparicchedaḥ sparśaḥ vedanotpattisanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ" iti
# de yang chos mngon pa las gsum 'dus pa las dbang po'i 'gyur ba yongs su gcod pa ni reg pa ste / / tshor ba skyed pa'i las can no zhes gsungs so / / sdug pa zhes bya ba ni gtsang ba'o /
śubhaṃ śuci aśubhamaśuci / asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitaṃ kleśāvidyākṣayasyāsaṃskṛtatvāt / imaṃ lokamitikāmadhātum
# mi sdug pa ni mi gtsang ba'o / / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa ma rig pa zad pa nas 'dus ma byas nyid kyi phyir ro /
tatraiveti akāmini loke / ihaivetyasminneva janmani / anupadhiśeṣa iti upadhayaḥ skandhāḥ
# 'jig rten 'dir zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams su'o / / de nyid du zhes bya ba ni de nyid du skye ba'o / / phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni phung po ni tshogs so /
ta eva śeṣāḥ sopadhiṣeśe tadviparyayādanupadhiśeṣaḥ / buddhaparinirvāṇeti / saṃsāranirvāṇayorapratiṣṭhitena
# de lhag ma yin pas phung po'i lhag ma'o / / de las bzlog pa'i phyir phung po'i lhag ma med pa'o / / sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa yin te /
yathākramaṃ sarveṣāṃ kleśikadharmaparikṣayāt, anāśravāṇāṃ ca dharmāṇāmanantānāṃ jagadarthāya yāvadākāśamavasthānāt
# rim pa bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su zad pas zag pa med pa'i chos la 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i don du nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i bar du gnas pa'o /
na ca tato vyutthita iti prāptāparihāṇitaḥ / na sthito nāsthita ityapratiṣṭhitamānasattvādavyutthānācca / na viṣṭhito naviṣṭhita iti pravāhayogena pūrvavat
# bzhengs pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thob pa nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro / / mi gnas shing mi gnas pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gnas pa med pa'i yid nyid kyi phyir dang bzhengs pa med pa'i phyir ro / / rnam par mi gnas shing rnam par mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni spong ba'i tshul gyis snga ma bzhin no /
śeṣaṃ subodhamityagradharmaḥ
# lhag ma ni rtogs par sla ste de ni chos kyi mchog go; /
ityuktāni śrāvakamārganirvedhabhāgīyāni / (RSt_26)
# de ltar nyan thos kyi lam la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi bshad pa yin no /
buddhānubhāvāt khaṅgamārgaprastāvanāya keṣāñciddevaputrāṇāṃ vitarko 'bhūt tamāha
# sangs rgyas kyi mthus bse ru'i lam gyi gnas skabs la lha'i bu kha cig rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bur gyur te /
atha khalu tatretyādinā / keṣāñciditi ye śrāvakamārgamapi subhūtinā deśyamānaṃ gaṃbhīraṃ menire / kathaṃ yakṣāṇām? tairuccāraṇāt
# de'i dbang du byas nas de nas 'khor de'i nang nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / kha cig ces bya ba ni gang rab 'byor gyis bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi lam yang zab par bsams pa'o / / ji ltar gnod sbyin rnams zhes bya ba ni de dag gis brjod pa'o /
kathaṃ yakṣarutādīni? tabhdāṣātvāt
# ji ltar gnod sbyin rnams kyis brjod pa ni bstan pa ste /
tatra rutānītyuddeśaḥ / śeṣeṇa nirdeśaḥ / mantritāni vākyāni
# de dag gis skad kyis so / / de la sgra de dag dang zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
pravyāhṛtāni vākyasamūhāḥ / bhāṣate padavākyaiḥ / pravyāharati vākyasamūhaiḥ / deśayatītyavavadatī / upadiśatītyanuśāsti / atha khalvāyuṣmānityādi / idamitilabdhāvasaratvāduddiṣṭaṃ khaṅgajñānam parāmṛṣati
# lhag ma ni rjes su bstan pa'o / / tshig ni ngag gi tshogs so / / smra ba ni ngag gi tshogs kyis so / / bshad pa ni rtogs par byed pa'o / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / 'di ni zhes bya ba ni skabs la bab pa'i phyir blo la gnas pa'i bse ru'i lam ston par byed do /
na vijñāyate na vijñāyata iti dvirvacanamavadhāraṇārtham / parato na vijñāyate eva caramabhavakhaṅgaiḥkhaṅgajñānam / paropadeśasya teṣu vaiyarthyāt
# shes par mi rung shes par mi rung zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis ni nges par bzung ba'i don to / / srid pa tha ma gzhan las rnam par shes pa ni bse ru ste / / bse ru'i theg pa de dag la ni gzhan gyis bstan pa med de /
yataḥ svayaṃbhūtvena teṣāṃ svayameva tatsaṃmukhībhavatīti paropadeśavaiyarthyam
# gang gi phyir de dag ni rang byung ba nyid kyis rang gi mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin te / / de bas na gzhan gyis bstan pa don med do /
tathāhīti / īdṛśyeva hi dharmatā dharmāṇām / kīdṛśītyāha nātretyādi / atreti skandhadhātvāyatanādau / na kiñciditi na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyata iti deśyate / śrūyate śrotrā niḥśvabhāvatvātsarvadharmāṇām / tadyathā nirmitabuddhena nirmitānāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharma deśyamāne na kiñciddeśyate na kaściddeśayitā na kaścicchroteti
# 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid chos rnams kyi chos nyid do / / ji lta bu zhe na / / 'di la cung zad kyang zhes bya ba la / / 'di la zhes bya ba ni bse ru'i theg pa la'o / / phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa cung zad kyang smos pa med de zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi chos gang yang med pas so / / thos pa ni nyan pa po ste / / chos thams cad rang rang gi ngo bo med pa ste / / dper na sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sprul pa'i 'khor rnams la chos bshad pa na cung zad kyang smos pa med pa / / sus kyang ston pa med cing gang yang nyan pa med pa bzhin no /
atha khalu tesāmityādi / uttānamagambhīraharṣādvivecanam / itītyevamasmābhirvitarkite / anāryāṇāmagocaratvena dūrāt / niṣprapañcatvena sūkṣmāt / dukhagāhatvena gambhīrācchrāva (ka) mārgā dūrataraṃ sūkṣmataraṃ gambhīrataraṃ jñānam / praviśati cetasā / deśayati granthataḥ
# de nas lha'i bu de dag la sogs pa zhes gsungs so / / gsal ba ni zab pa ma yin pa'o / / lan gnyis brjod pa ni dga' bas so / / 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bdag cag gi rnam par rtog pa'o / / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyis ring ba'i phyir dang spros pa med pa nyid kyis phra ba'i phyir ro / / gzung bar dka' ba nyid kyis zab go / / nyan thos kyi lam gyi ye shes kyi sems dpas ches ring ba dang / / ches phra ba dang / / ches zab pas rab tu 'jug pa'o / / ston pa ni tshig gis so /
bhāṣate arthataḥ / tathā hi nātretyādinā / iti jñānagambhīratā
# 'chad pa ni don gyis so / / 'di ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos pa med de zhes gsungs pa de ni shes pa zab pa nyid du bstan te /
ataḥ śāstram-
# des na bstan bcos las /
[36] paropadeśavaiyarthyaṃ svayaṃbodhātsvayaṃbhuvām
# gzhan gyis bstan yang mi dgos la / / rang byung bdag nyid rtogs pa'i phyir /
gambhīratā ca jñānasya khaṅgānāmabhidhīyate / atha khalvāyuṣmāniti / nemāṃkṣāntimanāgamyeti / tathāhi nātretyādinoktam / grāhyābhāvajñānaṃ nāprāpya prāpyaivetyarthaḥ / ataśca śrāvakairapi tajjñānaṃ tathāgatairapyupādeyaṃ sutarāṃ khaṅgairadhigantavyāmiti bhāvaḥ / iti khaṅgānāṃ grāhyavikalpaprahāṇam / (RSt_27)
# bse ru lta bu'i ye shes ni / / zab pa nyid du mngon par brjod / / ces gsungs so / / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis zhes bya ba nas / / bzod pa 'di la ma brten par zhes bya ba dang de ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos pa med de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas ni shes pa'i gzung ba med pa nyid thob pa zhes bya ba'i don te / / des na nyan thos shes pa yang blang bar bya ba yin / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang blang bar bya ba yin / / bse ru lta bu'i yang shin tu rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes bsams so / / de ni bse ru lta bu'i gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa spang ba'o /
atha khalu punarapītyādi / mantrādibalena pratibhāsamāno mithyāpuruṣo māyā
# de nas yang lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngags la sogs pa'i stobs kyis log pa'i skyes bu so sor snang ba ni sgyu ma'o /
ṛddhisandarśito nirmitaḥ / tābhyāṃ sadṛśāḥ / māyopamāste sattvā na māyeti / mithyātvameva māyātvaṃ manyante
# 'dra bar ston pa ni sprul pa ste de gnyis lta bu'o / / de gnyis dang 'dra ba ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i sems can de sgyu ma nyid ni ma yin no / / log pa nyid ni sgyu ma nyid du bsams so /
subhūtistu manyate mithyāviśeṣo māyā ca svapnaṃ ca tābhyāṃ sādṛśyaṃ mithyātvameva
# yang rab 'byor gyis bsam pa ni log pa'i khyad par gyi sgyu ma dang rmi lam ste / / de gnyis dang 'dra ba ni log pa nyid do /
tasmānmāyā ca sattvāścetyadvayaṃ mithyātvena nirviśeṣatvāditi / tadevaṃ māyāpuruṣavat puruṣadravyāṇāmasattvamuktam
# de bas na sgyu ma dang sems can ni log pa nyid du gnyis su med pa yin te khyad par med pa yin no / / de nyid kyis sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i bzhin du skyes bu'i rdzas med pa bstan to /
sarvadharmā apīti / puruṣadharmā api sarve māyopamāḥ
# chos thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma dang 'dra ba ste /
asati puruṣadravye taddharmāṇāmapyabhāvāt
# skyes bu de'i rdzas med na chos kyang med pa'i phyir ro /
atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra ityādi nāsyā āyuṣmanta ityādinā na kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyatyetadantena sthavirasubhūtirdhārmaśravaṇikavat pratyeṣakānāmapyabhāvamāha
# de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas / / 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos nyan pa bzhin yang dag par 'dzin pa yang med do zhes bstan to /
pratīkṣantīti pratyeṣakāḥ / teṣāmabhāvaḥ pratyeṣakapuruṣadravyābhāvāt / sūcyata ityasphuṭaṃ bhāṣyate
# rab tu 'dzin par byed pas yang dag par 'dzin pa'o / / de med pa ni yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdzas med pa'i phyir ro / / ma smos pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bar ma bshad pa'o /
paridīpyata iti sphuṭam
# yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o /
prajñapyata iti vaktṛśrotṛbhirvyavahriyate
# bcas pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa dang nyan pa'i tha snyad do /
tasmātsarvathā na santi puruṣadravyāṇi / kevalamadhyātmikeṣu ca skandhādiṣu puruṣaprajñaptiḥ
# de bas na rnam pa thams cad du skyes bu'i rdzas ni med de nang gi phung po la sogs pa ma 'dres pa nyid la skyes bur bstan te /
tataḥ puruṣaprajñaptyāśraye skandhādau grāhaka grāhameṣāmastīti khaṅgānāṃ grāhakavikalpāprahāṇam
# des na skyes bu btags pa la brtan pa phung po la sogs pa la 'dzin pa 'di dag yod pa yin gyi / / bse ru lta bu'i 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa ni ma yin no /
atha khalu śakrasyetyādinā na tat puṣpamityetadantena khaṅgānāṃ gotramucyate / atra dharmaparyāyo dharmaprabhedaḥ / khaṅgamārgaḥ
# de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba nas / / gang ma skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bse ru lta bu'i rigs brjod do /
yannuśabdo / vākyālaṅkāre / subhūtimiti / dharmabhāṇakapūjayā dharmapūjanāt
# 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zhes bya ba ni chos kyi bye brag bse ru'i lam mo / / rab 'byor la mngon par gtor ro zhes bya ba ni chos 'chad pa la mchod pas ni chos la mchod pa'i phyir ro /
etaditivakṣyamānaṃ(ṇaṃ) vitarkitaṃ abhūt / śakramanu śakraṃ prati vyāharaṇāyeti vitarkaṃ viditvā bhāṣaṇāya
# brgya byin la rjes su brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa shes nas bshad pa'i phyir ro / / 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba ni 'og nas brjod pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa la sems pa'o /
imānīti prakṛtāni / puṣpāṇītyamalatvena puṣpasādharmyāt khaḍgamārgasaṃgṛhītāni kuśalāni
# 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni de ltar bgyi'o / / me tog ni dri ma med pa nyid kyis me tog dang chos mthun pa'i phyir te / / bse ru lta bu'i lam gyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba rnams so /
deveṣu pracarantīti avacaranti na dṛṣṭāni, anāśravatvena dhātupatitatvābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ
# lha'i gnas na yid pa zhes bya ba ni srid pa'o / / ma mthong zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa nyid kyis khams gsum du lhung ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams so /
abhyavakīrṇānīti pariṣadi nirmitapuṣpaiḥ sūcitāni
# mngon par gtong ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor rnams la sprul pa'i me tog mtshon pa yin no /
nirmitāni yathādarśanamasattvāt / kuta ityāha / naitānītyādi / manomayānītyupasaṃhāraḥ / manonirji(rmi) tānītyarthaḥ
# sprul pa ni ji ltar snang pa bzhin du med pa'i phyir ro / / ga las she na / / 'di dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / yid las byung ba zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa yid kyis sprul pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
śakrastu manomayatvamapi niṣeddhumāha / anirjātānīti / yathā hi grāhyatvādvṛkṣādayo na santīti na tebhyo nirjātāni tāni / tathā manopi nāsti grāhakatvāditi tatopyanirjātāni subhūtirāha
# brgya byin gyi yid las byung ba nyid kyang dgag pa'i phyir 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so / / ji ltar bzung ba'i shing la sogs pa med de / / de bas de dag las byung ba yang ma yin la de bzhin du yid kyang med de 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro / / de bas na de las byung ba yang ma yin no /
yatkauśikānirjātaṃ na tatpuṣpamiti yattayornityābhisambandhānna tatpuṣpaṃ na sa khaḍmārgaḥ syādityarthaḥ / evaṃ manyate
# rab 'byor gyis smras pa / / koo shi ka gang ma skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gang dang de ni rtag tu 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir de ni me tog kyang ma yin bse ru'i lam yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
nirviśeṣaṃ jātaṃ nirjātam / ataḥ sajātīyaṃ kāryamāśritam / kāraṇamāśrayaḥ / khaḍgamārgaśca khaḍgāśritaḥ
# 'di snyam du sems te khyad par med par byung ba ni skye ba'o / / des na 'bras bu ni rigs 'dra ba la brten pa yin te rgyu la gnas pas bse ru'i rten ni bse ru'i lam mo /
na ca khaḍgasya saṃskṛto dharmo mārgasyāśrayo yujyate sāsravasya vijātīyatvāt
# bse ru ni 'dus byas kyi chos kyi lam la brten par rigs pa yin te zag pa dang bcas pa ni rigs mi 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
anāsravasyāpi saṃskṛtasyādimatvādādita eva nirāśrayasyānutpattiprasaṅgāt
# 'dus byas kyang zag pa med par ldan pa ni de dang ldan pa'i phyir dang po nyid nas zag pa med pa yang skye bar thal bar 'gyur ro /
tasmādanāsravatvena sajātīyaḥ khaḍgasya dharmadhātureva khaḍmārgasyāśraya ādhāraḥ pratiṣṭhāgotramiti khaḍgamārgasyādhāraḥ
# de bas na zag pa med pa nyid kyi rigs 'dra ba ni bse ru'i chos kyi dbyings nyid de / / bse ru'i lam ni gnas dang gzhi dang rten dang rigs yin te de ni bse ru'i lam gyi rten yin no /
ataḥ śāstram- / (RSt_28) / [37] grāhyārthakalpanāhānāt grāhakasyāprahāṇataḥ
# 'dir bstan bcos las / / gzung ba'i rtog pa nyams phyir dang / / 'dzin pa mi spong phyir dang ni / / rten gyi bse ru lta bu'i lam /
ādhārataśca vijñeyaḥ khaḍgamārgasya saṅgrahaḥ / atha khaḍgānāṃ kathaṃ parārthakriyāṃ? icchāmātreṇa tatsiddheḥ / kathaṃ tebhyaḥ śravaṇam? sūśrūṣāmātreṇa / yataḥ śāstram- / [38] suśrūṣā yatra yatrārthe yasya yasya yathā yathā / sa so 'rthaḥ khyātyaśabdopi tasya tasya tathā tathā / 'yasya yasya' vineyasya / 'yatra yatrārthe ' iti nirvedhabhāgīyeṣvāryamārge vā / 'yathā yathā' iti yena yenākāreṇa / atha khalu śakretyādi / dvitīyād atha khalu śakraśabdāt prāk nirvedhabhāgīyāni vaktavyāni / tatra buddhadharmeṣu śikṣata ityetadantena ūṣmā / nāmapadaiḥ prajñaptiḥ vyavahāraḥ / tān nirdiśati / na ca virodhayati tāṃ cottānīkaroti / tāmeva copadiśati / tathā hi prajñaptimātraṃ rūpaṃ prajñaptimātrameva dharmatetyupadiśati ityūṣmā
# yang dag bsdus par shes par bya / / zhes gsungs so / / de nas bse ru rnams ni ji ltar gzhan gyi don byed pa yin zhe na / / 'dod pa tsam gyis de 'grub pa yin no / / de dag las ji ltar nyan par byed ce na / / gus par nyan pa tsam gyis te / / gang gi phyir bstan bcos las / / gang gang don ni gang gang las / / ji lta ji ltar nyan 'dod dang / / de la sgra med kyang don de / / de ni de lta de ltar snang / / zhes gsungs so / / gang dang gang zhes bya ba ni gdul bya la'o / / don gang dang gang la zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha 'am 'phags pa'i lam nyid do / / ji lta ji ltar zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang gi rnams so / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba nas / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bstan pa yin te / / de la gang sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa tshad med pa la slob bo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dri ba bstan to / / ming dang tshig tu btags pa zhes bya ba ni tha snyad do / / de ston pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang de nyid bsal bar byed pa dang de nyid nye bar ston pa ste / / de ltar chos thams cad btags pa tsam nyid du ston pa yin te de ni drod do / / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med dpag tu med pa la slob bo zhes bya ba nas /
yo 'prameyeṣvityādinā na parihāṇāyetyetadantena mūrdhā / kathaṃ na śikṣate, anupalambhāditi
# de rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rtse mo bstan to / / ji ltar mi slob pa yin zhe na / / dmigs pa med pa'i phyir te /
iti mūrdhā / yo na rūpasya vivṛddhaya ityādinā atha khalvāyuṣmānityataḥ prāk kṣāntiḥ
# de ni rtse mo'o / / gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang; 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang zhes bya ba nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bzod pa bstan to /
atra rūpāderaparigrahayuktirmahatyorbhagavatyoruktā 'adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvadabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāmupādāya' iti / iti kṣāntiḥ / atha khalvāyuṣmānityādinā atha khalu śakra ityataḥ prāgagradharmaḥ / evaṃ ceti buddhisthaṃ hetuḥ parāmṛśati / mahatyorbhagavatyorya uktaḥ tathā hi "na sa rūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ nāvadānaṃ na cayaṃ nāpacayaṃ no hānirna vṛddhim" ityagradharmāḥ / ataḥ śāstram- / [39] prajñapteravirodhena dharmatāsūcanākṛtiḥ / ūṣmagaṃ mūrdhagaṃ rūpādyahānādiprabhāvitam
# de la gzugs la sogs pa yongs su gzung ba med pa'i rigs ni bcom ldan 'das ma chen po las bstan to / / nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar la bstan pa de ni bzod pa'o / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni chos kyi mchog ston to / / de ltar zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'i rgyu 'dren par byed pa'o / / de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das ma chen po las gsungs te; des gzugs kyi skye ba mi mthong / / 'gag pa mi mthong / / blang ba mi mthong / / dor ba mi mthong / / kun nas nyon mongs pa mi mthong / / rnam par byang ba mi mthong / / 'phel ba mi mthong / / 'grib pa mi mthong / / stsogs pa mi mthong / / 'bri ba mi mthong zhes bya ba 'byung ba ni chos kyi mchog go de ltar yang bstan bcos las / / btags pa'i chos nyid mi 'gal bar / / ston pa'i rnam pa drod gyur pa / / rtse mor gyur pa gzugs la sogs / / 'grib pa med la sogs pas phye /
[40] adhyātmaśūnyatādyābhī rūpāderaparigrahāt
# nang stong nyid la sogs pa yis / / gzugs sogs mi 'dzin phyir bzod pa /
kṣāntī rūpādyanutpādādyākārairagradharmatā / ityuktaḥ pratyekabuddhamārgaḥ
# gzugs sogs skye ba med sogs kyi / / rnam pa can ni chos kyi mchog / / ces bstan te rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mo /
bodhisattvasya mārgo vaktavyaḥ / tamadhikṛtya śāstram-
# byang chub sems dpa'i lam bshad par bya ste / / de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
[41] kṣāntijñānakṣaṇaiḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ prati caturvidhaiḥ
# bden dang bden la bzod pa dang / / shes pa'i skad cig rnam bzhi yis /
mārgajñatāyāṃ dṛṅmārgaḥ sānusaṃ (śaṃ) soyamucyate / (RSt_29) / iti saṃkṣepeṇa sūtrārthaḥ / dve kṣāntī dve ca jñāne pratisatyam / duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirduḥkhe dharmajñānam / duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntirduḥkhe anvayajñānam / evaṃ samudayanirodhe mārge ca / ebhiḥ pratisatyaṃ caturvidhaiḥ kṣaṇairbodhisattvasya darśanamārgajñatāyāmucyate sahānusaṃ(śaṃ)syaiḥ / eṣāṃ tu kṣaṇānāṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇamadhikṛtya śāstre pañca ślokāḥ-
# lam shes nyid la mthong ba'i lam / / phen yon bcas pa 'di bshad do / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / 'di'i mdor bsdus pa'i don ni bden pa re re la bzod pa gnyis dang shes pa gnyis te / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa dang de bzhin du kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam la yang sbyar ro / / bden pa rnam pa mang po'i skad cig ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi lam shes pa nyid du brjod do / / phan yon dang bcas pa'i skad cig ma 'di dag gi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas nas / / bstan bcos las tshigs su bcad pa lnga ste /
[42] ādhārādheyatābhāvāttathatābuddhayormithaḥ / paryāyeṇānanujñānaṃ mahattā sāpramāṇatā
# de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas dag / / phan tshun rten pa rten med phyir / / rnam grangs khas mi len pa dang / / chen po tshad med nyid dang bcas /
[43] parimāṇāttathatābhāvo rūpāderavadhāraṇam / tasyāṃ sthitasya buddhatve 'nugrahātyāgatādayaḥ
# dpag med mtha' nyid med pa dang / / der gnas gzugs la sogs pa la / / sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'dzin dang / / blang dang dor ba med sogs dang /
[44] maitryādi śūnyatāvyāptirbuddhatvasya parigrahaḥ
# byams la sogs dang stong nyid dang / / sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob pa dang /
sarvasya vyavadānasya sarvādhivyādhiśātanam
# rnam par byang kun yongs bsdus dang / / nyam nga ba dang nad kun sel /
[45] nirvāṇagrāhasā (śā)ntatvaṃ buddhebhyo rakṣaṇādikam
# mya ngan 'das 'dzin zhi nyid dang / / sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsrung la sogs /
apramāṇi (aprāṇi) vadhamārabhya sarvākārajñatā naye
# srog mi gcod pa la sogs pa / / rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni /
[46] svayaṃ sthitasya satvānāṃ sthāpanaṃ pariṇāmanam
# bdag nyid gnas te sems can dag / / 'god dang sbyin pa la sogs pa /
dānādīnāṃ ca sambodhāviti mārgajñatākṣaṇāḥ
# rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba / / lam shes nyid kyi skad cig ma /
mārgajñatāyāṃ bodhisattvasya darśanamārgakṣaṇā ityarthaḥ
# zhes gsungs te / / lam nyid byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma zhes bya ba'i don to /
imāṃ tu bhagavatīmadhikṛtyādyaṃ pādatrayamanyathā kartavyam / tatrādyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pādadvayena-
# yul 'di'i dbang du mdzad nas dang po'i tshig rkang pa gsum don gzhan du byas pa ni dang po'i skad cig ma tshig rkang pa gnyis kyis so /
rūpādito dhīrnānanyā na cānyā paramārthataḥ / dhīḥ prajñāpāramitā sā rūpādibhyo nābhinnā lakṣaṇabhedāt
# dam pa'i don du gzugs la sogs / / shes pa ma yin gzhan tshig min / / zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te de ni gzugs la sogs pa las mtshan nyid kyi dbye bas tha dad pa ma yin te /
na ca bhinnā paramārthataḥ / tathā hi / yā prajñāpāramitā yadrūpādi yā rūpāditathatā yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanāpratighā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇāḥ, na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā iti / nābhinnāḥ na bhinnāḥ kalpitā nāmatvāt / bhedābhedayośca bhāvadharmatvāt / ata eva rūpaskandhābhāvādarūpiṇaḥ / cakṣurvijñānābhāvādanidarśanāḥ / svadeśe parasyotpatteravibandhanādapratighāḥ / bhedapratibhāsānāmastaṅgamādekalakṣaṇāḥ / yadutālakṣaṇā iti tathatāmātralakṣaṇāḥ / ata ādyasya kṣaṇasya prastāvanā / atha khalu śakra ityādinā tatkasya hetorityataḥ prāk / tata urdhvamādyakṣaṇa evamukta ityataḥ prāk / iti duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ / caturṇāṃ kṣaṇānāṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ śāstreṇa- / (RSt_30)
# don dam par tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin no / / de ltar na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gzugs la sogs pa nang yin pa de ni de de bzhin nyid / / gang yang chos 'di dag thams cad yongs su 'tshal na ni yang dag par ldan pa yang ma yin / / yang dag par mi ldan pa yang ma yin / / gzugs med pa / / bstan du med pa / / thogs pa med pa / / 'di lta ste / / mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o / / yang dag pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin / / yang dag par mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gcig pa yang ma yin pa dang tha dad pa yang ma yin pa ste / / brtags pa rnams ni med pas gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad ni tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa med pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / de nyid de bas na gzugs kyi phung po med pa nas gzugs med pa nas gzugs med pa'o / / mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir bstan du med pa'o / / rang dang gzhan gyi skyon 'byung ba'i 'ching ba med pa'i phyir thogs pa med pa'o / / bye brag so sor snang ba nub pa'i phyir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste / / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin te / / de ni de bzhin nyid tsam gyi mtshan nyid do / / des na 'di'i dang po mtshan nyid kyi skabs bstan pa ni de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so zhes pa nas / / de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba'i bar dang de'i 'og tu dang po'i skad cig ma de skad smras pa dang lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bstan to / / skad cig ma de dag gi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid ni bstan bcos las /
[43a] tasyā [:] catuṣṭayaṃ yattu mahattā sāpramāṇatā / parimāṇāntatābhāvau rūpādeḥ / saha apramāṇatayā 'sā'pramāṇatā' / 'mahattā' apramāṇatā cetyarthaḥ
# chen po tshad med nyid dang bcas / / dpag dang mtha' nyid med pa dang / / de dag gzugs la sogs par sbyor / / zhes bya ba la chen po dang tshad med pa dang lhan cig pa ni chen po tshad med pa 'di dang bcas pa'o /
anta evāntatā / parimāṇaścāntatā / ca tayorabhāvau aparimāṇatā / anantatā cetyarthaḥ / 'tasyāḥ' iti prajñāpāramitāyāstanmahattādi 'catuṣṭayaṃ yat rūpādeḥ' iti sambandhaḥ / rūpādermahattvādinā tadālambanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā mahattvādi / mahāpāramitā / apramāṇapāramitā / aparimāṇapāramitā / anantapāramitā cetyarthaḥ / etacca mahāpāramitāvijñānaṃ nirabhiniveśaṃ draṣṭavyam / evaṃ mahāpāramiteti kauśika nābhiniviśata ityādeḥ sūtrapāṭhāt / ata evamukte śakreṇa teṣāmuddeśaḥ / sthavira ityādikaḥ subhūtinā saślādhānuvādaḥ / tataḥ subhūtinaiva nirdeśaḥ tatkasyetyādi / tatra rūpādīnāṃ mahattā- amuṣmin kāle bhāvo 'muṣminnabhāvaḥ- ityevaṃ kālato 'paricchedāt tadālambanatvāttasya mahattvam / iti duḥkhe dharmajñānam / ākāso(śo)pamena tathatāśarīreṇa pramāṇato 'paricchedādapramāṇateti
# de nyid chen po tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / mtha' gnyis ni mtha' kho na'o / / dpag pa dang mtha' gnyis ni dpag pa dang mtha' dag go / / de gnyis med pa ni dpag tu med pa dang mtha' med pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / de zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / / chen po la sogs pa ni gang gzugs la sogs pa dang sbyar ro; / / gzugs la sogs pa de dag la chen po la sogs pa dmigs pa na / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chen po la sogs pas pha rol tu phyin pa chen po nyid dang tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang dpag tu med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / 'di yang pha rol tu phyin pa chen po la sogs pa'i shes pa ni mngon par zhen pa med par blta bar bya'o / / de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya ba ni koo shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phin pa'o zhes mngon par chags par mi byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo'i tshig gis gsungs so / / de nas de skad ces smras pa dang lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni brgya byin gyis bstan to / / gnas brtan rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pas rab 'byor gyis brjod pa rjes su brjod pa yin no / / de bas na rab 'byor nyid kyi rjes su bstan pa ni / / de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so / / de la gzugs la sogs pa chen po nyid ni dus 'di la yod do / / dus 'di la med do zhes bya ba nyid ni dus yongs su chad pa med pa nyid do / / de la mi dmigs pa'i phyir de ni chen po nyid yin te de bas na sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'o / / de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nam mkha' lta bu ste / / tshad kyis yongs su bcad du med pa'i phyir tshad med pa yin te /
duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ / saṃkhyayā aparicchedādaparimāṇateti duḥkhe 'nvayajñānam
# de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o / / grangs yongs su bcad pa med pa ni dpag tu med pa yin te / / de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'o /
deśato 'paricchedādanantatā ārambaṇanantatayā ca / ārambaṇaṃ sarvadharmā na ca teṣāmantato(tā)'sti gaṇanātikrāntatvāt / api ca sarvadharmā anantā asattvena teṣāmutpādavināśāntayorabhāvāt
# yul phyogs yongs su bcad pa med pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa 'am dmigs pa mtha' yas so / / gang gi phyir dmigs pa ni chos de dag thams cad kyi mtha' yod pa ma yin te / / grangs las 'das 'das pa'i phyir ro / / gzhan yang chos thams cad ni med pa nyid kyi mthas yas pa yin te / / de dag ni skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtha' gnyis med pa'i phyir ro / / dmigs pa de gnyis ka yang bdag med pa'i shes pa ste /
sattvā apyālambanamubhayanairātmyajñāne
# sems can la dmigs pa ni bdag med pa gnyis ka yin te /
te cānantāḥ / śakra āha / tatkathamanantā iti
# de yang mthas mtha' yas pa'o / / brgya byin gyis smras pa / / de ji ltar mtha' yas pa yin zhe na /
subhūtirāha / na gaṇanā ayogena gaṇanābahutvena veti / na gaṇanātikrāntatvena / nāpyanantākhyayā saṃkhyayetyarthaḥ / kathaṃ tarhīti tarhi śabdo 'kṣamāyām / na dharmādhivacanamiti dharma ātmadravyaṃ na tasyādhivacanaṃ tasyābhāvāt
# rab 'byor gyis smras pa ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis kyang ma yin / / bgrang ba mang pos kyang ma yin zhes bya ba ni bgrang ba las 'das pa nyid kyis kyang ma yin / / grangs mtha' yas pas kyang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to / / 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba la / / 'o na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni mi gzigs / / chos kyi tshig bla dvags pas kyang ma yin zhes bya ba la chos ni bdag gi rdzas so /
dharmatvena svārthābhidhānāt nādharmādhivacanam / prakṣiptamiti sūtraiḥ prayuktam / kutaḥ? yata āgaṃtukaṃ sati vicāre calatvāt / yato 'vastukaṃ ātmadravyābhāvāt
# de'i tshig bla dags ma yin pa ni de med pa'i phyir te / / chos nyid kyi rang gi don mi bsgrub pas na chos kyi tshig bla dvags ma yin no / / ming du btags pa zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa dang ldan pas so / / de ga las she na / / gang gi phyir glo bur du byung ba yin te / / rnam par dpyod pa yod na gyo ba nyid kyi phyir ro / / gang gi phyir dngos po med pa ni bdag gi rdzas med pas so /
ātmasambandhādapyātmeti kiñciducyate / tadapi nāstyātmano 'tyantamasattvādityanātmīyam
# bdag dang 'brel pa yod na ni bdag ces cung zad brjod na de yang med na bdag ces bya ba gtan du med pa'i phyir de ni bdag med pa'o /
athavā ātmaprajñaptiviṣayaḥ skandhādirātmīyastasyāpyabhāvādanātmīyam / athavā nāma saṃjñā tasyātmīyaḥ saṃjñī
# yang na bdag tu btags pa'i yul phung po la sogs pa ni bdag gi yin na de yang med pas bdag gi med do / / yang na ming dang 'du shes so /
tadabhāvādanātmīyam / ārambaṇaṃ viṣayastadabhāvāt ānārambaṇam / atreti śāstṛśāsane / (RSt_31) etaccāptavacanādapi nairātmyasiddhiṃ darśayitumāha
# gang de'i 'du shes de med pa'i phyir bdag gi med pa'o / / dmigs pa'i yul de med pa'i phyir dmigs su med pa'o / / 'di la zhes bya ba ni ston pa'i bstan pa'o / / de yang yid ches pa'i lung gis kyang bdag med pa grub par bstan pa'i ched du gang la sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam zhes smras te /
kā satvānantateti / gaṇanāti krāntatvena na kācitpramāṇasiddhepi nairātmyeāptavacanādapi nātmasiddhiriti darśayitumāha / sacetyādi / svareṇeti vacanena / anantasya lokasya vijñaptirarthajñāpano ghoṣaḥ śabdo 'syeti tathoktena
# bgrang ba las 'das pa nyid kyis gong yang med do zhes bsams so / / bdag med pa tshad mas grub pa yin yang yid ches pa'i lung gis kyang bdag med pa grub pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du / / koo shi ka gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni ngal bso ba med pa'o / / gsung zhes bya ba ni tshig gis so / / mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten no / / go bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni don go bar byed pa'i dbyangs de sgra de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o /
tathāpyatimāṃsalatvāt gambhīro nirghoṣastūryanirghoṣavadvicitraḥ śabdosyeti tathoktena / avitiṣṭhamāna iti aviśrāmyena / api nviti kinnu
# 'brug sgra lta bu ni zab pa'o / / dbyangs ni rol mo'i dbyangs bzhin du sna tshogs pa'o / / gang la de lta bu'i sgra yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o / / zin kyang zhes bya ba ni 'on kyang ngo /
ādiśuddhatvamādita evāsattvapariśuddhatvaṃ sarvatrāsattvam
# thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dang po nyid nas sems can med pa'o / / yongs su dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni thams cad du sems med pa'o /
anenāpi paryāyeṇa prakāreṇa
# rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pas so /
anantapāramiteyam / katamenetyata āha
# mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la de gang yin zhe na /
evaṃ sattvānantayeti / satvānāmutpādanirodhāntavirahāt sattvānantatayeti
# de na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni sems can rnams skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems can mtha' yas pa'o /
evaṃ cetyevameva / na gaṇānatikrāntatveneti samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
# de ltar yang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du grangs las 'das pa'o / / de ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o /
avadhāraṇam / tasyāṃ sthitasya buddhatve,
# der gnas gzugs la sogs pa la / / sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'dzin dang /
'tasyāṃ' prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ yad 'buddhatve 'vadhāraṇaṃ' buddha eva sa dṛṣṭavya iti sa ṣaṣṭhaḥ kṣaṇaḥ / tasya prastāvanā / atha khalu sendrakā ityādinā / indra śakraḥ / brahmā sahāpatiḥ / prajāpatayaścatvāro lokapālāḥ
# zhes bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de la sangs rgyas nyid du nges par bzung ba de nyid sangs rgyas su blta bar bya ba ste / / 'di ni skad cig ma drug pa'o / / de'i skabs ni de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang por bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / dbang po ni brgya byin no / / tshangs pa ni mi mjed kyi bdag po'o / / skye dgu'i bdag po ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams so /
viśiṣṭa dharmaśravaṇapraharṣādaprayatnajaṃ vacanaṃ udānaṃ tat udānayanti sma
# khyad par gyi chos thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i phyir 'bad pa med par 'byung ba'i tshig ni ched du brjod pa'o /
udīratavantaḥ / aho ityāścarye / dharma iti deśanādharmaḥ
# ched du brjod de zhes bya ba ni brjod par gyur pa'o / / ae ma ho zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar to / / chos zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i chos so /
punaḥ dharma iti dharmaprakāśito darśanamārgaḥ / tasyaiva dharmasya dharmatā prakṛtistathā gatotpādanam / ata evāhuḥ ya ityādi / prādurbhāva utpādo 'nāśravalakṣaṇaḥ sūcyate / tadvacanātkilādau pratīteḥ / tataḥ kramena(ṇa) sphuṭena sphuṭataraṃ sphuṭatamaṃ ca pratīteḥ
# yang chos ni chos rab tu ston pa ste mthong ba'i lam mo / / de nyid kyi chos nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ste / / 'di ni smra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa'o / / 'byung ba ni skye ba ste zag pa med pa'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid do / / smra ba zhes bya ba ni 'di'i tshig dang po cung zad tsam shes pa'o / / de nas rim gyis gsal ba dang rab tu gsal ba dang shin tu gsal bar rtag tu rtogs pa yin te /
deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate ca / tathāgatamityādinā tameva ṣaṣṭhaṃ kṣaṇamāhuḥ
# brjod cing bstan te bshad la rab tu bzhag pa'o / / bcom ldan 'das slan chad ce bya ba la sogs pas ni skad cig ma drug pa nyid smras so /
adyāgreṇeti / adya prabhṛti dhārayiṣyāmaḥ / avirahito prāptāparihāṇāt / vihariṣyati saṃmukhībhāvāt / tathāgataṃ tu svayamavadhārayiṣyāma iti yaduktaṃ tattathāgatatve niyatamaviśeṣalābhāt / tallābhe ca vyākaraṇam / tata āha yadāhamityādi / alpavayo hi śrotriyo māṇavaka ityucyate / tasyāmantraṇaṃmāṇavaka, bhaviṣyasi buddho bhagavān svayamabhisaṃbodhāt
# da slan chad ces bya ba ni da nas gzung ba'o / / 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o / / ma bral ba ni thob pa mnyams so / / gnas pa ni mngon sum du gyur pas so / / de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'dzin to zhes gang sungs pa ni / / de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes kyang par gyi blo thob pa'i phyir ro / / de thob pas kyang lung bstan pa yin te / / des lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / na tshod chung zhing gtsang ba gang yin pa de ni bram ze'i khye'u zhes brjod do / / de la bod pa ni bram ze'i khye'u'o / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rang nyid mngon par byang chub pas sam /
buddhiratiśayenāsyāstīti buddhaḥ
# blo khyad par du 'phags pa 'di la yod pas na sangs rgyas so /
tādṛśaṃ pratyekabuddhopīti / tadvayavacchedārthaṃ bhagavad grahaṇam
# de lta bu ni sangs rgyas dag la yang yod do zhe na / / rnam par bcad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes smos so /
ṣaḍivadhena bhagārthena tasya yogāt
# skal pa drug dang ldan pa'i don gyis bcom ldan no /
bhagavān bodhisattvopi / tadvayavacchedārthaṃ buddhagrahaṇaṃ tasyānabhisambodhāt
# de ni byang chub sems dpa' la yang yod do zhe na / / de rnam par bcad pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes smos te de ni mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro /
yathā dharmāstathaiva gadanāt tathāgataḥ
# chos ji lta ba de bzhin du gsungs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o /
gadeḥ pacādyac / nairuktastakāraḥ / arayaḥ kleśāstān hatavāniti arhan / samyagaviparītaṃ samastaṃ buddhamaneneti samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ / etena (RSt_32) śāstṛtvasaṃpaduktā
# nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pas na dgra bcom pa'o / / yang dag pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'am / / thams cad de sangs rgyas 'dis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o / / 'dis ni ston pa nyid phun sum tshogs par bstan pa'o /
na hyavaktā viparītavaktā vā śāstā bhavati
# mi ston pa 'am phyin ci log tu ston pa ni ston pa ma yin te /
viparītavacanaṃ ca kleśavaśādajñānādvā bhavet
# phyin ci log gi tshig gis nyon mongs pa'am mi shes pa'i dbang gis kyang 'byung na /
taccobhayamasya nāsti yathākramamarhatvāt samyaksambuddhatvācc
# de gnyis ka yang 'di la med de go rims bzhin du dgra bcom pa yang dag par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro /
saṃsāriṇaḥ kathamī[dṛśī] śaktiriti cedāha sugata iti
# 'khor ba na bzhugs pas 'di ltar ji lta bu'i nus pa yod ce na bde bar gshegs pa zhes gsungs te /
gataḥ punarbhavāt muktaḥ / suśabdaḥ prasa (śa)stāpunarāvṛttiniḥśeṣārthaḥ, surūpavat sunaṣṭajvaravat supūrṇaghaṭavacca / bāhyaśaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ vyavacchedāya yathākramam / tatra lokottareṇa mārgeṇa gatatvāt praśastaṃ gataḥ / naivaṃ bāhyāḥ
# gshegs pa ni sred pa las grol ba'o / / bde ba'i sgra ni rab tu bsngags pa dang yang ldog pa'i don to / / phyi rol pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa rnam par gcad pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du gzugs bzang po lta bu dang rims nad legs par byang ba lta bu dang bum pa legs par gang ba lta bu yin par sbyar ro / / de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis gshegs pa'i phyir / / rab tu bsngags pa'i gshegs pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'o /
sāvadhikatvena tanmokṣasyāmokṣatvāt / "punarāvṛttirityuktau janmadoṣasamubhdavau
# phyi rol gyi thar pa de ni tshad mar bcad pa nyid kyis tha ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / skye dang skyon ni yang dag 'byung / / slar ldog pa zhes bstan pa yin /
tau ca śaikṣāṇām / aśaikṣastu bhagavāṃstasmādapunarāvṛttyā gataḥ / śeṣamakleśanirjvaraṃ / "kāyavākbuddhivaiguṇyaṃ mārgākṣapaṭutāpi vā
# de gnyis ni slob pa yin no / / de bas na ldog pa med par gshegs pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'o / / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis lhag ma med pa ste lam bstan pas sku gsung thugs kyi skyon spangs pa'i phyir ro /
tadaśaikṣāṇāmapi hīnayānarhatāṃ yathāsambhavamasti / na tu bhagavataḥ / tato niḥśeṣagamanāt sugataḥ
# mi slob pa yin na de ni theg pa dman pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid las ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa yin la; bcom ldan 'das ni de yod pa ma yin te / / des ni lhag ma med par gshegs pa'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'o /
kathamekaḥ suśabdastrīnarthānāha? tantreṇa nyāyena / tadyathā śveto dhāvati / alambumāṇāṃ yāteti / śvetaḥ śuklaḥ śvā itaḥ śvetaḥ / alambumā nāma grāmaḥ / tasya yātā gantā bumā api grāmaḥ / tasyālaṅganteti / kathaṃ sugataḥ? yato vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ / vidyā adhiprajñaṃ śikṣā, adhiśīlamadhicittaṃ ca / śikṣācaraṇaṃ vidyā puraścaraṇatvāttayoḥ / ato vidyayā cakṣuṣeva paśyan / itarābhyāṃ caraṇābhyāmiva tathā gamanāt sugataḥ
# su'i dgra gcig gi gsum du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / / tha ga pa'i thabs kyis rigs pa smras pa / / dper na / / shve to tra ba ti / / aa lam bu y'a n'a ma ya te / / zhes bya bas dkar po rgyugs te song ngo zhes bya ba dang khyi 'di nas rgyugs te song ngo zhes bya ba dang ku ba'i grong du song ngo zhes bya ba dang phub ma'i grong du ma 'gro zhes bya ba lta bu'o / / ji ltar bde bar gshegs pa yin zhes na / / gang gi phyir rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes smos te / / rig pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o / / lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang sems ni rkang pa'o / / rig pa ni rkang pa de gnyis kyi sngon du 'gro ba yin te des na rig pa'i mig gnyis kyis blta zhing cig shos gnyis kyi rkang pas 'gro ba ltar de bzhin gshegs pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o /
tadanena padadvayena śāstṛtvasampado heturūktaḥ
# de la tshig gnyis po 'dis ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyi rgyu bstan to /
lokaviditi lokasya vinayanakālākālādiparijñānāllokavit / puruṣā eva damyā damanīyā vineyatvāt
# 'jig rten rig pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi gdul ba'i dus la sogs pa yongs su mkhyen pas na 'jig rten rig pa'o / / skyes bu nyid 'dul ba yin pas skyes bu 'dul ba'o /
teṣāṃ sārathiḥ samyagvinetā
# de ni kha lo sgyur ba ni yang dag par 'dul ba'o /
tasya sadṛśaḥ sārathirastyeva / tadanyaḥ sugatastatodhikastu
# de dang 'dra ba kha lo sgyur ba nyid gzhan yang yod de bde bar gshegs pa'o /
nāstīti anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ / anena padadvayena śāstṛtvasampado heturuktaḥ
# de las lhag pa med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba zhes smos so / / tshig gnyis po 'dis ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa'i lam bstan to /
athāsya karmaṇo viṣayaḥ / kiṃ durgatiṃ gatā api? netyāha / śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti / iti samudaye dharmajñānam / atha khalu ta ityādinā saptamaṃ kṣaṇamāhuḥ / āścaryamāhārikārthe / paramāścaryamanuparigrāhikāthe / yāvacchabdaḥ paryantārthaḥ / dānapāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā yāvat sarvajñatāyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyā ityarthaḥ / āhāriketyākarṣikā
# ci ste 'di las kyi yul ngan song gi 'gro ba yang yin nam zhe na / / de ni ma yin te lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa zhes smos so / / de ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'o / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag ces bya ba ni skad cig ma bdun pa gsungs te / / ji srid ces bya bas ni yongs su mthar thug pa'i bar te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang kun mkhyen pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba'i don to / / yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ba ni 'dren pa'o /
anuparigrāhiketyanuśabdo 'nvayārthaḥ / anvayo yuktirnyāyaḥ / aparigrahonutsargayogaḥ / aparigrahānutsargayogayoḥ sāhityam / anvayena parigrāhikā yathā na parigṛṇhāti na cotsṛjati tathā parigrāhiketyarthaḥ / atra śāstram- / (RSt_33) / anugrahātyāgatādayaḥ / iti / ādānamādiparigrahaḥ
# rjes su yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la rjes su zhes bya ba ni mthun pa'i don to / / mthun pa ni rigs pa dang 'thad pa'o / / ngo mtshar to zhes bya ba ni yongs su sdud pa'o / / shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes bya ba ni rjes su yongs su sdud pa'o / / blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa dang ldan pa ni / / blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa dag gi lhan cig pa dang mthun pas len pa med pa ste / / de ni blang ba med pa'o / / dper na ji ltar yongs su mi len mi gtong pa de ltar yongs su len pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / 'dir bstan bcos las / / blang med dor ba med sogs dang / / zhes gsungs so / / dang po ni ming la sogs pa yongs su len pa'o /
anugraho 'vikalpanam / ayamaparigrahārthaḥ / atyāga eva atyāgatā / ayamanutsargārthaḥ / bodhisattvāḥ parigṛṇhanti / bhagavatī tān parigrāhayatīti samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
# blang med ni rnam par rtog pa'i blang ba med pa'i don to / / dor ba med pa nyid ni dor ba med pa'o / / 'di ni dor ba med pa'i don to / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su len par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma de yongs su len par byed do / / de ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o /
śakreṇa prastāvakatvādupalakṣitaḥ parivartaḥ śakraparivartaḥ
# brgya byin gyi skabs yin pa'i phyir des rjes su mtshon pa'i le'u ni brgya byin gyi le'u'o /
āryāṣṭasāhastrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāṃ dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ / 3. aprameyaguṇadhāraṇapāramitāstūpasatkāro nāma tṛtīyaḥ / 'maitryādi' iti śāstram / maitrī karuṇāmuditopekṣāścatvāryapramāṇāni maitryādi / tadātmakaṃ darśanamaṣṭamaḥ kṣaṇa ityarthaḥ
# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u gnyis po'o / / bstan bcos las / / byams pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang tshad med pa bzhi po de dag ni byams pa la sogs pa'o / / de dag ni bdag med nyid mthong na ni skad cig ma brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
taddeśanā nidānam / atha khalu bhagavānityādinā āmantrayate smetyetadantena saṃgītikāra āha
# de dag ston pa'i gleng gzhi ni de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes zhes bya ba nas bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sdud pa pos smras pa yin no /
sākṣīkaraṇamaṣṭame kṣaṇe hīnayānapatanapratipakṣagauravātiśayotpādanāya
# skad cig ma brgyad pa mngon sum du bya ba la theg pa dman par ltung ba'i gnyen po la lhag par gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyis /
tameva kṣaṇam / bhagavānāha / yo hītyādinā prajñāpāramitāmiti prakaraṇāddarśanakṣaṇaḥ
# lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni skabs kyi mthong ba'i skabs kyi mthong ba'i skad cig ma'i shes rab bo /
prajñā saiva pāraṃgateti pāramitā / kasya pāram? hīnayānapatanabhūmeḥ / kā cāsau? yā catur(rṇāṃ) apramāṇātmakaṃ darśanam
# de nyid kyi pha rol tu son pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o / / gang gi pha rol zhes na / / theg pa dman par ltung ba'i sa'i'o / / de yang gang yin zhe na / / tshad med pa bzhi'i bdag nyid mthong ba'o /
tathāhi tatprāpto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣvātmasamatādarśī tānaśaraṇān hitvā nātmanaḥ kevalasya hitamīhate yena hīnayāne nipatet
# de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de dag thob na de sems can thams cad la bdag dang mnyam pa nyid du mthong nas skyabs kyi 'os su gyur pa yin te / / bdag nyid kho na la phan par spyod pa ni ma yin no /
tasmānmaitryādirūpaṃ darśanamatra prajñāpāramitā
# theg pa sman pa gang du ltung ba la byams pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo mthong tsam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
saiva cāṣṭamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ / tāṃ yaḥ kaścid grahīṣyati yāvat paryavāpsyati sākṣātkaraṇāt
# de nyid skad cig ma brgyad pa'o / / gang la la de 'dzin tam zhes bya ba nas kun chub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni mngon sum du byed pas so /
pravartayiṣyatīti parebhyaḥ prakāśitāyāstasyāstairudgrahaṇāt / yāvatpravartanāt
# rab tu 'don par byed na zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag la rab tu 'don pa'i phyir des de 'dzin pas na rab tu 'don par byed na / / zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
na tasyetyādiranuśaṃstaḥ (saḥ) pravartayiṣyatīti yāvat / iti samudaye anvayajñānam / 'śūnyatāvyāptiḥ' iti śāstram / ṣoḍaśānāṃ śūnyatānāṃ darśanena yā vyāptiḥ sarvāsāṃ darśanaṃ sa navamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ ityarthaḥ / tamāha / na ca khalvityādinā
# de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'don par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni phan yon bstan te / / de ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'o / / bstan bcos las stong nyid thob pa ni stong pa nyid bcu drug gis mthong bas gang thob pa'i thabs kyis mthong ba de ni skad cig ma dgu pa'i don to / / de yang lha'i bu dag kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo zhes bya ba nas / / mi 'byung mi skye zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so /
(RSt_34) ihāpi darśanakṣaṇaḥ prajñāpāraṃgateti pāramitā
# 'dir yang mthong ba'i skad cig 'di la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na /
kasya pāram? śūnyatānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāmapi
# stong pa nyid bcu drug po 'di dag mthong bas so /
tāsāṃ darśanāt / atrānuśaṃsaḥ / ādvitīyādatha / khalu śabdāt
# 'dir phan yon ni de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba gnyis pa'i sgra'i dbang du byas pas so / / bkab pa med pa'i phyogs ni bla gab med pa'o /
acchannaḥ pradeśo avakāśaḥ / nipannaḥ śayitaḥ
# nyal ba ni gnyid log pa'o / / 'byung ba ni rgyun gyis 'jug pa'o /
bhaviṣyati prabandhena pravakṣyati / rakṣāvaraṇasahitā guptiḥ / tatra śastrādinā rakṣā rakṣaniyogādāvaraṇam / svayamupasaṃkramya tasyādhiṣṭhānāt guptiḥ / athavā śarīrasya sarvasukhopasaṃharaṇaṃ rakṣā
# bsung ba dang bskyab pa dang lhan cig pa'i sba ba ni bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang spa ba'o; / / sngags la sogs pas ni bsung ba'o / / gzhan la bsgo bas ni bskyab pa'o / / rang nyid nye bar songs nas byin gyis rlob pa ni sba ba'o / / yang na lus kyis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sbyor ba ni bsrung ba'o /
bāhyopakramanivāraṇamāvaraṇam / ādhyātmikarogādinivāraṇaṃ guptiḥ
# phyi rol gyi nye bar 'tshe ba bzlog pa ni bskyab pa'o / / nang gi nad la sogs pa bzlog pa ni sba ba'o /
teṣāṃ saṃvidhānaṃ samyak prayogo vā vā manasā vā / iti nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ / 'buddhatvasya parigrahaḥ' iti / buddhasya bhāvo buddhatvam / yena buddho bhavati tasya parigrahalakṣaṇaḥ prabhāsvarasamādhidhāraṇāsampat
# de dag bya ba ni tshig gam yid kyis yang dag par sbyor ba'o / / de ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o / / sangs rgyas nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba ste sangs rgyas kyi dngos po ni sangs rgyas nyid do / / gang gis sangs rgyas su gyur pa des yongs su bzung ba ste / / mtshan dang 'od dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am /
abuddhakeṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu buddharūpasyātmanaḥ saṃdarśanam
# sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku'i bdag nyid ston pa'o /
tamāha / atha khalu śakra ityādinā / imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmitiṃ darśanakṣaṇam
# de nyid de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu pa'o /
imān guṇāniti lakṣaṇasampadādīn
# yon tan 'di zhes bya ba ni mtshan phun sums tshogs pa la sogs pa'o /
iyata ityabhyunnatān / dṛṣṭadhārmikāniti dṛṣṭo dharmaḥ prāptaṃ janma / tatrabhavān
# 'di dag ces bya ba ni mngon par mthong ba rnams so / / mthong ba'i chos zhes bya ba ni skye bas thob pa ste de la yod pa'o /
pratilabhata ityuddeśaḥ / parigṛṇhātīti nirdeśaḥ / iti nirodhe dharmajñānam / 'sarvasya vyavadānasya' ityekādaśaḥ
# 'thob pa ni bstan pa'o / / yongs su 'jig pa ni rjes su bstan pa'o / / de ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'o / / rnam par byang ba kun zhes bya bas ni skad cig ma bcu gcig bstan te /
vyavadāyantyaneneti vyavadānam
# 'dis rnam par byang bar byed pas na rnam par byang ba yin te /
dānapāramitādi / tasya sarvasya parigrahaḥ
# sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba yin te /
tamāha / kiṃ punarityādinā punaraparamityataḥ prāk / iti nirodhe anvayajñānakṣāntiḥ / 'sarvādhivyādhiśātanaṃ' iti / ādhayo vyasanāni
# de bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das yang ci zhes bya ba nas koo shi ka gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te / / de ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o / / nyam nga ba dang nad kun sel / / zhes bya ba la nyam nga ba ni phongs pa'o /
tīrthikairābhimānikaiśca saha vigrahavivādani(vi)rodhāsteṣāṃ śātanam
# mu stegs can dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dang lhan cig rtsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa de dag sel ba'o /
tathā ca tacchatanaṃ yathā teṣāṃ paścāttata imāṃ śrutavatāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ kleśadurgatisaṃsārāruyā vyādhayaḥ kṣīyante
# de bzhin du de ji ltar bsal nas de yang 'di thos pa dang theg pa gsum gyi nyon mongs pa dang ngan song dang 'khor ba'i nad rnams zad par 'gyur te / / de ba na /
