# byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing de las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skye'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / de'i 'og tu dka' ba'i 'du shes kyi gnyen po de lta ji ltar so sor brtag par bya ba de ni chos thams cad 'phags pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba nas / / khong khro ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so / / de la dang po sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la sogs par dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir / / chos thams cad 'phags pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / chos thams cad ni sems can tha snyad du gdags pa'i yul te / / 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'o / / gang gi phyir rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid tsam yin pa'i phyir ro / / khur mi khyer ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir khur mi khyer ba'o /
sattvavinayāya daśadigbuddhakṣetragamanena duṣkarasaṃjñānirāsāyāha
# sems can gdul bar bya ba'i don du phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na / / dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ adeśāpradeśata iti
# chos thams cad yul med cing phyogs med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
adeśatvācca prakṛtisvabhāvata iti / rūpādīnāṃ pratistasyāḥ svabhāvataḥ / na hi tasyādeśo 'patanadharmatvāt / nāpi pradeśo niraṃśatvādākāśavat
# yul med pa'i phyir dang phyogs med pa'i phyir ro / / rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de ni de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid de / / de ni yul na med de / / gnas pa med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / phyogs kyang med de / / cha med pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no /
saṃsārasukhe dustyajasaṃjñānirāsāyāha / sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ nirodhe prahalādanatvaṃ sukhasaṃjñotpādanatvaṃ tataḥ prajñāpāramitānugantavyā
# 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang bar dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir gsungs pa ni 'khor ba'i chos thams cad 'gag pa na rab tu sim par byed pa nyid kyis bde ba'i 'du shes skyed pa nyid de / / de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o /
"anityā vata saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇaḥ / utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukhamiti / itiśabdaḥ śrāvakavinayanasamāptyarthaḥ
# kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag / / skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin / / skyes nas 'gag par 'gyur ba ste / / de dag myur du zhi ba bde / / zhes pa'o / / 'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba rdzogs pa'i don to /
bodhisattvavinayanamadhikṛtyāha
# byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'i dbang du byas nas /
aratyaviratita iti / ratiratyantamutkaṇṭhā nirvāṇe / tadabhāvo bodhisattvānāṃ aratiḥ / viratiratyantamudvegaḥ saṃsāre
# dga' ba med cing dga' ba dang bral ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te / / dga' ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la shin tu dga' ba'o / / dga' ba dang bral ba ni shin tu 'khor ba la skyo ba'o /
tadabhāvo bodhisattvānāmarati
# de med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba dang bral ba med pa'o /
tābhyāṃ prajñāpāramitā / iti saṃsāranirvāṇāpratiṣṭhānāya pratyavekṣā
# de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa ste / / 'di ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i so sor rtog pa'o /
araktāviraktatayetyādinā vairāgyāya pratyavekṣā / sarvadharmā aśa(sa)ktā ityanabhiniviṣṭāḥ
# 'dod chags med ces bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la so sor rtog pa'o / / chos thams cad la chags pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni mngon par ma zhen pa'o /
saṅgāsaṅgā saṅgatatpratipakṣau / tadvigatāstayoranupalambhāditi vikalpaprahāṇāya pratyavekṣā
# chags pa dang ma chags pa dang de'i gnyen po de dang bral ba dang gsum mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par rtog pa spang ba la so sor rtog pa'o /
sarvadharmāḥ sarvamārgāḥ saptābhisamayāḥ
# chos thams cad ni lam thams cad de / / mngon par rtogs pa bdun no /
ta eva bodhiḥ / bodhiprāpakatvāt / ata evāha / bodhiḥ / buddhajñānāvabodhanatayeti / avabodhana prāpaṇa iti bodhiḥ / sulabhāvabodhanāya pratyavekṣā
# de nyid byang chub ste / / byang chub thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pa zhes gsungs te / / khong du chud pa ni thob pa ste / / de ni byang chub ste / / legs par rtogs pa thob pa la so sor rtog pa'o / / rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad de /
sarvadharmāsvalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt / te śūnyānimittāpraṇihitā vijñānamātratvenārthavirahāt sarvanimittāstamayāt / bhrāntiśarīre traidhātukapraṇidhānābhāvācca yathākramam
# de ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ste / / rnam par rig pa tsam nyid kyi don dang bral ba'i phyir dang mtshan ma thams cad nub pa'i phyir dang 'khrul pa'i ngo bo'i khams gsum pa la smon pa med pa nyid kyi phyir te go rims bzhin no /
iti mārgasaṃkṣepaḥ / (RSt_169)
# 'di ni lam la so sor rtog pa'o /
yadi vimokṣamukhānyapi teṣāṃ mārgastadā tāni bhāvayanto hīnabodhau pateyuḥ
# gal te de dag rnam par thar ba'i sgo'i lam la'ang sgom pa de'i tshe 'ang dman pa'i byang chub tu ltung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
ityata āha / sarvatyādi / sarvadharmāḥ sarvabodhisattvamārgāḥ / bhaiṣajyamiti hīnayānaspṛhāmahāvyādhiharāḥ
# de'i phyir byams pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam thams cad do / / sman zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa la dga' ba'i nad chen po sel ba'o /
kuta ityāha / maitrīpūrvaṅgamatayeti / yato maitrī teṣāṃ puraḥsarī
# gang gis she na / / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / gang gi phyir byams pa chen po ni de dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'o /
api ca / sarvacaturbhirapramāṇaiḥ saha viharaṇāt matrīvihāriṇaḥ
# gzhan yang de dag tshad med pa bzhi dang lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'o /
brahmabhūtā iti brahmaṇā tulyāḥ
# tshangs pa lta bur gyur ba zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'o /
tadvadeva doṣānutpādanādityuddeśaḥ / sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti nirdeśaḥ
# de bzhin du zhe sdang mi len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o / / zhe sdang thams cad mi len pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'o /
sarvadoṣā maitryādīnāṃ vipakṣo yathākramaṃ vyāpādo vihiṃsā aratiḥ pratighānunayau ca
# zhe sdang thams cad byams pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs te / / go rims bzhin du gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang mi dga' ba dang khong khro ba dang rjes su chags pa'o /
apraṇihitata iti nirvānotkaṇṭhāvirahāt
# smon pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la dga' ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
apratihatita iti saṃsāre atyantānudvegāt / iti trayodaśavidho 'pūrvābhisamayaḥ sānuṣaṅgaḥ
# khong khro ba med pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba la shin tu skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro / / 'di ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa bcu gsum phan yon dang bcas pa'o / / skad cig ma'i gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs par brjod par bya ste /
ekakṣaṇābhisamayo vaktavyāḥ / ekakṣaṇābhisambodho lakṣaṇena caturvidhaḥ / iti yaḥ pūrvamuddiṣṭaḥ sa kathaṃ caturvidhaḥ? sarvānāśravadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ / vipākajasarvasāśravānāśravadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ / alakṣaṇasarvadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ / advayasarvadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaśceti / tatra prathamamadhikṛtya śāstram- / [169] anāśravāṇāṃ sarveṣāmekakenāpi saṃgrahāt / ekakṣaṇāvabodho 'yaṃ jñeyo dānādinā muneḥ / [170] araghaṭṭaṃ yathaikāpi padikā puruṣeritā / sakṛtsarva calayati jñānamekakṣaṇe tathā / prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya 'ekaikenāpi dānādinā' cittakṣaṇena pravṛttena 'sarveṣāṃ' anāśravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ 'saṅgrahāt' ākṣepāt 'ekṣaṇāvabodhaḥ' ekacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ / 'ayaṃ' iti prathamaḥ / tathā hi 'yathaikāpi pari(da)kā' 'puruṣapreritā sarvamaraghaṭaṃ(ṭṭaṃ) sakṛccalayati' tathaikapadamapi dānādicittaṃ prayuktaṃ sarvamanāśravadharmasandohaṃ sakṛdevākarṣayatītyarthaḥ / ataḥ sūtraṃ samudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti / atra prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītatvāt, sarvākārajñatā manasikārāvirahitatvācca
# skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub / / mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi / / zhes bya ba la chos thams cad zag pa med pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa dang chos thams cad gnyis su med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa'o / / de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las / / sbyin la sogs pa re res kyang / / zag med chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir / / thub pa'i skad cig gcig pa yi / / rtogs par 'di ni shes par bya / / ji ltar skyes bus zo chun rgyud / / rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na / / thams cad cig car 'gul ba ltar / / skad cig gcig shes de bzhin no / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni / / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis 'jug pa na sbyin pa la sogs pa re res kyang / / zag pa med pa'i chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir te / / 'dren pa'i phyir ro / / skad cig ma gcig pa'i rtogs pa ste / / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa'o / / 'di ni zhes bya ba dang po'o / / de ltar na ji ltar skyes bus rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na / / zo chun gyi rgyud thams cad cig car 'gul ba de bzhin du / / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni / / zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi tshogs cig car 'dren par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to / / de'i phyir med las / / rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te / / 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir dang de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir zab cing rgya che ba ste /
gambhīrodāra ekaiko dānādicittakṣaṇaḥ (RSt_170) prajñāpāramitetyucyate
# sbyin pa la sogs pa re re'i sems kyi skad cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do /
tasyāparyantatā anāśravadharmākarṣakatvam
# de'i mu med pa ni mu med pa ste / / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams 'dren pa nyid de /
teṣāmanyonyasambandhasya cirapariśīlitatvāt sānugantavyā veditavyā
# de dag phan tshun 'brel pa ni yin ring du yongs su 'dren pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / de rjes su rig par bya ba ni shes par bya'o /
kathamityāha / samudrāparyantatayeti
# de ji ltar zhe na / / rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
gambhīrodārasya samudrasyāparyantatā sakṛdaparyantanimnagājalākarṣakatvam
# zab cing rgya che ba'i rgya mtsho ni mu med de / / mu med pa ni cig car chu bo'i chu 'dren pa de nyid de /
tāsāṃ parasparasaṃsargāt / tayā samudrāparyantatayā upamayā / tadvadityarthaḥ
# de dag phan tshun 'dren pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / rgya mtsho mu med pa'i dpe des de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to /
iti sarvānāśravadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ
# 'di ni zag pa med pa'i chos sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ste dang po'i /
dvitīyamadhikṛtya śāstram-
# gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
[171] vipākadharmatāvasthā sarvaśuklamayī yadā
# gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi / / rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin /
prajñāpāramitā jātā jñānamekakṣaṇe tadā
# rnam smin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes / / de yi skad cig gcig ye shes / / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
vipākajo dharmo vipākadharmastabhdāvastattāsāṃ 'avasthā' asyā iti yathoktā prajñāpāramitā / 'sarvaśuklamayī' iti sarve kuśalā dharmāḥ sāśravā anāśravāḥ / ye purvamanena niḥsvabhāvatayā bhāvitāste paścādvipākajāḥ
# rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos ni rnam smin gyi chos so / / de'i dngos po ni de nyid do / / de'i gnas skabs 'del yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o / / chos dkar thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang / / gang dag zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad 'dis sngon ngo bo nyid med par bsgoms pas / / de dag kyang phyis rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'o /
ataḥ prakṛtyaiva teṣāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyasaṃvedinī
# des na rang bzhin nyid kyis de dag ngo bo nyid med par yang dag par rig ste /
tasmātsarvaśuklamayī
# de'i phyir dkar po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no /
īdṛśī sā yadā 'jātā' sampannā 'tadā' 'jñānaṃ' cittaṃ 'ekakṣaṇe ' teṣu sarveṣvanābhogena / anāśraveṣu sarveṣu sābhogaḥ prathamaḥ / ayaṃ tu dvitīyaḥ sāśravānāśravanirābhogaśca / ataḥ sūtram / gaganāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti / prajñāpāramitāyāḥ vipākadharmatāvasthā sarvaśuklamayī ca
# 'di lta bu de gang gi tshe skyes pa ni phun gsum tshogs pa ste / / de'i tshe sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis de dag thams cad la lhun gyis grub par shes so / / zag pa med pa thams cad la 'bad pa dang bcas pa 'di ni dang po'o / / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa la lhun gyis grub pa ni gnyis pa ste / / de'i phyir mdo las / / nam mkha' mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni gang rnam par smin pa'i chos nyid kyi gnas skabs dang dkar po'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin no /
ata evāparyantatā / teṣu sarveṣu bhāvābhāvaikarasā
# de nyid kyi phyir mu med pa ni de dag thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid med par ro gcig pa'o /
nirābhogaśca vipākajatvāt / tasyā aparyantatā veditavyā / kathamityāha
# lhun gyis grub pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir te / / de'i mu med pa nyid du rig par bya'o / / ji ltar zhe na /
gaganāparyantatayā dṛṣṭānteneti / gaganamākāśam
# nam mkha' mu med pa nyid kyi dpes gsungs so / / nam mkha' ni nam mkha' ste /
tacca rūpidravyābhāvaikarasamaparyantaṃ nirābhogaṃ ca parispandābhāvāt
# de'i gzugs kyi rdzas kyi dngos po med par gcig pa'o / / mu med pa ni lhun gyis grub pa ste / / g yo ba med pa'o /
ata ubhayorapi aparyantatā sadṛśīti vipākajasarvaśukladharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayo dvitīyaḥ
# de'i phyir gnyi ga mu med pa ji lta bu 'di ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dkar po'i chos thams cad sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni gnyis pa'o /
tṛtīyamadhikṛtya śāstram- / [172] svapnopameṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā dānādivaryavā
# gsungs pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las / / sbyin la sogs pa'i spyod pa yis / / chos kun rmi lam 'drar gnas nas /
alakṣaṇatvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇenaikena vindati
# chas rnams mtshan nyid med pa nyid / / skad cig ma ni gcig gis rtogs / / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
'svapnopameṣu dhāvadgandharvanagaropameṣu" iti mahatyorbhagavatyoḥ paṭhyate
# rmi lam lta bu zhes bya ba nas / / dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i bar ni yum chen mo / / las gsungs pa /
śāstre tvekameva padaṃ sarveṣāmekārthatvāt
# bstan bcos las / / tshig gcig smos pa ni thams cad gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
sa punarartho vicitrairapi lakṣaṇaiḥ pratibhāsamānānāmeṣāṃ yathālakṣaṇamasattvādalakṣaṇatā
# de yang don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so / / 'di dag so sor snang ba ni ji lta bu'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'o /
tato māyopamatvādalakṣaṇeṣu sarvadharmeṣu 'sthitvā' ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayan 'sarvadharmāṇāmalakṣaṇatvamekakakṣaṇenaiva 'vindati' jānāti
# des na sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa la gnas nas / / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs shing shes te /
dhātūnāmekārthatvena vindaterjñānavṛtteḥ / etadāha / meruvicitrayā prajñāpāramitāvicitratānugantavyeti
# khams kyi don ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyis na rtogs pa'i don ni shes pa la 'jug go / / 'di ltar ri rab sna tshogs pa'i phyir / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid du rjes su rig par bya'o /
māyopameṣu (RSt_171) sarvadharmeṣvalakṣaṇatvena yadekarasaṃ jñānaṃ seha prajñāpāramitā
# sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par gang ro gcig par shes pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
atastasyā ekarasatvepi māyopamaiḥ sarvadharmapratibhāsairyā vicitratā sā meruvicitratayā dṛṣṭāntena veditavyā
# de'i phyir ro gcig pa yin yang gang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba 'di ni ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid kyi dpes rig par bya'o /
yathā hyākāśasya nīrūpatvādasatī meruṇā vicitratāvabhāti
# ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin yang / / ri rab kyi rnam pa sna tshogs su bstan te /
merupārśvānāṃ caturvarṇānāṃ dikṣu tatsarvavarṇatayā prakhyānāt
# ri rab kyi logs bzhi'i kha dog gi phyogs kyang de dang 'dra ba'i kha dog tu snang ste / / de ni de bzhin no /
tathā tasyā ityalakṣaṇasarvadharmaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayastṛtīyaḥ
# chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni gsum pa'o /
caturthamadhikṛtya śāstram-
# bzhi pa'i dbang du byas nas /
[173] svapnaṃ taddarśinaṃ caiva dvayayogādanīkṣakaḥ / dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvaṃ kṣaṇenakena paśyati / 'snanaṃ taddarśinaṃ caiva' iti kudyoge kathaṃ dvitīyā? kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ / athavā / anīkṣiteti tṛn paṭhitavyaḥ / tṛtīye sarvadharmāṇāṃ svapnamāyopamairākārairvicitraḥ pratibhāsaḥ / caturthe tu teṣāmastamayāccharanmadhyānhagaganasamo vigatasamastaviplavaḥ / tatra svapnadṛśyaṃ narakacittaraṅgādisvapnaḥ / taddarśī ātmaiva tayorastamayāt / yastau vikṛte(tau) 'yogena' [a]bhedena so 'dvayaṃ' grāhyagrāhakaśūnyaṃ 'dharmāṇāṃ tattva' paramārthaṃ 'ekakṣaṇenaiva paśyati' / enamāha / rūpāparyantatayetyādinā / iha caturtha ekakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ / prajñāpāramitā tasyā aparyantatā / sarvadharmaparamārthasya kevalasya kevalavimalanabhonibhasya tena saṃvedanāt / sā veditavyā / kathamityāha / rūpādīnāmaparyantayeti / kathaṃ teṣāmaparyantatā? dvayapratibhāsāstamayāt
# bstan bcos las / / rmi lam dang ni de mthong nyid / / gnyis kyi tshul du mi mthong ltar / / chos rnams gnyis su med pa yi / / de nyid skad cig gcig gis mthong / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / gsum pa la ni chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par so sor snang ba'o / / bzhi pa la ni de dag nub pa'i phyir / / ston ka'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bslad pa thams cad dang bral ba'o / / de la rmi lam du mthong ba ni mi dang glang po dang rta la sogs pa ste / / rmi lam mo / / de mthong ba ni bdag nyid kyis so / / de dag nub pa'i phyir gang de dag mi mthong ba ni gnyis kyi tshul du tha dad pa med pa'o / / de ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis med pa'i stong pa ste / / chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid don dam pa skad cig ma gcig gis mthong ba'o / / de nyid gzugs mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa bzhi pa'o / / de'i mu med pa nyid ni chos thams cad don dam pa dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' kho na ltar des yang dag par rig pas na / / de rig par bya'o / / ji ltar zhe na / / gzugs la sogs pa mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so / / ji ltar de dag mu med pa yin zhe na / / gnyis su snang ba nub pa'i phyir te /
yāvatkhalu dvayaṃ tāvatparyantaḥ parimitatvāt / nanu rūpatadgrāhakayorastamayenāpi paryantatā? ka āha rūpasyaiveti? kintarhi? rūpasya yāvadvijñānasya
# ji srid du 'di mu yod pa de srid du ni gzhan gyi mtshan ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / gzugs dang de'i 'dzin pa dag nub kyang mu med pa ma yin te / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / gzugs nyid ces gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na / / de lta mod kyi 'on kyang gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gsungs pas so /
nanu tathāpi grāhakasyāstamayo nokta iti cet / na tasyāpi skandhaireva saṃgrahāt
# de lta mod kyi 'dzin pa zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na / / ma yin te der yang phung po nyid bsdus pa'i phyir te /
aprakāśātmano grāhakatvāyogāditi sarvadharmādvayatattvaikacittakṣaṇābhisamayaścaturthaḥ
# snang ba med par 'dzin pa'i bdag mi rigs pa'i phyir ro / / chos thams cad gnyis su med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni bzhi pa'o /
ekakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ saptamo 'bhisamayaḥ
# skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ste bdun pa'o /
aṣṭamo 'bhisamayo dharmakāyaḥ / tasya catvāri vastūni
# mngon par rtogs pa brgyad pa ni chos kyi sku'o / / de'i dngos po yang bzhi ste /
trayaḥ kāyāḥ kāritraṃ ca / tathāhi pūrvamuddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ-
# sku gsum dang mdzad pa'o / / de ltar sngar / / ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang /
(RSt_172) / [174] sdābhāvikaḥ sasāṃbhogo nairmāṇika iti tridhā / dharmakāyaḥ sakāritraścaturdhā samudīritaḥ / iti
# de bzhin gzhan ni sprul ba dang / / chos sku mdzad par bcas pa ste / / rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod / / ces gang gsungs pa'o /
dharmo mārgaḥ
# chos ni lam ste /
sa ceha prakarṣagateḥ prakaraṇācca saptābhisamayalakṣaṇo gṛhyate
# de yang 'dir khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir / / skabs kyi mngon par rtogs pa bdun gyi mtshan nyid do /
dharmalabhyaḥ kāyo 'dharmakāyaḥ' / kāyaḥ śarīram / trīṇi śarīrāṇi buddhānāṃ trayaḥ kāyāḥ
# de na chos kyis thob pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku ste / / sku ni lus so / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi lus gsum ni sku gsum mo / / bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo las rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa /
uktaṃ hi mahatyorbhagavatyoḥ- "sarvākārapariśuddhānāmanāśravāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yā prakṛtiḥ sa tathāgato 'rhansamyaksambuddho veditavyaḥ / punaraparaṃ teṣāmeva dharmāṇāmadhigamādanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya dvātriṃśatā lakṣaṇairaśītyānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtakāyastathāgato 'rhansamyaksambuddho bodhisattvānāṃ paramaṃ mahāyānadharmamanuttararatiprītiprāmodyasukhopabhogāya deśayati / punaraparaṃ teṣāmeva sarvadharmāṇāmadhigamādanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya tathāgato 'rhansamyaksambuddho daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvakālaṃ nānānirmāṇameghena sarvasattvānāmarthaṃ karoti" iti / uktaṃ ca sūtrālaṃkāre- / "tribhiḥ kāyaiśca vijñeyo buddhānāṃ kāyasaṅgrahaḥ
# zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni / / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su rig par bya'o / / gzhan yang chos de dag nyid rtogs pas / / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir / / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sku / / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la theg pa'i mchog gi chos bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba dang rab tu dga' ba'i bde ba la longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to / / gzhan yang chos de dag nyid rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dus thams cad du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do zhes gsungs so / / mdo sde rgyan las / / sku gsum dag gis sangs rgyas kyi / / sku bsdus par ni shes bya ste /
sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho 'yaṃ tribhiḥ kāyairnidarśitaḥ"
# sku gsung dag gis rang gzhan gyi / / don 'di rten dang bcas par bstan /
iti / tasmāt tribhireva kāyaiḥ kāritreṇa ca paricchedena caturdhā dharmakāya uktaḥ / tatra svabhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ / svabhāva eva 'svābhāvikaḥ' / vinayādibhyaṣṭhagiti svārthe ṭhak / athavā tasminneva svabhāve bhavo viśuddhaḥ paraḥ prakarṣaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ / sambhogāya prabhavatīti 'sāmbhogikaḥ' / nirmāṇa nirmitiḥ / tena nirvṛttaḥ kāyo 'nairmāṇikaḥ' / tatra svābhāvikamadhikṛtya śāstram- / [175] sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye prāptā dharmā nirāśravāḥ / svābhāviko mataḥ kāyasteṣāṃ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ / teṣāṃ prakṛtidharmatā dharmadhātuḥ / nanu na dharmadhātustathāgato 'tiprasaṅgāt / kiṃ tarhi? dharmadhātuviśuddhiḥ / tathā coktamārya buddhabhūmisūtre- "pañcabhirākāraiḥ susamuditabuddhabhūmeḥ saṅgraho veditavyaḥ / katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? dharmadhātuviśuddhayā ādarśajñānena samatājñānena pratyavekṣaṇājñānena kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānena ca" iti / (RSt_173) / dharmadhātuviśuddhiḥ suviśuddho dharmadhātuḥ
# zhes gsungs so / / de bas na sku gsum dang mdzad pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ni chos kyi sku bstan te / / de la ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin te ngo bo nyid kho na ngo bo nyid do / / yang na de nyid la ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba'i rnam par dag pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o / / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i don du 'gyur ba yin pas / / longs spyod rdzogs bcas so / / sprul pa ni sprul pa'o / / der grub pa'i sku ni sprul pa nyid do / / de la ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i dbang du byas nas / / bstan bcos las / / thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni / / zag pa med pa'i chos skun du / / rnam par dag gyur gang dag yin / / de dag rang bzhin mtshan nyid can / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / de dag gi rang bzhin ni chos nyid de / / chos kyi dbyings so / / chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin te / / shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / 'on kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yin te / / de ltar yang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das sangs rgyas kyis ni rnam pa lngas bsdus te / / lnga gang zhe na / / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang me long lta bu'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes yin no zhes gsungs so zhe na / / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa ste /
suviśuddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti nārthabhedaḥ kaścit
# chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang chos nyid tha dad pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro /
ataḥ sūtram / sūryaraśmimaṇḍalāparyantāvabhāsanatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantāvabhāsanatānugantavyeti
# de'i phyir mdo las nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med par snang ba'i phyir / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
sarva eva trāsādidoṣarahitāḥ sphāṭikāḥ śuddhāḥ
# skrag pa nyid la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs pa ni shel dag pa lta bu'o /
tatra candrasūryābhyāmanye śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vimuktikāyasyopamāḥ
# de la zla ba dang nyi ma dag las gzhan pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku'i dpe'o /
sūryācandramasāvapi śuddhasphāṭikau / tayoretadadhikaṃ yattau daśadigvyāpiraśmijālaṃ janayataḥ / tatastāvanantajñeyaviṣayamanantaṃ jñānamutpādayato buddhānāṃ vimuktikāyasyopamāne
# zla ba dang nyi ma shel sgong dag pa lta bu de dag pas 'di lhag pa yin te / / gang gi phyir phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba spros pa des shes bya'i yul mtha' yas pa dag la shes pa mtha' yas pa skyed pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku'i dpe'o /
ata evāsau dharmakāya ityabhidhīyate / anantadharmāśrayatvāt / tadiha dharmadhātuviśuddhijamanantaṃ jñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā
# de nyid kyi phyir de ni chos kyi sku zhes kyang brjod de / / gang gi phyir chos mtha' yas pa brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / de ni 'dir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa las skyes ba'i ye shes mtha' yas pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
tasyā aparyantajñeyāvabhāsanatā veditavyā sūryaraśmimaṇḍalāparyantāvabhāsanatayā dṛṣṭāntena / tathā hi buddhadharmāṇāṃ suviśuddho dharmadhātuḥ sūryavat / tajjā prajñā prajñapāramitā sūryaraśmiṇḍalavat / tayā yadaparyantāvabhāsanaṃ tadraviraśmimaṇḍalenāparyantāvabhāsanavat
# nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpes de ni shes bya mu med pa la snang bar rig par bya'o / / de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings te / / nyi ma dang 'dra'o / / de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te / / nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o / / gang des mu med par snang ba de la 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med par snang ba dang 'dra'o /
tadanena buddhānāṃ suviśuddho dharmadhātuḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyastasya ca sarvatra jñeye jñānavaśitā darśitā / tasyaiva sattvārthavaśitāṃ vyāpinityatvaṃ cādhikṛtya śāstram- / [176] paripākaṃ gate hetau yasya yasya yadā yadā / hitaṃ bhavati kartavyaṃ prathate tasya tasya saḥ
# de la 'dis ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o / / de yang shes bya thams cad la shes pa dbang du bya ba dang de nyid sems can gyi don dbang du byed pa dang khyab par byed pa dang rtag pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas / / bstan bcos las / / rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas / / gang dang gang la gang dang ni / / gang tshe bya ba phan 'gyur ba / / de dang de la de snang de /
[177] varṣatyapi hi parjanye naivābījaṃ prarohati
# lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang / / sa bon mi rung mi 'khrungs ltar /
samutpādepi buddhānāṃ nābhavyo bhadramaśnute
# sangs rgyas rnams ni byon gyur kyang / / skal ba med pas bzang mi myong /
[178] iti kāritravaipulyādbuddho vyāpī nirucyate
# de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir / / sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod /
akṣayatvācca tasyaiva nitya ityapi kathyate / 'saḥ' iti svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ / 'prathate ' nirmāṇaprathanāt / tadā tadeti gamyate 'yadā yadā' iti vacanāt / tasya hitasya karaṇāyetyarthādgamyate / tasmāttadā tadaivetyata āha / 'varṣatyapi' ityādi / 'iti' ityādi / 'kāritravaipulyaṃ' sarvabhavyeṣu kāritram / tasyaiva' iti kāritrasya / iti svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ / sāmbhogikasya kāyasya bahuvaktavyam / tatra sambhogamadhikṛtyāha
# de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir / / rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / de zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o / / snang ngo zhes bya ba ni sprul pa ste bsod nams las so / / gang dang gang zhes bya ba ni de dang de dag ces bya bar rtogs par bya ba'o / / de dang de zhes bya bas ni phan par byed pa zhes don gyis rtogs par bya'o / / ci'i phyir de dang de la zhes gsungs she na / / lha'i rgyal pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / mdzad pa rgya che ba ni skal ba dang ldan pa thams cad la mdzad pa'o / / de nyid kyi mdzad pa ste / / 'di nyid ni nyid kyi sku'o / / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la ni brjod par bya ba mang du yod de de la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /
sarvaśabdāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāpayantatānugantavyeti / śāsturdeśayataḥ śrṛṇvatāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ yaḥ paramamahāyānadharmasaṃbodhaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
# sgra thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te / / ston pas bstan nas / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mnyan te / / theg pa mchog gi chos yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o / / de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa ste /
sa eva sambhogaḥ sambhogakāraṇatvāt / yaḥ punastajjānāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrasaumanasyalakṣaṇānāṃ ratiprītiprāmodyānāṃ sukhasya cānubhavaḥ sa mukhyaḥ sambhogaḥ / tasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā aparyantatā veditavyā / kathamityāha
# longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / gang yang mkhas pa rnams kyi yid bde ba'i mtshan nyid chung du dang 'bring dang chen po ste / / dga' ba dang bde ba dang rab tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed pa de ni dngos kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'o / / de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o / / ji ltar zhe na /
sarvaśabdāpayantatayeti / (RSt_174) hetau tṛtīyā
# sgra thams cad mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gsum pa'o /
yatastayoḥ sambodhayoryathākramamaparyantā deśanāḥ śabdajanyā janakāśca te kathaṃ sarve? nānā vineyānurūpaiḥ sarvairākāraiḥ prathanāt
# gang gi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa de gnyis dang go rims bzhin du mu med par ston pa'i sgra dang bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed par sbyar ro / / thams cad ces ci'i phyir smes she na gdul bya rnams sna tshogs pa thams cad la snang ba'i phyir ro /
kathamaparyantāḥ? anidhanena tena kāyena deśanāyā niravadhikatvāt
# ji ltar mu med pa yin zhe na / / mtha' ma med par sku des ston pa la dus tshad med pa'i phyir ro /
tāthāgatasyāpi sambodhasyāparyantatā / kuta ityāha / savabuddhadharmasamudāgamāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā
# de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub kyang mu med pa nyid do / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so /
yathoktaḥ śāstureva mahāyānadharmasambodha iha prajñāpāramitā / tasyā aparyantatā
# ji skad du ston pa nyid kyis theg pa chen po'i mchog yang dag par rtags pa ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gsungs so / / de'i mu med pa ni de'i rgyu ste /
tatkāraṇasya sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ samudāgamasyāparyantatayetyarthaḥ
# sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
te punardharmā mahatyobhagavatyoḥ paṭhyante
# chos de yang bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo las gsungs te /
saptatriṃśabdodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ / aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ / navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ / daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni / aṣṭavabhibhvāyatanāni / araṇā samādhiḥ / praṇidhijñānam / catasraḥ pratisamvidaḥ / sarvākārāścatasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ / daśa vaśitāḥ / daśa balāni / catvāri vaiśāradyāni / trīṇyarakṣyāṇi / trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni / asaṃmoṣadharmatā / vāsanāsamudghātaḥ / mahākaruṇā / aṣṭādaśāveṇikāḥ buddhadharmāḥ / sarvākārajñatā ceti / ataḥ śāstram- / [179] bodhipakṣāpramāṇāni vimokṣāścānupūrveśaḥ / navātmikā samāpattiḥ kṛtsna daśavidhātmakam / [180] abhibhvāyatanānyaṣṭaprakārāṇi prabhedataḥ / araṇāpraṇidhijñānamabhijñāḥ pratisamvidaḥ / [181] sarvākārāścatasro 'tha śuddhayo vaśitā daśa / balāni daśa catvāri vaiśāradyānyarakṣaṇam / [182] trividhaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ tridhāsaṃmoṣadharmatā / vāsanāyāḥ samudghāto mahatī karuṇā jane / [183] āveṇikā munereva dharmā ye 'ṣṭādaśeritāḥ / sarvākārajñatā ceti dharmakāyo 'bhidhīyate / bodhipakṣyāścāpramāṇānīti dvandvaḥ / 'anupūrvaśa' iti / anupūrva pareṇa saṃbadhyate / 'arakṣaṇa' ityakaraṇīyarakṣaṇam / arakṣyamityarthaḥ / tat trividham / 'dharmakāya' iti / anāśravo buddhānāṃ dharmarāśiḥ / yathāvasaramasmābhirbahavo vyākhyātāḥ / śeṣāniha vyācakṣīmahi / 'aṣṭau vimokṣā' iti / rūpī rūpāṇi paśyati suvarṇadurvarṇāni nīlapītalohitāvadātānīti prathamo vimokṣaḥ / adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī rūpāṇi paśyati pūrvavaditi (RSt_175) dvitīyaḥ / śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ / ākāśānantyāyatanādivimokṣāścatvāraḥ / saṃjñāveditanirodho 'ṣṭamaḥ / āvaraṇādvimucyanta ebhiriti vimokṣāḥ
# byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang smon nas shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa bzhi dang dbang bcu dang stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang bsrung ba med pa gsum dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang thugs rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do / / de'i phyir bstan bcos las / / byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang / / rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni / / snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang / / zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang / / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni / / rab tu dbye ba rnam brgyad dang / / nyon mongs med par smon mkhyen dang / / mngon shes so sor yang dag rig / / rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang / / dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang / / mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang / / bsrung ba med pa rnam gsum dang / / dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang / / bsnyel ba mi mnga' chos nyid dang / / bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang / / skye la thugs rje chen po dang / / thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos / / bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang / / chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin / / zhes gsungs so / / byang chub kyi phyogs dang tshad med pa zhes zlas dbye bar bya'o / / mthar gyis zhes bya ba ni 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya'o / / bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba ma yin pa las bsrung ba'i phyir / / bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don te rnam pa gsum mo / / chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i chos kyi tshogs so / / skabs ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gis mang du bshad de lhag ma yang bdag gis bshad par bya'o / / rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba ni gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni kha dog bzang ba dang kha dog ngan pa dang sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o / / nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni snga ma bzhin te 'di ni gnyis pa'o / / sdug pa'i rnam par thar ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni gsum pa'o / / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi dang 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa zhes bya ba dang brgyad de / / 'di dag gis sgrib pa las rnam par grol bas na rnam par thar pa'o /
tatra trayo nirmāṇāvaraṇavimokṣāḥ
# de la gsum ni mya ngan las 'das pa la sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'o /
śeṣāḥ śāntavihārasamāpattyāvaraṇavimokṣāḥ / trayo rūpiṇaḥ
# lhag ma ni zhi bar gnas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'o /
pañcārūpiṇaḥ / paramapraśānto 'ṣṭamaḥ / rūpīti ātmani rūpasaṃjñī / paśyatīti adhimokṣanirmitāni manasā paśyati / adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī / ātmani nāmasaṃjñī / śubho vimokṣaḥ / śubhāśubhāni rūpāṇi nirmāya teṣvekatarasaṃjñālābhāt / yathākramamābhogaprātikūlyaprahāṇāya / saṃjñāveditānirodho 'sthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ kliṣṭamanaḥsaṃgṛhītānāṃ ca nirodhaḥ prāg vyutthānāt / aṣṭāvabhibhvāyatanāni / ālambanābhibhavanādabhibhūtāni āyatanāni cittasthitayo 'bhibhvāyatanānyaṣṭau / tatra prathamādvimokṣāt dve abhinirhriyete / dvitāyādapi dve / tṛtīyāccatvāri
# yang gsum ni gzugs can no / / lnga ni gzugs can ma yin pa'o / / brgyad pa ni sgrib pa rab tu zhi pa'o / / gzugs can ni bdag la gzugs su 'du shes pa'o / / lta ba ni yid kyis mos shing sprul nas lta ba'o / / sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ni sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i gzugs de dag sprul nas mi byed pa'i 'du shes thob pas go rims bzhin du mthun pa dang mi mthun pa spang ba'i phyir ro / / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni brgyad pa ste / / sems dang sems las 'byung ba nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyis bsdus pa sngar kun nas ldang ba las de 'gog pa'o / / dmigs pa'i sgom pa zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched sems la gnas pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de / / de dag ni brgyad do / / de la dang po'i rnam par thar pa las ni gnyis sgrub po / / gnyis pa las kyang gnyis so / / gsum pa las ni bzhi'o /
adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni hīnapraṇītāni
# nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu la kha dog ngan pa dang kha dog bzang po dang dman pa dang gya nom par lta ba'o /
tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānāti, abhibhūya paśyati, tathā saṃjñī ca bhavatīti prathamam / adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇāni yāvattathāsaṃjñī ca bhavatīti dvitīyam
# gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes shing / / de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni dang po'o / / nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen po la kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan par lta zhing de bzhin du shes par 'gyur pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī ca bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānītyādi tṛtīyam
# nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu la sogs par lta ba ni gsum pa'o /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇītyādi caturtham
# nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs la chen po la sogs par lta bu ni bzhi pa'o /
tṛtīyādvimokṣāccatvāryabhinirhriyante
# rnam par thar pa gsum pa las ni bzhi mngon par sgrub po /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇī paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni
# nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba ni sngon po / / kha dog sngon po / / sngon por ston pa / / sngon pa snang ba / / dper na zar ma'i me tog gam /
tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ sampannaṃ vārāṇaseyakaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nilanirbhāsam / tāni ca rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānāti, abhibhūya paśyati, tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavatīti pañcamam / evaṃ pītānītyādi / tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpamityadikaṃ ṣaṣṭham / evaṃ lohitānityādi / tadyathā bandhujīvapuṣpamityādi saptamam
# yul b'a r'a na s'i'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po / / kha dog sngon po / / sngon por ston pa / / sngon por snang ba de bzhin du / / gzugs de dag kyang zil gyis mnan nas / / de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur zhing lta ba 'di ni lnga pa'o / / de bzhin du ser po la sogs pa ni dper na dong ka'i mi tog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni drug pa'o / / de bzhin du dmar po la sogs pa ni dper na pan du dzi ba ka'i me tog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bdun pa'o /
evamavadātānītyādi
# de bzhin du dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
tadyathā uṣasi tārakārūpamityādi cāṣṭamam
# dper na skar ma pa ba sangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgyad pa'o /
tatra parīttāni sattvasakhyātāni svalpapramāṇatvāt
# de la chung du zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi grangs su ston pa yin te / / tshad chung ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
suvarṇadurvarṇāni śubhāśubhatvāt / hīnapraṇītāni bhaumadivyatvāt
# kha dog bzang po dang ngan pa ni sdug ba dang mi sdug pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / dman pa dang gya nom pa ni lha la yod pa dang mi la yod pa'o /
tāni vimokṣairadhimucyābhibhvāyatanairabhibhavati / punaḥ punarantarddhāpya darśanāt / abhibhūya jānāti śamathena paśyati vipaśyanayā tathāsaṃjñī bhavati nirabhimānatvāt
# rnam par thar pa de dag la mos par byas nas / / zil gyis mnan pa'i skye mched kyis zil gyis gnon par byed do / / yang dang yang du mi mthong zhing mi snang bar byas pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'o / / shes pa ni zhi gnas kyis so /
adhimātrāṇīti / asattvasaṃkhyātāni gṛhavimānaparvatādīni mahāpramāṇatvāt / nīlānīti uddeśaḥ / śeṣairnirdeśaḥ / nīlavarṇānīti svābhāvikena varṇena / nīlanidarśanānīti sāṃyogikena varṇena
# mthong ba ni lhag mthong gis so / / de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / chen po ni sems can ma yin par ston pa ste / / de dag ni khyim dang gzhal med khang dang ri la sogs pa ste / / tshad chen po yin pa'i phyir ro / / sngon po zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o / / lhag ma ni bshad pa'o / / kha dog sngon po zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i kha dog go / / sngon por ston pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i kha dog go /
nīlanirbhāsānīti / ubhayathāpi bhāsvaratvāt
# sngon por snang ba ni gnyi ga'i kha dog tu snang ba'o /
umakātaśī(sī?) / karṇikāraḥ prasiddhaḥ / bandhujīvo bandhūkaḥ / uṣā rātrerantaḥ / (RSt_176) / 'kṛtsnaṃ' daśavidhātmakaṃ' iti / abhibhvāyatanairabhibhūya pṛthivyādīnāṃ kṛtsnaṃ samantādibhiḥ sapharaṇātkṛtsnānyucyante
# aom ma ka ni zar ma'o / / kar ma ka ni dong ka'o / / ban du dzi ba ka ni pan du ka'o / / pa ba sangs ni thor sa shar ba'i skar ma'o / / zad par bcu'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni / / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyis zil gyis mnan nas / / sa la sogs pa thams cad kun du khyab bar byas pa'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ces brjod do /
kadācittānyevāyatanānīti kṛtsnāyatanānyucyante / kadācittu pṛthivyādibhirviśiṣya nirdiśyante / pṛthivīkṛtsnaṃ apkṛtsnaṃ tejaḥkṛtsnaṃ vāyuḥkṛtsnaṃ nīlakṛtsnaṃ pītakṛtsnaṃ lohitakṛtsnaṃ avadātakṛtsnaṃ ākāśānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ ceti
# kha cig ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de ni zad par gyi skye mched du brjod do / / kha cig ni sa la sogs pa dag gis khyad par du ston te / / zad par sa dang zad par sa dang zad par me dang zad par rlung dang zad par sngon po dang zad par ser po dang zad par dmar po dang zad par dkar po dang zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do /
'sarvākārāścatasraḥ pariśuddhaya' iti / āśrayapariśuddhirālambanapariśuddhiścittapariśuddhirjñānapariśuddhiśca
# rnam pa thams cad dag pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni rten yongs su dag pa dang dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang thugs yongs su dag pa dang ye shes yongs su dag pa'o /
tatra savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣāṇāṃ daurbalyānāmāśrayādatyantoparamaḥ svasyacātmabhāvasya yathecchamādānasthānacyavaneṣu vaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayapariśuddhiḥ
# de la bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams kyi gnas ngan len rten las gtan du bral zhing rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang gnag du gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho la dbang bsgyur ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i rten yongs su dag pa'o /
sarvālambanānāṃ nirmāṇapariṇāmasaṃprakhyāneṣu vaśavartitā sarvākārā ālambanapariśuddhiḥ
# sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba dang dmigs pa thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du dbang bsgyur ba ni dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o /
pūrvavatsarvacittadauṣṭhulyāpagamaścitte ca sarvākārakuśalamūlopacayaḥ sarvākārāṃ cittapariśuddhiḥ
# snga ma bzhin du sems kyi gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas / / sems la rnam pa thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba ni / / rnam pa thams cad du thugs yongs su dag pa'o /
pūrvavatsarvāvidyāpakṣadauṣṭhulyāpagamaḥ sarvajñeyajñāne ca vaśavartitā sarvākārā jñānapariśuddhiḥ
# snga ma bzhin du ma rig pa'i phyogs kyi gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral pas shes pa dang shes bya thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi ye shes yongs su dag pa'o /
'vaśitā daśa' iti / daśa vaśitāḥ / ayurvaśitā yathecchamāyuṣasthāpanāt tyajanācca
# dbang bcu ni bcu la dbang ba ste / / tshe la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par tshe la gnas pa dang spang ba la'o /
cittavaśitā yathecchadhyānādisamāpatteḥ
# sems la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
pariṣkāravaśitā yathecchamupakaraṇapratyupasthānāt / karmavaśitā yathecchaṃ kāyavākkarmasiddheḥ
# yo byad la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod bar 'tshog chas nye bar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro / / las la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par lus dang ngag gi las grub pa'o /
upapattivaśitā sarvopapattyāyataneṣu yathecchamupapatteḥ / ṛddhivaśitā yathecchamabhijñāḥ
# skye ba la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa rnams su skye par byed pa'o / / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i mngon par shes pa'o /
praṇidhānavaśitā sarvapraṇidhānasamṛddheḥ
# smon lam la dbang ba ni smon lam thams cad yang dag par 'byor pa'o /
adhimuktivaśitā yadyathādhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati / jñānavaśitā yadeva jñātumicchati tadeva jānāti / dharmavaśitā sūtrādidharmavyavasthāneṣu kauśalam
# mos pa la dbang ba ni gang ji ltar mos pa de bzhin du 'gyur ba'o / / ye shes la dbang ba ni gang kho na shes par 'dod pa de nyid shes pa'o / / chos la dbang ba ni mdo la sogs pa chos rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa'o / / bsrung ba med pa gsum na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
'trīṇyarakṣyāṇi' iti / pariśuddhakāyasamudācārastathāgato nāsti tasyāpariśuddhakāyasamudācāratā yāṃ tathāgataḥ praticchādayitavyāṃ manyeta kaccitpare na jānīyurityetatprathamamarakṣyam evaṃ vākkarma dvitīyam / evaṃ manaḥkarma tṛtīyam / 'trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni' yathāpāṭham- "tathāgatasya dharma deśayata ekatyāḥ śuśrūṣante / śrotramavadadhati / ājñācittamupasthāpayanti pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam / na tena tathāgatasya nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvam / apare na śuśrūṣante / na śrotramavadadhatītyādi / na tena tathāgatasyāghāto nākṣāntirnāpratyayaḥ na cetaso 'nabhirāddhiḥ / ekatyāḥ śuśrūṣante / ekatyā na suśrūṣante / na tena tathāgatasya dvayaṃ bhavati nandī āghātaśca / sarvatropekṣako viharati smṛtimāna samprajānan" iti / (RSt_177) / 'asammoṣadharmatā' sattvārthakriyākālānatikramādbuddhānām / ata evaiṣā lakṣaṇavidhānatopapannā bhavati / 'vāsanāsamuddhāta' iti / prahīṇakleśasyāpi yadaprahīṇakleśasyeva ceṣṭitaṃ sā kleśavāsanā / sāpi tathāgatasyāstaṅgateti samudghātakleśavāsanaḥ sa bhagavānucyate
# de la yongs su ma dag pa ni sku'i spyod pa mi mnga' bas / / gzhan la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes bcas pa'i dgongs pa gang yang mi mnga' ba 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o / / de bzhin du gsung gi phrin las ni gnyis pa'o / / de bzhin du thugs kyi phrin las ni gsum pa'o / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum ni ji ltar mdo las gsungs pa bzhin te / / de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa na / / gcig tu gus par nyan cing brtun te / / bka' sems la nye bar 'jog cing / / chos kyi rjes su chos nye bar sgrub pa na / / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur thugs yeng yeng por mi 'gyur ba dang gzhan dag gus par mi nyen cing / / rna ba'i 'dud pa la sogs pa la des de bzhin gshegs pa thugs khong khro bar mi 'gyur / / mi bzod par mi 'gyur / / thugs mi mnyes par mi 'gyur ba dang gcig tu gus par nyan pa dang gcig tu gus par mi nyan pa de dag la des de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dgyes pa'am / / khong khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur bar thams cad du dran pa dang shes bzhin du ldan pas btang snyoms su bzhugs pa'o / / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems can gyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste / / de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bya ba'i mdzad pa gzhan mi mnga' bar rig pa yin no / / bag chags yang dag par bcom pa ni gang nyon mongs pa spangs kyang ma spangs pa ltar spyod pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags so / / de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste / / de bas na bcom ldan 'das ni bag chags yang dag par bcom pa zhes bya'o /
'mahākaruṇā' hitāśayatā / yayā bhagavānsarvakālaṃ ṣaṭkṛtvo lokaṃ vyavalokayati "ko hīyata ko varddhata" ityādi
# thugs rje chen po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dus thams cad du phan pa'i dgongs pas 'jig rten la lan drug tu gzigs pa ste su ni nyams / / su ni 'phel zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
'sarvākārajñatā' iti sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣalakṣaṇaprabhedaparyantajñānamityarthaḥ
# rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang khyad par gyi dbye ba mtha' yas pa mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
raṇaṃ vivādakalahādi
# nyon mongs pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa la sogs pa'o /
iha tu raṇahetuḥ kleśo raṇaḥ / tamālambya raṇamutpādayatīti / yaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate, yato vyutthāya grāmādau praviṣṭaṃ tamālambya tatratyānāṃ raṇaṃ notpadyate sā 'araṇā' / sā śrāvakasyāpi bhavati buddhasyāpi / tayoḥ kāritraviśeṣaḥ
# 'dir ni rtsod pa'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa la nyon mongs pa 'di dag gis bdag la dmigs nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur bar / / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa ste / / gang gi phyir gzhan dag gi grong la sogs par 'jug pa na bdag la dmigs nas de dag gi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba ni nyan thos la yang yod / / sangs rgyas la yang yod / / de ni thun mong yin no / / de dag gi mdzad pa'i khyad par de'i ting nge 'dzin de dbang du byas nas /
tamadhikṛtya śāstram- / [184] śrāvakasyāraṇādṛṣṭerna kleśaparihāritā
# bstan bcos las / / nyan thos nyon mongs med pa'i lha / / mi yi nyon mongs spong nyid dang /
tatkleśastrotaucchittyai grāmādiṣu jināraṇā
# rgyal ba'i grong sogs de dag gi / / nyon mongs rgyun gcod nyon mongs med / / ces bya ba gsungs te /
śrāvakīyāraṇā kleśahetordarśanasya parihāritā
# nyan thos kyi nyon mongs pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mthong ba spong bar byed de /
na sākṣātkleśasya / saugatī tu parakīyakleśasrotasa ucchedāya na darśanasyetyarthaḥ
# nyon mongs pa mngon sum du spong ba ni ma yin no / / bde bar gshegs pas ni sngar bshad pa'i nyon mongs pas rgyun bcad pa'i phyir yin gyi mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
idaṃ jānīyāmiti praṇidhāya dhyānaṃ samāpannasya lokavṛttāntādau yajjñānamutpadyate tat 'praṇidhijñānaṃ' śrāvakāṇām / tathāgatamadhikṛtya śāstram- / [185] anābhogamānāsaṅgamavyāghātaṃ sadā sthitam / sarvapraśnāpanuddhauddhaṃ praṇidhijñānamiṣyate
# 'jig rten gyi spyod pa la sogs pa 'di shes par bya'o zhes smos pa byas nas snyoms par zhugs te shes pa bskyed pa de ni nyan thos kyi smon nas shes pa'o / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las / / sangs rgyas smon nas mkhyen pa ni / / lhun gyis grub dang chags spangs dang / / thogs pa med dang rtag gnas dang / / 'dri ba kun len 'debs par bzhed /
'anābhogaṃ' nirvikalpatvāt / 'anāsaṅgaṃ' nirapekṣatvāt / 'avyāghātaṃ' sarvatrāpratihatatvāt
# ces bya ba gsungs te / / lhun gyis grub pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro / / thogs pa med pa ni thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
'sadā sthitaṃ' ityasamāhite cetasi sthitatvāt
# rtag gnas ni rtag tu sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i phyir ro /
sarvapraśnān chedayatīti 'sarvapraśnāpanut'
# 'dri ba kun lan 'debs pa zhes bya ba ni dris pa thams cad sel ba'o /
sa ca sambhogakāyaḥ pariśuddhe svabuddhakṣetre jāyate yāvadākāśasthitiravatiṣṭhate
# de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rang gi zhing yongs su dag par skyes te / / ji srid nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du bzhugs so /
tatkuto buddhakṣetram? prādhānyena tasyaiva tatropapatteḥ / (RSt_178) / lujyate pralujyateti lokaḥ / prajātaṃ bhājanaṃ ca
# de ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya zhe na / / gtsor ni de nyid der skyes pa'i phyir ro / / 'jig pa dang rab tu 'jig pas na 'jig rten te / / skye dgu dang de'i snod do /
tasmāt dvidhā lokadhātuḥ sattvaloko bhājanalokaśca
# de bas na 'jig rten gyi khams ni gnyis te / / sems can gyi 'jig rten dang snod kyi 'jig rten no /
tatra sattvalokapariśuddhimadhikṛtyāha
# de la sems can gyi 'jig rten yongs su dag pa'i dbang du byas nas /
sarvasattvadhātupuṇyajñānasambhārāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāpayantatānugatavyeti
# sems can gyi khams thams cad bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
yayā bhagavataḥ prajñayā paripācitāḥ sattvāstatra yāvadākāśamutpadyante
# bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can ji srid nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du der skye bar 'gyur te /
utpannāśca yayā bodhaye pariprācyante / seha prajñāpāramitā
# skyes nas kyang gang gi phyir byang chub kyi don du yongs su smin par byed pa 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
tasyā aparyantatānugantavyā / kathamityāha
# de mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o / / ji ltar zhe na /
sarvetyādi / ye kecittatra sattvā utpadyante / sarve te labdhāryabhūmayo bodhisattvāḥ
# sems can gyi khams thams cad ces bya gsungs te / / gang su dag der skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams thob ba dag go /
te sarve / sarvaḥ sattvadhātuḥ sattvarāśiḥ / tasya puṇyajñānasambhāraḥ / tayoraparyantatayā
# de thams cad ni sems can gyi khams te sems can gyi tshogs so / / de'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag ni mu med pas so /
pṛthivīdhātvaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyā
# sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o /
evamabdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātvākāśadhātuvijñānadhātvaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti
# de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa la /
tathā hi bhājanalokastatra karatalasamaṃ bhūtalam / prāsādodyānavāpīkalpadrumādiparikaraśca sattvāvāsaḥ paramojjvalasaptaratnamayo 'nekalokadhātvantarasphuraṇamahāraśmipramokṣa upariṣṭhācca gaganamanurūpasanirbhāsaṃ ṣaḍdhātukāśca sattvāḥ / "ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣaḥ" iti vacanāt
# de bzhin du snod kyi 'jig rten ni sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa / / khang bzangs dang skyed mos tshal dang dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa yo byad dang gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba'i rang bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ma dag tu yang 'od zer chen po rab tu 'phro bar byed la / / steng gi nam mkha' la yang rjes su mthun par snang ba yin no / / sems can yang khams drug pa ste / / dge slong dag skyes bu 'di dag ni khams drug pa can no zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so /
atasteṣāmapi kāyaḥ kāntimān prabhāmaṇḍalībhūmyanurūpavarṇasaṃskāraḥ / tatrābhogaparibhogāśca sattvānāṃ sarvadevalokaprativiśiṣṭāḥ / yeṣāmupabhoga ekāntasukha ekāntānavadya ekāntavaśavartī ca / īdṛśī ṣaḍdhātupariśuddhiraparyantā niravadhikatvādativiśālatvācca / atastasyā aparyantayā tatkāraṇabhūtāyā bhagavataḥ prajñāyā aparyantatānugantavyā
# de'i phyir de dag gi lus kyang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sa gzhi dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa yang lta thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te gang dag gi longs spyod gcig tu bzang ba dang gcig tu bde ba dang gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa dang gcig tu dbang bsgyur ba'o / / 'di lta bu'i khams drug yongs su dag pa mu med pa ni mtshams chad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang mngon par spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / de bas na de mu med pas de'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir / / bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o /
tatra cotpannā bodhisattvā anantān lokadhātūn gatvā tatratyānāṃ sattvānāmakuśalaṃ(la)sañcayān hantadhyā(vyā?)na(n) tatpratipakṣāṃśca kuśalasañcayān prajānanti
# der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par song nas / / de na gnas pa'i sems can gyi mi dge ba bsags pa dang de'i gnyen po dge ba bsags pa yang rab tu shes te /
teṣāmapramāṇatayā tatparicchedikāyāsteṣāṃ prajñāyā apramāṇatā veditavyetyetadāha / kuśalākuśaladhamasañcayāpramāṇatayā prajñāpāramitāpramāṇatā veditavyeti
# de dag tshad med pas de dag yongs su gcod par byed pa'i shes rab kyang tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so /
yāvantaśca te bodhisattvāsteṣāṃ kuśaladharmotpādanāya dharma deśayanti sa sarvaḥ sarvadharmasañcayaḥ
# byang chub sems dpa' de dag la dge ba'i chos ji snyed pa'i phyir chos ston par byed de / / de ni chos thams cad bsags pa ste /
tasyāpramāṇatayā tadvyavasthāpikāyāsteṣāṃ prajñāyā apramāṇatā veditavyetyetadāha / sarvadharmasañcayāpramāṇatayā prajñapāramitāpramāṇatā veditavyeti
# de tshad med pas de dag 'jog par byed pa'i shes rab de dag kyang tshad med par rig par bya ste / / 'di ni chos thams cad bsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so /
sarvadharmasamādhyaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti
# chos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mu med pa thob pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa la / / chos ni gzungs rnams so /
dharmā dhāraṇyaḥ samādhayaścittasthitayaḥ / dharmāśca samādhayaśca sarve ca te dharmasamādhayaśca / teṣāmaparyantatā / tatpratilambhitā tallābhitā yā tatra bodhisattvānāṃ tayā tajjanikāyā bhagavataḥ prajñayā aparyantatā veditavyetyarthaḥ / sarvabuddharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti
# ting nge 'dzin ni sems gnas pa'o / / chos dang ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi ting nge 'dzin te / / de dag mu med pa'o / / de thob pa ni de rnyed pa'o / / gang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob bas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to / / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa la /
tatra buddhaḥ sambhogakāyaḥ
# de la sangs rgyas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o /
tasya sarve dharmāḥ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ
# de'i chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyaśīti (RSt_179) cānuvyañjanāni / teṣāmaparyantatā aparicchedyatā
# skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o / / de dag mu med pa ni yongs su bcad du med pa'o /
kenāparicchedyatā? tulayā
# gang gis yongs su bcad du med ce na mnyam pa ste /
tathāgatādanyasya tādṛśānāmabhāvāt
# de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro /
tayā bhagavataḥ prajñāyāstādṛśyevāparyantatā veditavyā
# des na bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu nyid kyang mu med par rig par bya ste /
katamasyāḥ prajñāyāḥ? yayā teṣāṃ samagrāṇi kāraṇāni samyak parijñāya samyaganuṣṭhitāni / ataḥ śāstram- / [186] dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītivyañjanātmā munerayam
# gang gis de dag gi rgyu thams cad yang dag par shes pa dang yang dag par grub pa'o / / de'i phyir bstan bcos las / / mtshan ni sum cu tsa gnyis dang / / dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di / / theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir /
sambhogiko mataḥ kāyo mahāyānopabhogataḥ
# thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed / / ces bya ba gsungs te /
caturthena pādena sambhogikatve kāraṇamāha / tatrādau pañcabhirindravajrābhirlakṣaṇānyāha / [187] cakrāṅkahastakramakūrmapādo jālāvanadvāṅgulipāṇipādaḥ / karau sapādau taruṇau mṛdū ca samucchrayaiḥ saptabhirāśrayo 'sya
# theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir / / zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni / / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsungs so / / de la dang po'i lnga ni dbang po'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do / / phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs / / phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel ba dang / / phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha can / / 'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang /
[188] dīrghāṅgulitvāyatapārṣṇigātram prājyamṛjūcchaṅkhapadordhvaromā
# sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang / / zhabs long mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs /
eṇeyajaṅghaśca paṭūrubāhuḥ kośāvadhānottamavastiguhyaḥ
# byin pa ae na ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes / / mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog /
[189] suvarṇavarṇaḥ pratanucchaviśca pradakṣiṇaikaikasujātaromā
# pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang / / spu ni re re nas gyas legs 'khrungs dang /
ūrṇāṅkitāsyo haripūrvakāyaḥ skandhau vṛtāvasya citāntarāṃsaḥ / [190] hino rasaḥ khyāti rasottamo 'sya nyagrodhavanmaṇḍalatulyamūrtiḥ / uṣṇīṣamūrdhā pṛthucārujivho brahmasvaraḥ siṃhahanuḥ suśuklāḥ
# zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra / / 'di yi dpung ba'i mgo zlum thal gong rgyas / / 'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang / / sku ni nya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab / / gtsug tor yar 'phags ljags ring mdzes pa dang / / tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems /
[191] tulyāḥ pramāṇe 'viralāśca dantā anyūnasaṃkhyādaśikāścatasraḥ
# shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzangs dang / / grangs ni bzhi bcu tham par tshang ba dang /
nīlekṣaṇo govṛṣapakṣmanetro dvātriṃśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni
# spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi / / 'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan /
(RSt_180) / kramaḥ pādaḥ cakrāṅkau hastau cāsyeti 'cakrāṅkahastakramaḥ' / supratiṣṭhitatvāt kūrmāviva pādāvasyeti 'kūrmāpādaḥ'
# zhes bya ba gsungs te / / zhabs ni rkang pa'o / / 'di la 'khor los mtshan pa'i phyag dang zhabs yo pas na phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan no / / 'di zhabs ru sbal ltar shin tu gnas pa yod pa'i phyir rus sbal zhabs so /
sa cāsau sa ceti samāsaḥ / jālāvanaddhāṅgalī pāṇī ca pādau cāsyeti 'jālāvanaddhāṅgalipāṇipādaḥ'
# de dag ni las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba'o / / 'di la phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel ba yod pas na / / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba'o /
'karau sapādau taruṇau mṛdū ca' asyeti pareṇa sambandhaḥ
# phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha can / / 'di zhes bya ba 'og ma dang sbyar ro /
'samucchrayaiḥ saptabhirāśrayo 'sya' / lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā
# 'de yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang / / zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa'i gsum pa'o /
āśrayaḥ kāyaḥ saptabhirucchayairlakṣitaḥ kāyo 'syetyarthaḥ
# sku ni rten no / / bdun mtho bas mtshon pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to /
etena pañcalakṣaṇānyuktāni / cakrāṅkitapāṇipādatā supratiṣṭhitapādatā jālapāṇipādatā mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā saptocchrayatā ceti
# 'di dag gis ni mtshan lnga bstan te phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa dang zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang bdun mtho ba'o /
'dīrghāṅgulitvāyatapārṣṇigātram prājyamṛjūcchaṅkhapadordhvaromā
# sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang / / zhabs long mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs /
eṇeyajaṅghaśca paṭūrūbāhuḥ koṣā(śā)vadhānottamavastiguhyaḥ / dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ ca āyatapārṣṇiśceti samāhāradvandvaḥ
# byin pa ae na ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes / / mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog / / ces bya ba la sor mo ring ba dang rting pa yangs pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i zlas dbye'o /
'gātraṃ prājyaṃ ṛju' iti bṛhadṛjugātram / ucchaṅkhapādaścāsau 'ūrdhvaromā' ca / uccaiḥ sunigūḍhajānugulphatvāducchaṅkhapāda iti sūtram / ataśca utkarṣanigūḍhārtha ucchabdaḥ / jānugulphāsthivācī śaṅkhaśabdaḥ / urū mūlādadhaśca sarva pāda iti gamyate / vastau guhyaṃ vastuguhyam / kośāvadhānamuttama vastiguhyamasyeti tathoktaḥ / anenāṣṭau lakṣaṇāni / dīrghāṅgulitā / āyatapārṣṇitā / bṛhadujugātratā / ucchaṅkhapādatā / ūrdhvāṅgaromatā / aiṇeyajaṅghatā / paṭūrubāhutā / kośāvahitavastiguhyatā ceti / 'suvarṇavarṇaḥ pratanucchaviśca pradakṣiṇaikaikasujātaromā / ūrṇāṅkitāsyo haripūrvakāyaḥ skandhau vṛtāvasya citāntarāṃsaḥ / hareriva pūrvakāyo 'syeti 'haripūrvakāyaḥ' / 'vṛttau' iti susaṃvṛttau / suśliṣṭaparimaṇḍalagrīvatvāt / asaṃyoraṃtaraṃ uttarāṃsamuraḥ / tadupacitamasyeti 'citāntarāṃsaḥ' / anena saptalakṣaṇāni / suvarṇavarṇatā / ślakṣaṇacchavitā / ekaikapradakṣiṇāvartaromatā / ūrṇāṅkitamukhatā / siṃhapūrvakāyatā / susaṃvṛtaskandhatā / citāntarāṃsatā ceti / 'hīno rasaḥ khyāti rasottamo 'sya nyagrodhavanmaṇḍalatulyamūrtiḥ / (RSt_181) / uṣṇīṣamūrdhā pṛthucārujivho brahmasvaraḥ siṃhahanuḥ suśuklāḥ / tulyāḥ pramāṇe viralāśca dantā anyūnasaṃkhyādaśikāścatasraḥ / nīlekṣaṇo govṛṣapakṣmanetro dvātriṃśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni / anena ślokadvayena dvādaśalakṣaṇānyuktāni / rasarasajñatā / nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā / uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā / pṛthutanujivhatā / brahmasvaratā / siṃhahanutā / suśukladantatā / samadantatā / aviraladantatā / samacatvāriṃśaddantatā abhinīlanetratā / gopakṣmanetratā ceti / daśaparimāṇamasyāḥ saṃhateriti 'daśikā' / tāścatasraḥ / catvāriṃśadityarthaḥ / govṛṣau gobalīvardau
# sku drang zhes bya ba ni sku che ba dang drang ba'o / / zhabs long bu mi mngon pa yang yin la / / spu gyen du phyogs pa yin pas / / zhabs long mi mngon gyen du phyogs pa ste / / long bu dang pus mo'i lha nga mdzes par mi mngon pa ni mi mngon pa'o / / de'i phyir aung gi sgra ni khyad par dang mi mngon pa'i don to / / dung gi sgra ni pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu'i rus pa'i don te / / brla'i rtsa ba man chad kun la zhabs zhes rtogs par bya'o / / 'di la mdoms kyi sba ba mchog tu nub pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o / / 'dis mtshan brgyad bstan te / / sor mo ring ba dang rting ba yangs pa dang sku che zhing drang ba dang zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa dang sbu gyen du phyogs pa dang / / byin pa ri dags ae na ya'i lta bu dang phyag dang brla zhing grims pa dang mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'o / / pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang / / spu ni re re nas gyas legs 'khrungs dang / / zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra / / 'di la dpung pa mgo zlum thal gong rgyas / / 'di la ro stod seng ge 'dra ba ni ro stod seng ge dang 'dra ba'o / / mgo zlum pa zhes bya ba ni mi zlum pa ma yin te / / mgur ma byang zhing kun nas zlum pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / thal gong dag gi bar ni dbus te brang ngo / / de rgyas pa 'di la yod pas thal gong rgyas pa'o / / 'dir ni mtshan sum cu bstan te / / pags pa mdog gser lta bu dang pags pa srab pa dang spu re re nas gyas su legs par 'khrungs pa dang zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang dpung mgo zlum pa dang thal gong rgyas pa'o / / 'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang / / sku ni n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab / / gtsug tor yar 'phags ljags ring mdzes pa dang / / tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems / / shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzangs dang / / grangs ni bzhi bcu tham pa tshang ba dang / / spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi / / 'dra ba 'di mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan / / zhes bya ba la / / tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'dis ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan te / / ro bro ba'i mchog nyid dang n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang gtsug tor gyen du 'phags pa nyid dang ljags ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang thems shin tu dkar ba nyid dang tshems mnyam pa nyid dang tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang spyan mthon mthong nyid dang spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid dang ba mchog ni be'u gzhon nu'o /
athavā 'govṛṣaḥ' puṅgavaḥ / sarvaikatvena 'dvāṃtriśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni' / eṣāṃ vyākhyānaṃ ca hetuśca pūrvanimittatā ca dharmadāna (?) sūtre / [192] yasya yasyātra yo heturlakṣaṇasya prasādhakaḥ / tasya tasya prapūryāyaṃ samudāgamalakṣaṇaḥ
# yang na ba mchog ni khyu mchog go / / 'di thams cad gcig tu byas pas ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to / / 'di dag gis bshad pa dang rgyu dang snga ltas dang chos kyi sbyin pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin te / / 'di la mtshan nyid gang gang gi / / sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin / / de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas /
atra / 'yasya yasya lakṣaṇasya yo yo hetuḥ prasādhakaḥ / tasya tasya prapūryāyaṃ samudāgamalakṣaṇaḥ' / ayaṃ sāmbhogikaḥ kāyaḥ / kasya punaḥ ko heturityāha / [193] gurūṇāmanuyānādi dṛḍhatā saṃvaraṃ prati
# mtshan ni 'di dag yang dag 'grub / / 'dir gang gi mtshan gang gi rgyu gang sgrub par byed pa de dang de ni rab tu rdzogs pas thob pa'i mtshan nyid de / / 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o / / yang gang gi rgyu gang yin zhe na / / bla ma skyel la sogs pa dang / / yang dag blangs la brtan pa dang /
saṃgrahāsevanaṃ dānaṃ praṇītasya ca vastunaḥ
# bsdu brten dang gya nom pa'i / / dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba /
[194] vadhyamokṣāḥ samādānaṃ vivṛddhiḥ kuśalasya ca
# thar bar byed dang dge ba ni / / yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs /
ityādiko yathāsūtraṃ heturlakṣaṇasādhakaḥ
# sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid de / / mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin /
tatra gurūṇāmanugamanapratyudgamānābhyāṃ dharmaśravaṇamālyopahāracaityānupānaprabhṛtiṣu ca paricāradānāccakrāṅkahastapādatā
# zhes bya ba la bla ma la bskyal ba dang bsu ba dag dang chos mnyan pa dang mchod rten la me tog gis mchod pa dang bskor ba la sogs pa dang gyog 'khor phul bas ni phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no /
dṛḍhasamādānatvāt supratiṣṭhitapādatā / saṃgrahavastūnāmāsevanājjālahastapādatā / praṇītānnapānādidānānmṛdutaruṇahastapādatā (RSt_182) saptocchadatā ca
# bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kun tu bsten pas ni phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba yin no / / bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa gya nom pa byin pas ni phyag dang zhabs gzhon sha can dang bdun mtho ba nyid do /
'vadhyamokṣāḥ' iti bahuvacanāmādyartham
# gsad par bya ba thar byed dang / / zhes bya ba'i tshig ni sogs pa'i don to /
vadhyamokṣaṇājjīvitānugrahakaraṇāt / prāṇātipātavirateścāsevanāddīrghāṅgulitā āyatapārṣṇitā bṛhadṛjugātratā ca
# gsad pa thar bar byas pa dang srog rjes su gzung ba byas pa dang srog gcod pa las ldog pa kun du bsten pas / / song mo ring ba nyid dang rting pa yangs pa nyid dang sku che zhing drang ba nyid do /
kuśaladharmasamādānasya vivardhanāducchaṃkhapādatā / ūrdhvāṅgiromatā ca
# dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang rnam par spel bas na zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid do /
'ityādika' evamādikaḥ / 'yathāsūtraṃ' iti yathā paṭhiṣyati dharmadāne
# sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de la sogs pa'o / / mdo las 'di skad 'byung ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o /
mahāpuruṣakāratvāt mahāpuruṣāstathāgatā mahābodhisattvāśca / teṣāṃ dyotakāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni dvātriṃśat
# de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu chen po'i byed pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir skyes bu chen po ste / / de dag gsal bar byed pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan te sum cu rtsa gnyis so /
teṣāmeva śobhākaraṇādaśītyanuvyañjanāni
# de dag mdzes par byed pa'i phyir dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste /
tānyadhikṛtya dvādaśaślokāḥ- / [195] tāmrāḥ snigdhāśca tuṅgāśca nakhā aṅgulayo muneḥ
# de dag gi dbang du mdzad nas tshigs su bcad pa ni bcu gnyis te / / thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang / / mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams /
vṛttāścitānupurvāśca gūḍhā nirgranthayaḥ śirāḥ / anenāṣṭāvanuvyañjanānyuktāni / tāmranakhatā snigdhanakhatā tuṅganakhatā ca / vṛttāṅgulitā citāṅgulitā anupūrvāṅgulitā ca gūḍhaśiratā nirgranthiśiratā ceti / [196] gūḍhau gulphau samau pādo siṃhebhadvijagopateḥ / vikrāntaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cāru gamanamṛjuvṛttate (tā) / [197] muṣṭānupūrvate / iti ṣaḍakṣarādhikena ślokena dvādaśa / gūḍhagulphatā / aviṣamapādatā / siṃhavikrāntagāmitā / haṃsavikrāntagāmitā / vṛṣabhavikrāntagāmitā / pradakṣiṇāvataṃgāmitā / cārūgāmitā / avakragātratā / vṛttagātratā / mṛṣṭagātratā anupūrvagātratā ceti / medhyamṛdutve śuddhagātratā / pūrṇavyañjanatā cārūpṛthumaṇḍalagātratā / iti ṣaḍiṃvaśatyākṣaraiḥ pañcānuvyañjanāni / śucigātratā mṛdugātratā viśuddhagātratā paripūrṇavyañjanatā cārupṛthumaṇḍalagātratā ceti / [198] samakramatvaṃ śuddhatvaṃ netrayoḥ sukumāratā / adīnocchadagātratvaṃ susaṃhatanagātratā / (RSt_183) / anena ṣaṭ / samakramatā viśuddhanetratā sukumāragātratā utsadagātratā susaṃhatanagātratā ceti / [199] suvibhaktāṅgatā dhvāntapradhvastālokaśuddhatā
# zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang / / rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med / / ces bya ba 'dis ni dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu bstan te / / sen mo zangs kyi mdog nyid dang sen mo snum pa nyid dang sen mo mtho ba nyid dang sor mo zlum pa nyid dang sor mo rgyas pa nyid dang sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang rtsa mi mngon pa nyid dang mdud pa med pa nyid do / / long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang / / seng ge glang chen bya dang ni / / khyu mchog stabs gshegs gyas phyogs dang / / mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags / / byi dor byas 'dra rim par 'tsham / / zhes bya ba ni tshig rkang gcig lhag pa'i tshigs su bcad pas ni bcu gnyis te / / long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid dang seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang glang po'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang gyas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid dang mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang sku drang ba nyid dang sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang sku byi dor byas pa nyid dang sku rim par 'tshams par nyid dang gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku / / mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang / / sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang / / zhes bya ba'i tshig rkang gsum gyis ni dpe byad bzang po lnga nyid de / / sku gtsang ba nyid dang sku 'jam pa nyid dang sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang tshan rdzogs pa nyid dang sku kho lag yangs shing mdzes pa nyid do / / gom snyoms spyan ni dag pa dang / / shin tu gzhon mdog can nyid dang / / sku zhum med de rgyas pa dang / / shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang / / zhes bya ba 'di ni drug ste / / gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang sku gzhon sha can nyid dang sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang sku rgyas pa nyid dang sku shin tu grims pa nyid do / / yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang / / gzigs pa rab rib dag pa dang /
vṛttamṛṣṭākṣatākṣāmakukṣitāśca gabhīratā / [200] dakṣiṇāvartatā nābheḥ samantāddarśanīyatā
# dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang / / phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni / / zab dang gyas phyogs 'khyil ba dang kun nas blta na sdug pa dang /
anena sārdhaślokena nava / suvibhaktāṅgapratyaṅgatā vitimiraśuddhālokatā mṛṣṭakukṣitā abhagnakukṣitā akṣāmakukṣitā gambhīranābhitā dakṣiṇāvartanābhitā samantaprāsādikatā ceti / samācāraḥ śuciḥ kālatilakāpagatā tanuḥ / [201] karau tūlamṛdusnigdhagambhīrāyatalekhatā
# zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni dgu ste / / yan lag dang nying lag rnam par shin tu 'byes pa nyid dang gzigs pa rab rib med cing dag pa nyid dang dku zlum pa nyid dang dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang dku ma rnyongs pa nyid dang phyal phyang nge ba nyid dang lte ba zab pa nyid dang lte ba gyas phyogs su 'khyil pa nyid dang kun nas mdzes pa nyid do / / kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni / / sme ba gnag bag med pa dang / / phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang / / phyag ris mdangs yod zab ring dang / / zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang /
nātyāyataṃ vaco bimbapratibimbodayāsyatā / bimbānāṃ pratibimbodayo 'sminniti tathoktamāsyaṃ mukhamasyeti 'bimbapratibimbodayāsyaḥ' / anena sārdhaślokenāṣṭau
# zhal gzugs gzugs brnyan 'byung ba dang / / zhes bya ba la / / zhal 'di la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba yod pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o / / zhal ni zhal gdong ste / / zhal gdong la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'o / / tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis pa 'dis ni brgyad de /
śucisamācāratā vyapagatatilakagātratā tūlasadṛśasukumārapāṇitā snigdhapāṇilekhatā gambhīrapāṇilekhatā āyatapāṇilekhatā nātyāyatavadanatā bimbapratibimbadarśanavadanatā ceti / [202] mṛdvī tanvī ca raktā ca jivhā jīmūtaghoṣatā / cārumañjusvaro daṃṣṭrā vṛttāstīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ samāḥ
# kun du spyod pa gtsang ba nyad dang sku la sme ba gnag bag med pa nyid dang phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa nyid dang phyag gi ser mo mdangs yod pa nyid dang phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang zhal gdong la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba nyid do / / ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang / / gsung mnyen 'jam dang mche ba zlum / / rno dang dkar dang mnyam pa dang /
[203]anupūrvodagatāstuṅgā nāsikā paramaṃ śuciḥ / 'paramaṃ' atyantam / anena sārdhaślokena dvādaśa / mṛdujivhatā tanujivhatā raktajivhatā ca / gajagarjitajīmutaghoṣatā / madhuracārumañjusvaratā vṛttadaṃṣṭratā tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭratā śukladaṃṣṭratā samadaṃṣṭratā anupūrvadaṃṣṭratā tuṅganāsikatā śucināsikatā ceti / viśāle nayane pakṣma cittaṃ padmadalākṣitā / [204] āyataślakṣṇasusnigdhasamarome bhruvau bhujau
# byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang / / mchog tu dag pa dag dang ni / / zhes bya ba la / / mchog ni dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni bcu gnyis te / / ljags mnyel pa nyid dang ljags srab pa nyid dang ljags dmar ba nyid dang glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid dang gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang mche ba zlum pa nyid dang mche ba rno ba nyid dang mche ba dkar ba nyid dang mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang shangs mtho ba nyid dang shangs gtsang ba nyid do / / spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug / / padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang smin tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang / / snum dang spu ni mnyam pa dang /
pīnāyatau samau karṇāvupaghātavivarjitau / [205] lalāṭamaparimlānaṃ pṛthu pūrnottamāṅgatā / (RSt_184)
# phyag ring rgyas dang snyan mnyam dang / / nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang 'phral ba legs par 'byes pa dang /
samarome iti striyāṃ ḍāp / anena ślokadvayena trayodaśa / viśālanayanatā citapakṣmatā sitasitakamaladalanayanatā āyatabhrūtā ślakṣṇabhrūtā snigdhabhrūtā samaromabhrūtā pīnāyatabhujatā samakarṇatā anupahatakarṇatā supariṇāmitalalāṭatā pṛthulalāṭatā paripūrṇottamāṅgatā ceti / bhramarābhrāścitāḥ ślakṣṇā asaṃluḍitamūrtayaḥ / [206] keśā aparuṣāḥ puṃsāṃ saurabhyādapahāriṇaḥ
# dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang / / zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gnyis po 'dis ni bcu gsum mo / / spyan yangs pa nyid dang rdzi ma stug pa nyid dang spyan dkar nag 'byes shing padma'i 'dab ma lta bu nyid dang smin tshugs ring ba nyid dang smin ma snum pa nyid dang smin ma'i spu mnyam pa nyid dang phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang snyan mnyam pa nyid dang 'phral ba legs par 'byes pa nyid dang 'phral ba dbyes che ba nyid dang dbu shin tu rgyas pa nyid dang dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang / / stug 'jam ma 'dzings ngo bo dang / / dbu skra mi gshor nyid dang ni / / dbu skra skyes bu yid 'phrog dang / / dpal gyi be'u dang bkri shis ni /
śrīvatsaḥ svastikaṃ ceti buddhānuvyañjanaṃ matam
# g yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa ste / / sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed /
anena sārdhaślaukena sapta / bhramarasadṛśakeśatā citakeśatā ślakṣṇakeśatā asaṃluḍitakeśatā aparuṣakeśatā śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartalalitapāṇipādatā ceti / sarvaikatvena buddhānāmaśītiranuvyañjanāni
# ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni bdun te / / dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa nyid dang dbu skra stug pa nyid dang dbu skra 'jam pa nyid dang dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang dbu skra mi gshor ba nyid dang dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil bkra shis dang gyung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa nyid do / / thams cad gcig tu byas pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o /
iti sāmbhogikaḥ kāyaḥ / nairmāṇikaṃ kāyamadhikṛtya śāstram-
# 'di ni long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o / / sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
[207] karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam / ā bhavātso 'nupacchinnaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ / [208] tathā karmāpyanucchinnamasyā saṃsāramiṣyate / ataḥ sūtram / sarvadharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti / yāvantaḥ sthalajalāntarikṣacarāṇāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāyavāksaṃgṛhītā dharmāḥ sattvānāṃ vinayanāya bhagavatā ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu nirmitāḥ te sarvadharmāsteṣāmaparyantatayā bhagavataḥ prajñāyā aparyantatā veditavyā / katamasyāḥ te nirmitāḥ? śūnyatāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti / yathā tathāgatena nirmitāḥ kāyā anantāstathā teṣāṃ śūnyatāpyanantā
# gang gi srid pa mi srid par / / 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag / / mnyam pa mdzad pa'i sku de ni / / thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad / / de bzhin de las 'khor ba'i bar / / rgyun mi 'chad bar bzhed pa yin / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / de'i phyir mdo las / / chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la ji srid sa la spyod pa dang bar snang la spyod pa'i 'gro ba dang gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus dang rag gi bsdus pa ni chos te / / sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir / / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag tu sprul pa de dag ni chos thams cad de / / de dag mu med par rig par bya'o / / de gang zhe na / / gang gi sprul pa de dag go / / stong pa nyid mu med pa'i phyir / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la ji ltar sprul pa'i sku de dag mu med pa de bzhin du de dag gi stong pa nyid kyang mu med do / / gang gis stong zhe na /
kena śūnyatā? svādhīnaiścicaitasikairmāyāpuruṣavat / atastasyāpi aparyantatayāparyantateti pūrvavat
# sems dang sems las byung nga la rag las pa ste / / sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin no / / de'i phyir de yang mu med pas mu med pa ste / / snga ma bzhin no /
yathā teṣāṃ kāyavācau nirmite tathā cittacaitasikā api kinna nirmīyante? tadupādānābhāvāt, apūrvasattvāprādurbhāvācca / nanu cittacaitasikanirmāṇamapīṣyate buddhānāṃ
