# ji ltar yang de dag lus dang ngag gi sprul pa de bzhin du sems dang sems las byung ba yang ci'i phyir mi sprul zhe na / / de la nye bar len pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir dang sngon med pa'i sems can mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa ni / / sems dang sems las byung ba la yang 'dod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
"kāyavākcittanirmāṇaprayogopāyakarmakaḥ / (RSt_185)
# sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa ni / / sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can yin /
iti vacanāt / satyamiṣyate / kintu satyupādāne devatādhiṣṭhānena svapnadarśanavat
# zhes bya ba'i tshig las so / / 'on kyang nye bar len pa yod na yod par 'gyur te / / lhas byin gyis brlabs nas rmi lam du bstan pa lta bu 'am / / tshig las tshig gi don go ba bzhin no /
vācā vāgarthanni(rthani)vedanavacca / ata āha / cittacaritāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatānugantavyeti / teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ yathā deśitaṃ dharmamālambya prātipakṣikāḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante / taiśca teṣāṃ vikṣepakā akuśalā dharmāḥ prahīyante / ata āha / kuśalākuśaladharmāparimāṇatayā prajñāpāramitāparimāṇatānugantavyeti
# de'i phyir sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa'i phyir / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so / / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa dag tu sems can gyi khams mu med pa'i spyod pa mu med pa la rnam par gzigs nas / / bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston pa yin te / / de'i phyir sems kyi spyod pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so / / sems can de dag gis kyang ji ltar bstan pa'i chos la dmigs nas gnyen po'i dge ba'i chos skye bar 'gyur te / / des kyang de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong bar 'gyur te / / de'i phyir dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos gzhal du med pa'i phyir / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhal du med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so /
atha ye nirmitāste kathaṃ bhagavataḥ kāyāḥ? bhagavatā nirmitatvāditi cet
# ji ste gang sprul pa de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku yin / / gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
māyākāranirmitā gajādayastarhi māyākārasya kāyāḥ syuḥ, svakāyatvenādhiṣṭhāya tena nirmāṇāt / svakāyavacca gamanavyāhārādiṣu duṣkareṣu vyāpa[ā]raṇāttepi kāyā ityayaṃ bhagavato nairmāṇikaḥ kāyaḥ / uktāstrayaḥ kāyāḥ
# de ltar na ni sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po la sogs pa yang sgyu ma mkhan gyi lus su 'gyur ro zhe na / / rang gi skur byin gyis brlabs pa der sprul pa'i phyir nyid kyi sku bzhin du gshegs pa dang dka' ba spyod pa dang bya ba la sogs pa mdzad pa de yang de'i sku yin no / / de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i sku bstan te / / de dag ni sku gsum mo /
kāritramidānīṃ vaktavyam / tatsamāsata āha / siṃhanādanadanatayā prajñāpāramitānugantavyeti / mṛgāṇāmuttamaḥ siṃhaḥ
# da ni mdzad pa mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste / / de yang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te / / ri dags rnams kyi mchog ni seng ge'o /
tatsādharmyāt puruṣottamāḥ puruṣasiṃhā ityucyante
# de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir skyes bu dam pa ni skyes bu seng ge zhes brjod do / / 'di ni khyad par du gyur pa ste /
iha tu prakarṣagaterdevamanuṣyādisarvapuruṣottamastathāgataḥ siṃha ityucyate
# lha dang mi rnams la sogs pa skyes bu thams cad kyi dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste / / de la seng ge zhes brjod do /
tasya dharmaḥ sarvāśāparipūraṇatayā sarvaparapravādimṛgabhīṣaṇatayā ca siṃhanāda ityucyate
# de'i chos ni bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang gzhan pha rol rgol ba'i ri dags thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas seng ge'i sgra zhes brjod do /
siṃhadhvajavat
# seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bzhin no /
tasya nadano deśakaḥ / tabhdāvastattā / tayā bhagavataḥ prajñā gantavyā pāragamanāt pāramitā veditavyetyarthaḥ
# de sgrog pa ni ston pa'o / / de'i dngos po ni de nyid de / / de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab ni / / bgrod par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
sa punaḥ siṃhanādanadanaḥ saptaviṃśatividhasya kāritradeśanā / sā vistareṇa mahatyorbhagavatyordraṣṭavyā
# de yang seng ge'i sgra ste / / mdzad pa nyi shu rtsa bdun ston pa ste / / de ni rgyas par yum chen mo dag las blta bar bya'o /
tāmadhikṛtya śāstram-
# de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karma saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe
# 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni / / bsdu rnams bzhi la dgod pa dang /
[209] niveśanaṃ sasaṃkleśe vyavadānāvabodhane
# kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi / / rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang /
sattvānāmarthayāthātmye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu ca / [210] buddhamārge prakṛtyaiva śūnyatāyāṃ dvayakṣaye
# sems can rnams don ji bzhin gyi / / don dang pha rol phyin drug dang / / sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis / / stong pa nyid gnyis mi zad dang /
saṃkete 'nupalambhe ca paripāke ca dehinām
# brda dang dmigs pa med pa dang / / lus can rnams ni yongs smin dang /
[211] bodhisattvasya mārge 'bhiniveśasya ca vāraṇe / bodhiprāptau jinakṣetraviśuddho niyatiṃ prati
# byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni / / mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa dang / / byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas zhing /
[212] aprameye ca sattvārthe buddhasevādike guṇe / bodheraṅgeṣvanāśe ca karmaṇāṃ satyadarśane
# rnam par dag dang nges pa dang / / sems can don ni tshad med dang / / sangs rgyas rten sogs yon tan dang / / byang chub yan lag las rnams ni /
(RSt_186) / [213] viparyāsaprahāṇe ca tadavastukatānaye / vyavadāne ca sambhāre saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛte prati / [214] vyatibhedāparijñāne nirvāṇe ca niveśanam
# chud mi za dang bden mthong dang / / phyin ci log ni spang pa dang / / de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang ni / / rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni / / 'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa la / / tha dad yongs su mi shes dang / / mya ngan 'das la dgod pa ste /
dharmakāyasya karmedaṃ saptaviṃśatidhā matam
# chos kyi sku yi phrin las 'di / / rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed /
bhagavāṃstānvigrahānnirmimīte ye nārakāṇāṃ narakāgninirvāpaṇena dharmadeśanayā ca tathā tiraścāṃ svamāṃsarudhirādidānena tathā pretānāmannapānādidānena dharmadeśanayā ca cittamabhipra sādya tena cābhiprasādena svagatibhyaścyutānāṃ devamanuṣyeṣūpapādayanti / devānapi hīnayānādhimuktikān dharmadeśanayābhiprasādya manuṣyeṣūpapannān yāvacchrāvakabodhau pratyekabodhau ca pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyantīti gatipraśamanakarma / ye ca manuṣyān bāhyādhyātmikeṣvāmiṣadāneṣu laukikalokotareṣu ca dharmadāneṣu, arthacaryāyāṃ samānārthatāyāṃ ca śikṣayantīti saṅgrahavastuniveśanakarma / saṃkleśaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca / vyavadānaṃ tayorastamayaḥ / sa ca pudgaladharmanairātmyajñānāditi saṃvṛtiḥ
# ces bya ba gsungs te bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku gang gis dmyal ba rnams kyi dmyal ba'i me zhi bar 'gyur ba 'di ltar chos ston pa dang de bzhin du dud 'gro dag la yang rang gi khrag la sogs pa'i sbyin pa dang de bzhin du yi dags rnams la yang bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa byin nas chos bstan te / / sems dad par 'dzin pa dang mngon par dad pa des rang gi 'gro ba las shi 'phos te / / lha dang mi rnams su skye bar mdzad de / / lha rnams la yang theg pa dman pa la mos shing dang bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te / / mi rnams su skye bar byas nas nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar la gnas par byed pa 'di ni 'gro ba rnams zhi ba'i phrin las so / / yang gang dag mi rnams kyi phyi nang gi zang zing gi sbyin pa dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang don spyod pa dang don mthun pa la slob par byed pa 'di ni bsdu pa'i dngos po la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / kun nas nyon mongs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'o / / de gnyis nub pa ni rnam par byang ba'o / / de yang gang zag dang chos la bdag med par shes pa'i phyir 'di ni kun rdzob bo /
paramārthastu [na] dharmadhātoranyadastīti saṃkleśavyavadānajñānaniveśanakarma
# don dam par chos kyi dbyings las gzhan med de / / 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
yathā hi māyākāro vicitrāṇi vastūni yāvabhdakṣyabhojyāni nirmāya lokaṃ toṣayati
# ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i bar gyi dngos po sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed de /
sa ca loko na jānāti sarvametadadravyakamiti / yaśca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na sa dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ kiñcitpaśyati na sattvaṃ nāpi sattvaprajñaptiṃ dharmāṇāmapi nairātmyāditi sattvārthayāthātmyaniveśanakarma
# de yang 'jig rten gyi dngos po 'di thams cad med par shes pa ni ma yin no / / gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs par cung zad kyang mthong ba med de / / sems can yang ma yin / / sems can du btags pa yang ma yin no / / chos rnams kyang bdag med pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃśca dāne niyojayati dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate / ye cānye dānaṃ dadati teṣā ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ / evamātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣatītyādi vācyamiti ṣaṭpāramitāniveśanakarma
# 'di ni sems can rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin gyi bdag nyid la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / de bdag nyid kyang sbyin par byed / / gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor bar byed / / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed / / gang gzhan dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing mthun par byed do / / de bzhin du bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste / / 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
ātmanā ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate / ātmanā ca pañcaśikṣāpadāni yāvadātmanā ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayatīti vācyamiti buddhamārganiveśanakarma / iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ pāramitādīn sarvadharmān deśayati
# bdag nyid kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par byed pa dang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga nas / / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis te / / 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa la rdzogs pa'i chos ston pa na /
teṣāṃ koṭitrayasya phalasya ca prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ deśayati
# de dag gi 'khor gsum dag pa'i 'bras bu yang rang bzhin gyis stong par ston par byed de /
te tathā bhāvayanto viśeṣamadhigacchanti
# de dag de bzhin du bsgoms pas lhag par khyad par du 'gro ste /
(RSt_187) tataste bhūyasyā mātrayā prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimadhigacchantīti prakṛtiśūnyatāniveśanakarma
# des na de dag stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la lan mang du sgom par byed pas / / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du khyad par 'gro bar byed de / / 'di ni stong pa nyid la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ na cānyā prakṛtiśūnyatā anye dharmāḥ / kiṃ tarhi? prakṛtiśūnyataiva dharmāḥ
# rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad de / / rang bzhin gyis stong pa yang gzhan ma yin no / / chos thams cad kyang gzhan ma yin te / / 'on kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid chos so /
ta eva prakṛtiśūnyatetyadvayadharmaniveśanakarma / na samyaksambodhau bhagavatā kaściddharma upalabdhaḥ / yatpunarabhisambudhya dharmā deśitāḥ skandhadhātvādayo vā yāvatsarvākārajñatā vā tatsarvaṃ lokavyavahāreṇeti sāṅketikajñānaniveśanakarma / yadi pāramitādiṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate tathāpi samyaksambodhaye na śaknoti / yadi punasteṣveva carati teṣāṃ ca koṭitrayaṃ phalaṃ ca nopalabhate
# de nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de / / 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i chos ni gang yang med de / / gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas / / phung po dang khams la sogs pa nas / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos ston pa de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin te / / 'di ni brdar btags pa shes pas dgod pa'i phrin las so / / gal te pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs pa de lta na yang / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi nus la gal te yang de dag la yang spyod cing / / 'khor gsum gyi 'bras bu de dag la yang mi dmigs pa de'i tshe ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nus te /
tadā samyaksambodhaye śaknotītyupalambhaniveśanakarma / yadyapi bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvaṃ sattvaprajñaptiṃ ca nopalabhate tathāpi saṃvṛtyā paśyati sattvān vastūpalambhena saṃkliṣyamānān / sa tāṃstatprahāṇāya triṣu yāneṣu paripācayatīti sattvaparipākaniveśanakarma / sa evamupaparīkṣate / śūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ / na ca śūnyatā śūnyatāmabhiniviśate / tasmātsarvadharmeṣvanabhiniviṣṭena bhavitavyam / dānādiṣu caritavyam
# 'di ni dmigs pa med pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / gal te byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na / / sems can dang sems can du brtags pa yang mi dmigs te / / 'on kyang de kun rdzob mthong nas sems can rnams dngos por dmigs pas / / kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa na / / des de dag gi de rnams spang pa'i phyir / / theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed de / / 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / de pha rol tu phyin pa re re la sogs pa la spyod pa ni / / sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob par byed de / / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / de de ltar nye bar rtog pa na / / chos thams cad stong pa nyid de / / stong pa nyid la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do / / de bas na chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bsgom par bya zhing / / sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyad par bya ste /
na ca teṣu tatphaleṣu vā gantavyamiti sarvābhiniveśaprahāṇaniveśanakarma
# 'khor gsum po de dag la yang rlom sems su mi bya'o / / 'di ni mngon par zhen pa thams cad spangs pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
na mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate nāmārgeṇa
# lam gyis byang chub thob pa la yang ma yin / / lam ma yin pas kyang ma yin te /
yato bodhi eva mārgaḥ mārga eva bodhiḥ
# gang gi phyir byang chub nyid lam mo / / lam nyid byang chub bo /
bodhisattva eva tarhi buddhaḥ syāditi cet
# gal te de lta na byang chub sems dpa' nyid sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhe na /
yadā sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrya vajropamasamādhau sthitvā bodhisattva ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā samyaksambodhimadhigacchati tadā sa eva tathāgataḥ sarvadarśī sarvajña iti nirdiśyata iti bodhiprāptiniveśanakarma / sa ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca daśākuśalasaṃgṛhītāni dauḥśīlyāni ṣaṭpāramitāvipakṣāṃśca hīnayānaphalānāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sākṣātkriyāspṛhayoravakāśaṃ, skandhadhātvādisāśravānāśravasarvadharmasaṃjñādauṣṭhulyāni ca nivārya svayaṃ ca pāramitādiṣu sarvakuśaladharmeṣu pratiṣṭhito bhavati parānapi pratiṣṭhāpayati / tacca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇakṛtvā ātmanaḥ samyaksambodhau ca sarvākārāyāṃ ca svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhau pariṇāmayati
# gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas / / skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de'i tshe / / de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ste / / thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'o zhes ston te / / 'di ni byang chub thob pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / de bdag dang gzhan dag gi tshul khrims 'chal pa la mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis yang dag par bsdus pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang theg pa dman pa'i 'bras bu lnga mngon sum du byed cing reg pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed cing phung po dang khams la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi gnas ngan len bsal nas / / rang yang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par byed la / / gzhan yang de dag la 'god par byed cing / / bdag gi dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yongs su sngo bar byed cing /
praṇidhānāni ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye yathā sūtraṃ karotīti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiniveśanakarma
# sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yang mdo ji lta ba bzhin du 'debs par byed de / / 'di ni sang rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
prathamacittotpādika eva bodhisattvaḥ samyaksambodhau niyato bhavati
# gal te byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa nyid nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur pa yin zhing /
niyatasya kathamapāyeṣūpapattiriti cet
# nges pa ji ltar na ngan song du skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
yaḥ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caturṣu vāpramāṇeṣu carati daśa cākuśalān dharmān prahāya tiṣṭhati / (RSt_188) aṣṭau tasyākṣaṇā na sambhavanti kiṃ punarapāyopapattiḥ
# gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de / / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang tshad med pa bzhi la spyod cing mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spang ba'i phyir gnas pa de dag la mi khom pa brgyad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur na /
kathaṃ tarhi tiryagyonau jātakāni? tāni sāśravānāśravasarvakuśaladharmasamanvāgatasya sattvārthā(rtha) vaśitayā saṃcintyopapattayo na ca tiryagduḥkhavedanāḥ / tadyathā tathāgataḥ paramavaśitvalābhātsarvalokadhātuṣu yugapadanantānātmabhāvān parārthāya nirmimīta iti samyaksambodhiniyataniveśanakarma
# ngan song du skye ba lta smas kyang ci dgos de lta mod kyi 'on kyang de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pas / / sems can gyi don gyi dbang gis bsams bzhin du skye'o / / dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal myong ba ni ma yin te / / dper na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dbang thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bdag nyid kyi ngo bo mtha' yas pa gzhan gyi don du cig car sprul pa lta bu'o / / 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
sa hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu sattvānāmartha karoti na ca lipyate
# de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas / / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can gyi don mdzad kyang skyon gyis mi gos te /
tathā hi yaḥ spṛśet, yena spṛśet, yaṃ ca spṛśet, trīnimāndharmānasau nopalabhate śūnyatāyāṃ ca sthitaḥ sarvaśukladharmeṣu sthito bhavati
# 'di ltar gang reg pa dang gang gis reg pa dang / / gang la reg pa'i chos gsum po de dag 'di la mi dmigs shing stong pa nyid la dmigs na / / dkar po'i chos thams cad la gnas par 'gyur te /
tayaiva teṣāṃ saṅgrāt / tathāhi sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ / tataḥ śūnyatāyāmantarbhūtā ityaprameyasattvārthaniveśanakarma
# de nyid kyis de dag bsdus pa'i phyir ro / / de ltar na chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyi stong ste / / des na stong pa nyid du 'dus pa yin no / / 'di ni sems can gyi don tshad med pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
sa evaṃ nirūpayati / ye te daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo ye ca teṣu tathāgatāḥ sarve te svabhāvena śūnyāḥ kevalaṃ nāmasaṅketena prajñapyate / sāpi prajñaptiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā / yadi tu kasyacicchūnyatā na syāt prādeśikī syāt / yatastu na pradeśikī tataḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyā iti / sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ṣaḍabhijñā abhinirharati
# de 'di ltar dpyod par byed de / / gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste / / ming dang brda tsam kho nas brtags pa yin la / / btags pa de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / / gal te yang 'ga' zhig yod de / / mi stong par gyur na gang gi phyir nyi tshe ba ma yin pa de'i phyir / / chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa kho na ste / / de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas mngon par shes pa drug bsgrubs te /
yāsu sthitvā daśadiksarvatathāgatānupasaṃkrāmati paryupāste tebhyaśca dharma śṛṇoti teṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayatyanabhiniviṣṭaḥ / na hi śūnyatāṃ śūnyatāyāmabhiniviśate / sa divyena cakṣuṣā daśadiglokadhātuṣu sattvān dṛṣṭvā sadyo 'bhijñayā tatra gatvā tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati
# gang dag la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing bsnyen bkur byas te / / de dag la chos mnyan pa de dag las kyang mngon par zhin pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do / / des lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la bltas nas rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pas der song ste /
divyena śrotradhātunā daśadiksarvabuddhānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvodgṛhya sattvebhyo deśayati
# de dag la chos ston par byed do / / lha'i rna bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ston pa thos nas de dag la ston par byed do /
cetaḥparyāyajñānena sattvānāṃ cittāni viditvā yathācittamebhyo dharma deśayati
# sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rnam grangs shes par byas nas / / sems ji lta ba bzhin du de dag la chos ston par byed do /
so 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsamātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cānusmarati / pūrvatathāgatadeśitāṃśca dharmānanusmṛtyatadvineyebhyaḥ sattvebhyo deśayati
# des bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te / / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos rjes su dran nas / / gdul bar bya ba'i sems gang yin pa dag la de ston par byed do /
sa āśravakṣayajñānena sattvānāmanurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
# des zag pa zad pa shes pas sems can rnams la rjes su mthun par chos ston to /
sa tābhirabhijñābhiryaṃ yamevākāṃkṣatyātmabhāvaṃ sattvānāmarthāya pratigrahītuṃ taṃ tameva pratigṛṇhāti / na ca tatra sukhaduḥkhānunayapratighairūpalipyata iti daśadigbuddhopāsanādiniveśanakarma
# des mngon par shes pa dag gis sems can rnams kyi don du bdag nyid kyi dngos po gang dang gang gzung bar 'dod pa de dang de nyid so sor len par byed par 'dod do / / der yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro bas mi gos so / / 'di ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bstan pa la sogs pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
kāni punarbodhisattvasya bodhyaṅgāni? ṣaṭpāramitāścatvāri dhyānāni yāvadāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ / yadi teṣu carati koṭitrayaṃ ca teṣāṃ nopalabhate
# yang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na / / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / / bsam gtan bzhi nas / / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar te / / de dag la spyod na 'khor gsum dag pas de dag la yang mi dmigs shing /
yadi cātmanaḥ samyaksambodhaye sarvasattvānāṃ cāgratāyai tān samyakpariṇāmayati / yadyamī bodhisattvadharmāḥ katame tarhi buddhadharmāḥ? eta eva
# bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang sems can thams cad kyi mchog gi don du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do / / gal te 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na / / de lta na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin zhe na / / gal te 'di dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
yadyobhaḥ sarvākārajñatāmabhisambudhyate prahīṇasarvavāsanānusandhiśca bhavati, ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā ca prajñayā sarvabuddhadharmānabhisambudhyate / na caivaṃ bodhisattva iti bodhyaṅganiveśanakarma / (RSt_189) / yadyapi svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāstathāpyasti karma, asti teṣāṃ phalam
# bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur zhing skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'di nyid de / / de lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i ni ma yin no / / 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / ji ltar yang chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid yin pa de lta mod kyi las kyang yod / / de dag gi 'bras bu yang yod de /
na hi sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānanti
# sems can rnams kyis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams mi shes so /
ajānantaḥ pudgalaṃ dharmāṃśca kalpayantaḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ vā / duścaritena triṣvapāyeṣu patanti / sucaritairdevamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante / kecitpunaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ parijñāya sugatidurgatīḥ prahāya nirvāṇamadhigacchanti
# mi shes pas chos dang gang zag tu btags nas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed cing nye bar spyod pas ngan song gsum du 'gro bar byed la legs par spyod pas lha dang mir skye ba yin no / / yang kha cig ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med par yongs su shes nas / / bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro yongs su spangs pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed do /
bodhisattvāḥ pāramitādīn kuśalān dharmānparipūrayantaḥ krameṇa daśabhūmīnadhigamyaikakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñāyā sarvadharmānabhisambudhya buddhā bhagavanto bhavantīti karmaphalasambandhāvipraṇāśananiveśanakarma / na bodhisattvaḥ satyaiḥ satyajñānairvā nirvāti
# byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par byas nas / / rim gyis sa bcu thob par byas te / / skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur te / / 'di ni las dang 'bras bur 'brel pa chud mi zha ba la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa dang bden pa mthong bas mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /
kintarhi? catuḥsatyasamatayā
# de lta mod kyi 'on kyang bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid de /
yā teṣāṃ samatā tathatā niḥsvabhāvatā sā na kaściddharmamupalabhate satyaparyāpannamanyaṃ vā
# gang de dag de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing ngo bo nyid med pas des chos gang yang dmigs pa med cing bden pa'i rnam grangs kyis rlom sems su mi byed la / / de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong nas /
tataḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti paśyanniyāyamamavakramya gotrabhūmau sthito bhavati dhyānānyutpādayatyapramāṇānyārūpyasamāpattīśca / sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā duḥkhaṃ parijānāti samudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti mārgaṃ bhāvayati / na ca satyārambaṇaṃ cittamutpādayati / kevalaṃ bodhinimnena cittena svalakṣaṇaśūnyānsarvadharmān paśyati
# skyon med pa la zhugs te rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur zhing / / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed de / / des 'dir zhi gnas kyi sa la gnas par byas nas / / sdug bsngal yongs su shes par byed / / kun 'byung spong bar byed / / 'gog pa mngon sum du byed / / lam sgom par byed kyang / / bden pa la dmigs pa'i sems skyed par mi byed / / byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kho nas rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad mthong ngo /
so 'nayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ paśyati
# des lhag mthong gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong nas /
upāyakauśalyena ca dharmaṃ deśayatīti catuḥsatyadarśananiveśanakarma
# thabs la mkhas pas kyang chos ston par byed do / / 'di ni bden pa bzhi mthong ba la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
"maitreya āha / yadi bhagavannabhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā kathaṃ bodhisattvena rūpādau śikṣitavyaṃ yāvadbuddhadharmeṣu? bhagavānāha
# byams pas gsal ba / / bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na / / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslab par bgyi ba lags /
nāmamātratayā / āha / saṃskāranimittena vastunā avastukaṃ nāmakathanaṃ nāmamātram
# bcom ldan 'das kyis ming tsam nyid do zhes bka' stsal pa dang gsol pa / / 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po dngos po med pa'i ming ni ming tsam mo /
saṃskāro vikalpaḥ
# 'du byed ni rnam par rtog pa'o /
tasya nimittaṃ viṣayaḥ
# de'i mtshan ma ni yul te /
yatraivaṃ bhavati / idaṃ rūpamiyaṃ vedanā yāvadamī buddhadharmā iti bhāvaḥ
# gang la 'di ltar 'di ni gzugs so / / 'di ni tshor ba'o zhes bya ba nas 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'i bar du dgongs so /
bhagavānāha / āgantukametannāmadheyamatra prakṣiptam / idaṃ rūpaṃ yāvadamī buddhadharmā iti / nāmābhedena nāmā ca (? nāmyartha)pratīteḥ / tasmādalīkaḥ śabdārtho vyavahāramātraṃ na vastu / āha / vyavahāramātratāpi rūpasya svabhāva eveti / rūpasvabhāva upalabdha eva bhavati / bhagavānāha / na rūpasya svabhāva eveti / rūpasvabhāva upalabdha eva bhavati / bhagavānāha / na tasyotpādanirodhau tato na sa svabhāvaḥ / āha / kiṃ punarbhagavan sarvaśaḥ svalakṣaṇena na santyeva rūpādayo yāvadbuddhadharmāḥ? bhagavānāha / santi lokasaṅketavyavahārato na nu paramārthataḥ / āha / yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi / anabhilāpya eṣa dhātuḥ paramārthataḥ / sacetsaskāranimittaṃ vastu sa evānabhilāpyo dhāturiti vyāhatametat
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / ming tsam mo zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du btags pa ste / / 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ming tha dad pas ming gi don du rtogs pa ni ma yin no / / de'i phyir sgra'i don ni brdzun te / / tha snyad tsam yin gyi / / dngos po ni ma yin no / / gsol pa / / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid tha snyad tsam nyid do zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / de la skye ba dang 'gag pa med de / / de bas na de rang gi ngo bo med do / / gsol pa yang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rang gi mtshan nyid gzugs la sogs pa nas / / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yod pa lags sam zhes so / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / 'jig rten gyi brda dang tha snyad du yod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no / / gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na / / don dam brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings nyid de / / gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings lags te tha snyad kyang 'di nyid do /
bhagavānāha / yadāte 'nabhilāpye dhātau prajñāpracāro bhavatyupalabhase
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / nam khyod brjod du med pa'i dbyings la shes rab spyod par 'gyur zhing /
tadā saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu / āha / nohīti / bhagavānāha / ata eva na tattasmādanyannāpyananyata / adyanyat kutastadā vinaṣṭam / athānanyat kuto nopalabhyate
# dmigs pa 'di nyid kyi rnam pa ni mtshan ma'i dngos po'o / / gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das ma lags so / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / 'di ltar de nyid kyi phyir de nyid kyang ma yin gzhan pa yang ma yin no / / gal te gzhan yin par gyur na ni de ci'i phyir 'jig par mi 'gyur ji ste gzhan ma yin na ni ci'i phyir mi dmigs /
api ca / yadyasau saṃskāranimittādanyaḥ syādapīdānī sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ parinirvāyuḥ samyaksambodhiṃ (RSt_190) cābhisambudhyeran
# gzhan yang gal te 'di 'du byed kyi mtshan ma las gzhan yin par gyur na ni de lta na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro /
athānanyaḥ syādapīdānīṃ tadapi nimittaṃ nopalabhyeta / āha / anabhilāpyadhātūpanibaddhe prajñāpracāre vartamāne yadi saṃskāranimittaṃ nopalabhyate tatkimasannopalabhyate sadvā? bhagavānāha
# ji ste gzhan ma yin par gyur na yang / / de ltar na mtshan ma de yang dmigs su med par 'gyur ro / / gsol pa / / brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang nye bar 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa na / / 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la dmigs su ma mchis na / / de ci lags mchis pa las dmigs su ma mchis sam / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
yadi vikalpato grahaṇameti na vikalpeṣvapagateṣu tadā parikalpamātraṃ taditi na tasya sattvamasattvaṃ vā / āha / katibhirākārairbhagavan dharmāṇāṃ prajñaptiḥ? tribhirmaitreya / yaduta parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ dharmatā rūpam / yāvatparikalpitā buddhadharmāḥ / vikalpitā buddhadharmāḥ / dharmatā buddhadharmā iti / tatra yā saṃskāranimitte vastuni rūpamiti nāmasaṅketavyavahāraṃ niśritya rūpasvabhāvatayā parikalpanā tatparikalpitaṃ rūpam
# gang gi tshe rnam par rtog pas gzung zhing rtogs pa'am / / ma rtogs pa de'i tshe ni de rnam par rtog pa tsam mo / / de la 'di ni yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin pa'o / / gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa dus chos yongs su gdags par bgyi / / byams pa rnam pa gsum gyis te / / 'di ltar kun du brtags pa'i gzugs dang rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs dang chos nyid kyi gzugs so / / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du kun du brtags pa dang rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos so / / de la gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang gdags pa dang tha snyad du bya ba la brten nas / / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su brtags pa gang yin pa de ni kun brtags pa'i gzugs so /
yattasya saṃskāranimittasya vikalpamātratāyāmavasthānaṃ tadvikalpitaṃ rūpam
# 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gnas pa de ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs so /
yā punastena parikalpitena rūpeṇa tasya vikalpitarūpasya nityakālaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā nairātmyaṃ tathatā bhūtakoṭistaddharmatārūpam
# kun du brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa des rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de la / / dus rtag tu ngo bo nyid med cing bdag med pa dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so /
evaṃ yāvatparikalpitavikalpitadharmatākhyā buddhadharmāḥ
# de bzhin du kun du brtags pa'i gzugs nas / / rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs dang chos nyid kyi gzugs kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang sbyar ro /
tatra parikalpitaṃ rūpamadravyam
# de la yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs ni rdzas su med do /
vikalpitaṃ sadravyaṃ vikalpitasadravyatayā, na svatantravṛttitaḥ
# rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs ni rdzas su yod de / / rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod par blta'i rang dbang du 'jug pa ni ma yin no /
dharmatārūpaṃ naivādravyaṃ na sadravyaṃ dharmatāprabhāvitam / evaṃ yāvadbuddhadharmāḥ
# chos nyid kyi gzugs ni rdzas med pa yang ma yin / / rdzas yod pa yang ma yin te / / chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'o / / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'o /
āha / yaduktaṃ bhagavatā / advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yaduta rūpamiti yāvadbuddhadharmā iti tatkatham? bhagavānāha / yatkalpitaṃ rūpaṃ na tadrūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt / na cārūpaṃ vyavahārataḥ / yadvikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ na tadrūpaṃ svatantravṛttitaḥ
# gsol pa / / gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / gang 'di ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis par bgrang ba zhes bya ba nas / / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du de ji ltar zhes bya ba'o / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / gang yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs de ni gzugs ma yin te / / dngos po med pa'i phyir dang tha snyad du yang gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / gang rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de ni gzugs ma yin te / / rang dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
na cārūpaṃ vikalpitarūpatvāt
# gzugs ma yin pa rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro /
yaddharmatārūpaṃ na tadrūpaṃ rūpavivekatvāt
# gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni gzugs ma yin te / / gzugs kyis dben pa'i phyir ro /
na cārūpaṃ rūpaparamārthatvāt / tasmādadvayasyaiṣā gaṇanā rūpamiti yāvadbuddhadharmā iti
# gzugs ma yin pa yang don dam pa'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su bgrangs so zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du sbyar ro /
āha / evamantadvayaṃ prahāya madhyamāpratipadaṃ pratipannasya rūpe yāvadbuddhadharmeṣu kathaṃ lakṣaṇaparijñā lakṣaṇaprahāṇa lakṣaṇasākṣātkriyā lakṣaṇabhāvanā ca? bhagavānāha
# gsol pa / / de ltar mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas / / gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag ji ltar mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa dang mtshan nyid spangs pa dang mtshan nyid mngon du bgyi ba dang ji ltar mtshan nyid bsgom pa'o / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
rūpasya yanna parijñānaṃ nāparijñānaṃ tadevāsya parijñānam / evaṃ yāvadyā bhāvanā nābhāvanā saiva bhāvanā / evaṃ yāvadbuddhadharmāṇām / āha / evaṃ parijñādisamanvāgatasya bodhisattvasya katamannirvāṇam? bhagavānāha
# gang gzugs yongs su shes pa yang ma yin / / yongs su mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o / / de bzhin du bsgom pa yang ma yin mi bsgom pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba nas / / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro / / gsol pa / / byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
gambhīrameṣāṃ nirvāṇaṃ yato na tannirvāṇaṃ nānirvāṇam
# mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab bo / / gang gi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa de ji ltar zab ce na /
tatkatham? yataḥ parānārabhya saṃsārāparityāga eṣāṃ na nirvāṇam
# gang gi phyir gzhan gyi don las brtsams nas 'khor ba yongs su gtong pa 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o / / bdag gi don las brtsams te /
ātmānamārabhya nirvāṇāparityāga eṣāṃ nirvāṇam / ekātyāga itaratyāgādayukta ubhayoratyāga iti cet
# mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ma gtang ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'o / / gcig ma btang na cig shos btang ba ni rigs kyi / / gnyi ga ma btang na ni mi rigs so zhe na / / gnyi ga la rnam par mi rtog pas / / gnyi ga la yang mi skyo ste /
ubhayoravikalpanādubhābhyāṃ nodvijate / tato yukta ubhayoratyāgaḥ / sa tarhi saṃsarati nirvāti ceti na yuktam? yadvodhisattvasya cittavaśitāprāptasyopāyakauśalyena saṃsārasaṃdarśanaṃ so 'sya saṃsārāparityāgaḥ
# de bas na gnyi ga yongs su ma btang ba yang rigs so / / de ltar na de ni 'khor bar yang 'gyur / / mya ngan las 'das par yang 'gyur bar yang mi rigs so zhe na / / gang byang chub sems dpa' sems la dbang thob cing thabs la mkhas pas 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ngo /
yā śūnyatā yā cānupalambhapratiṣṭhānatā so 'sya nirvāṇāparityāgaḥ
# gang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa la gnas pa'i phyir 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi gtong ngo /
āha / avikalpanāyāḥ samastaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ katamat? bhagavānāha / ye ca rūpādayaḥ sarvadharmāḥ / yā ca teṣāṃ śūnyatā / yā ca teṣāṃ tasyāśca bhāvābhāvādvayatā / yā cāprapañcanā / (RSt_191) idamavikalpanāyāḥ samastaṃ lakṣaṇam / āha / kinnu bhagavan sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇāmekāntena nirvāṇapratiṣṭhā bhavati? bhagavānāha / nānādhātuke loke nānābhūtāḥ sattvā nānāgotraprakṛutayaḥ / asti sā gotrajātiryā ādita eva praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate / tamevādhigacchati / asti yā hīnaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate / tamevādhigacchati / tenaiva santuṣyati / sa śamaikāyanaḥ śrāvakaḥ / asti yo hīnaṃ viśeṣa prārthayate / tamevādhigacchati na ca tāvatā santuṣyati / uttaripraṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate / sa bodhipariṇatikaḥ śrāvakaḥ / so 'rhattva prāpya cireṇa samyaksambodhiṃ prāpnoti / tasya tatprāptaye yā upapattayo na tāḥ karmakleśavaśena / api tvacintyāṃ nirvāṇapāragāminīmarhato 'pyupapattiṃ prajñapayāmi yā prathamā gotrajātiḥ sā bodhisattvānām / āha / āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadudārāśayā bodhisattvā māhātmyāśayāśca / bhagavānāha / yadamī śakratvalokapālatvacakravartitvādibhiḥ sarvalokasampattibhiranarthino 'nuttarāyāṃ bodhau kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayanti / tāsu ca niḥsaṅgatā niravagrahatā ca / iyameṣānudārāśayatā / yatpunastadaśa(sa)ktisukhamanavagrahasukhaṃ nirvṛtisukhaṃ ca tatsarva sarvasattvasādhāraṇamicchanto 'nuttarāyāṃ bodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayanti saṃsārāparityāgatayā
# gsol pa / / rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad ji ltar blta bar bgyi / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / gang yang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad dang de dag gi stong pa nyid dang gang yang de dag gi dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis su med pa dang gang yang spros pa med pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid do / / gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das ci lags / / nyan thos thams cad phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa lags / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / 'jig rten dag ni khams sna tshogs pa / / sems can gyi rigs dang rang bzhin rab tu mang po yod de / / rigs dang rus dang po nas / / bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing de dag thob pa yang yod do / / khyad par ngan pa 'dod cing de nyid thob pas / / de nyid kyis mgu bar 'gyur ba yang yod de / / nyan thos dgra bcom pa phyis bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing byang chub tu bsngos nas / / yun ring po nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed do / / de thob par bya ba'i phyir skye ba na / / las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis skye ba ni ma yin no / / 'on kyang dgra bcom pa mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i skye bar gdags te / / gang de la dang po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs dang rus so / / gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rgya che ba dang bdag nyid chen po bsam pa ni ngo mtshar to / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / gang 'di brgya byin nyid dang 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa mi 'dod cing gang yang de dag la chags pa med cing 'dzin pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rgya che ba'i bsam pa'o / / gang yang de chags pa med pa'i bde ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar 'dod pas / / dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed cing 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas /
iyameṣāṃ māhātmyāśayatā
# 'di ni de dag gi bdag nyid chen po'i bsam pa yin no /
āha / āścaryādbhūtā bhagavan bodhisattvadharmāḥ / tān prāptukāmairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayitavyam / ita ūrdhvam / subhūtirāha / abhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kathaṃ karmaphalavyavastheti
# gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so / / de thob par 'dod pas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o / / de'i 'og tu rab 'byor gyis gsol pa chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na / / ji ltar las dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag ce na /
bhagavānāha / dharmāṇāmabhāvasvabhāvamajānantaḥ sattvā viparyāsasamutthitairvikalpaiḥ karmāṇi kṛtvā yathākarmaphalāni prāpnuvanti
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ma shes sam / / sems can rnams phyin ci log las yang dag par byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa las byas nas /
" tatra catvāro viparyāsāḥ pudlanairātmyavipakṣaḥ / bhāveṣvabhiniveśo dharmanairātmyavipakṣaḥ / atra ca maitreyapraśnottarairvahavo viparyāsā nirastāḥ / subhūtipraśnottaraiḥ katicit / iti viparyāsaprahāṇaniveśanakarma
# las ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu thob par byed do / / de la phyin ci log ni bzhi ste / / gang zag la bdag med pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang dngos po la mngon par zhen pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang chos la bdag med pa'o / / 'dir byams pas zhus pa'i lan gyis phyin ci log mang po yang bsal cing rab 'byor gyis zhus pa'i lan gyis phyin ci log mang po yang bsal nas / / rab 'byor gyis zhus pa'i lan cung zad kyang bsal ba 'di ni phyin ci log spong ba la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
viparyāsena sattvāḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti
# sems can rnams phyin ci log rnams las mngon par 'du byed de /
tataḥ saṃkliśyante ca lokavyavahāreṇa na paramārthataḥ
# de las kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi /
na hi kiñcidvastvasti vālāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātrakamapi yatra sthitvā karma kuryuḥ / tadyathā svapnamāyādiṣviti viparyāsanirvastukatājñānaniveśanakarma
# don dam par ni ma yin pa'i phyir te / / gang du gnas pa'i las kyi bya ba'i dngos po skra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam gzhag pa ci yang yod pa ma yin te / / dper na rmi lam dang sgyu ma la sogs pa lta bu'o / / 'di ni phyin ci log bzhi med par shes pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā tathatā bhūtakoṭistanirvāṇam / tacca lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahriyate na paramārthato 'nabhilāpyatvāditi vyavadānaniveśanakarma
# gang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no / / brjod du med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par byang ba la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
yadyapi svapnamāyopamāḥ sarvadharmā nirvastukāstathāpi tadajānantaḥ sattvā vastvabhiniveśena karmāṇi kṛtvā sugatidurgati gacchanti
# chos thams cad gzhi med cing rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de lta mod kyi / / de ma shes pas sems can mngon par zhen cing las byas nas bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror 'gyur te /
atasteṣāṃ viparyāsaprahāṇāya bodhisattvo bodhau cittamutpādya saṃsāre carati
# des na de dag gi phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir / / byang chub sems dpa' sems pa chen pos byang chub tu sems bskyed de / / tshogs rnams la spyod cing /
yāvadabhisambudhya sattvān parimocayatīti vyavadānasambhāraniveśanakarma
# mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas / / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i bar 'di ni tshogs la dgod pa'i phrin las so /
(RSt_192) / "bhagavānāha / na dvayenābhisamayo nādvayena ! eṣa evātrābhisamayo yatra na dvayaṃ nādvayam
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / gnyis kyis kyang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med / / gnyis med pas kyang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med pa 'di nyid ni gang la gnyis med pa dang gnyis med pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o /
tatkasya hetoḥ? prapañco eṣa yo 'yameṣāmabhisamayaḥ / na ca dharmasamatāyāṃ prapañcosti / niṣprapañcā dharmasamatā / saiva sarvadharmāḥ / saiva sarvapṛthagjanāryapudgalāḥ / saiva buddharatnaṃ saṃgharatnaṃ ca / samatā hi dharmatā / na ca dharmatāyā nānātvamasti / subhūtirāha / kiṃ dharmatā saṃskṛtā kiṃ asaṃskṛtā / bhagavānāha / na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā / yaśca saṃskṛto dhāturyaścāsaṃskṛta ubhāvetau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau na rūpiṇau anidarśanāvapratighāvekalakṣaṇau yadutālakṣaṇau" iti saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtāvyatibhedena jñānaniveśanakarma / "bhagavānāha / sarvadharmāḥ subhūte svabhāvena śūnyāḥ
# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang 'di mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste / / chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de / / spros pa med pa ni mnyam pa nyid do / / de nyid chos thams cad do / / de nyid so so'i skye bo thams cad dang 'phags pa'i gang zag go / / de nyid sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang chos dkon mchog dang dge 'dun dkon mchog go / / mnyam pa nyid ni chos nyid de / / chos nyid la yang tha dad pa ni med do / / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / / ci chos nyid 'dus bgyis pa lags sam / / 'dus ma bgyis pa lags / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / 'dus byas kyang ma yin / / 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin no / / gang yang 'dus byas kyi khams dang gang yang 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'di gnyi ga ldan pa yang ma yin / / mi ldan pa yang ma yin te / / gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o / / 'di ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos tha dad pa med par shes pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste / / de ni nyan thos kyis ma byas /
te na śrāvakairna pratyekabuddhairna tathāgataiḥ kṛtāḥ / yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā tannirvāṇaṃ" iti nirvāṇaniveśanakarma
# rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas / / byang chub sems dpas ma byas / / sangs rgyas kyis ma byas te / / gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o /
kāritrasyaiva vyāpitvaṃ darśayitumāha / sarvadharmākopyatayā prajñāpāramitākopyatānugantavyeti / kāritramācāraḥ / ācāro dharmaḥ / "nyāyo hi sācāro dharmaḥ svabhāvaśca dharmākhyaḥ" iti vacanāt / sarvo dharmaḥ saptaviṃśatividhaṃ kāritram / tasyākopyatā avadhyatā / daśadiksarvalokadhātusthiteṣu sarvasattveṣu sarvairākāraiḥ yathā bhājanamavicchedena yāvadākāśaṃ pravṛttiḥ
# 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so / / mdzad pa'i khyad par nyid du bstan pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khrug pa med par rjes su rig par bya ste / / mdzad pa ni spyod pa'o / / spyod pa ni chos te / / rig pa dang rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang dpe dang ngo bo dang chos shes pa'i tshig gis te chos thams cad mdzad pa nyi shu rtsa bdun po dag go / / de 'khrug pa med pa ni gnod pa med pa nyid de / / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la rnam pa thams cad kyis gnod pa ji lta ba zhin du rgyun mi 'chad par nam mkha' snyed du 'jug pa'o /
tayā tajjanikayā bhagavataḥ prajñāpāramitāyā akopyatā tādṛśyeva veditavyā
# de skyed par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'khrug pa med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi sku'i phrin las so /
ityuktaṃ dharmakāyasya kāritram / samudrāparyantatāvākyādibhirakopyatāvākyaparyantaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyā ye viśeṣā uktāsteṣāṃ pāramārthikaṃ jñānamānupūrvyā darśayitukāmaḥ pṛcchati tatkasya hetoriti / ekakṣaṇābhisamayadharmakāyasambandhibhiranugamavākyairyaduktaṃ tatsarvaṃ kasya hetoḥ kena kāraṇenetyarthaḥ / rūpaṃ hītyādikamuttaram / iha samudro 'paryantaḥ śūnyatāmātratvāt
# rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba nas / / chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khyad par gang dag gsungs nas / / de dag don dam par shes pa rim bzhin du bstan par 'dod nas / / de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya bas dris te / / skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang chos kyi sku dang 'brel pa'i rtog pa'i tshig gang gsungs pa de dag thams cad kyi gtan tshigs ni gang ste / / rgyu gang zhes bya ba'i don to / / rab 'byor gzugs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni len te / / 'dir rgya mtsho mu med pa ni stong pa nyid tsam yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
tasyāśca pramāṇābhāt / evaṃ rūpādayopi pañcaskandhāḥ samudrasamāḥ
# de yang tshad med pa'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga yang rgya mtsho dang mtshungs so /
tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi / tathā hi ye ca rūpādayo yā ca teṣāṃ śūnyatā yā ca prajñāpāramitā sarva ete na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā ekalakṣaṇā yadutālakṣaṇā iti bhāvaḥ / evaṃ gaganasamatādayopi jñātavyāḥ / yāvadanupalabdhiriti / akliṣṭamajñānam / evaṃ hītyādi / evaṃ hīti / yathaite 'ṣṭāvabhisamayāḥ saparicchadā nirdiṣṭastathaivetyarthaḥ / anugantavyeti anusartavyā / tataḥ kiṃ karaṇīyamityāha yadetyādi
# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no / / de ltar gang yang gzugs la sogs pa dang gang yang de dag gis stong pa nyid dang gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin / / gzugs med pa dang bstan du med pa dang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste / / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes dgongs so / / gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o zhes bya ba nas mi dmigs pa'i bar du'o zhes bya ba'i bar du yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o / / mi dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa'o / / rab 'byor de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ji ltar na mngon par rtogs pa brgyad le'u dang bcas par bstan pa de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te / / rjes su rig par bya'o / / ci zhig bya ba yin zhe na / / rab 'byor gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
anugamiṣyatīti vyañjanakāyena śroṣyati / (RSt_193) vyavacārayiṣyatītyarthaśarīreṇa jñāsyati
# rjes su rig par byed pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge'i tshogs kyis nyan par byed pa'o / / rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba ni don gyi ngo bos so /
avatariṣyatīti śraddhāsyati / avabhotsyata iti prajñāsyati / cintayiṣyatīti catasṛbhirvicāraṇāyuktibhiścintayiṣyati vicārayiṣyati / evamevaitannānyatheti / yāni punaḥ sthānāni cintayan bālaḥ śaktikṣayāt khinna unmādyet mūrcchet maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet tāni sthānānyacintyāni teṣu tulayiṣyati / yathaitāni bhagavatā paramayogīśvareṇa dṛṣṭāni tathaiva nirdiṣṭāni / asmākametānyacintā(ntyā)ni tarkāgocaratvāditi upaparīkṣiṣyata iti / etāvataiva sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chedanādavadhārayiṣyatyevamevaitaditi
# 'jug pa dang rtog par byed pa zhes bya bas ni rab tu shes par byed pas so / / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pas 'di lta bu nyid yin gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes sems pa ni sems pa'o / / yang byis pa nus pa zad pas skyo pa dang smyos pa dang brgyal ba'am / / 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag mi bsam par gang yang gnas la sems pa de dag ni 'jal bar byed pa'o / / ji ltar 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dam pas gzigs pa ste / / bdag gis ni 'di dag bsam par bya ba ma yin te / / rtog pa can gyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni nye bar rtog par 'gyur ba'o / / 'di lta bu'i the tshom thams cad chad pa'i phyir 'di ni yin no zhes nges par 'dzin par byed pa'o /
evamatīva cchinneṣu saṃśayeṣu bhavanāyā adhikāraḥ / ata āha
# de ltar the tshom thams cad shin tu chad na / / sgom pa la dbang du 'gyur te /
bhāvayiṣyatīti / caturvidhā bhāvanā
# de'i phyir sgom par 'gyur ba zhes gsungs so / / sgom pa ni rnam pa bzhi te /
śamatho vipaśyanā śamathavipaśyane śamathavipaśyanābhiratiśca / kīdṛśairmanasikārairityāha / sarvamāyetyādi / ahamiti mameti rūpamiti vedanetyevamādikaḥ sarvābhiniveśaḥ sarvamanyanā
# zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang de gnyi ga dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mngon par dga' ba'o / / ji lta bur yid la byed pa yin zhe na / / sgyu dang gyo thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la / / bdag ces bya ba dang bdag gi zhes bya ba dang gzugs zhes bya ba dang tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad la /
manyāśabdāṇṇijantādyac manyanā / sarvaparapravādibhirmārādibhiḥ kleśaiśca yāḥ kampanāḥ tāḥ sarveñjanāḥ
# mngon par zhen pa thams cad ni rlom sems thams cad do / / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang bdud la sogs pa dang nyon mongs pa gang bskyod pa ni thams cad bskul ba'o /
tadā nāsya durlabhetyādi / sarvaguṇānāmiti bodhisattvaguṇānām
# de'i tshe de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / yon tan thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan no / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi zhes bya ba ni yon tan no /
buddhakṣetrasyeti guṇānāṃ paripūririti vartate / śeṣaṃ sugamam
# yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'gyur pa ste / / lhag ma ni rtogs par sla'o /
sūtrasyārtho 'ṣṭavabhisamayāḥ śāstre prathamamuddiṣṭāḥ / ta iyatā vistareṇa nirdiṣṭāḥ / punaḥ śāstram- / 'lakṣaṇaṃ tatprayogastatprakarṣastadanukramaḥ / tanniṣṭhā tadvipākaścetyanyaḥ ṣoḍhārthasaṃgrahaḥ / athavā ṣaḍarthāḥ sūtrasya / sarvākārajñatā mārgajñatā sarvajñatā ceti trayametallakṣaṇaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
# mdo'i don ni mngon par rtogs pa brgyad de / / bstan bcos kyi dang por bstan nas / / de rgyas par bshad do / / yang bstan bcos las / / mtshan nyid de yi sbyor ba dang / / de rab de yi go rims dang / / de mtha' de yi rnam smin ni / / don bsdus gzhan te rnam pa drug / / ces bya ba gsungs te / / yang na mdo'i don ni drug ste / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid dang thams cad shes pa nyid gsum po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
yatastrividhaiva sā / caturthaḥ sarvākārābhisambodhiḥ / so 'syāṃ prayogaḥ / caryetyarthaḥ / pañcamo mūrdhābhisamayaḥ / so 'syāṃ prayogaprakarṣaḥ / ṣaṣṭho 'nupūrvābhisamayaḥ so 'syāṃ prayogānukramaḥ
# gang gi phyir de ni rnam pa gsum mo / / bzhi pa rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa ste / / 'di ni de la sbyor ba'o / / lnga pa rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni sbyor ba'i rab po / / drug pa mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni sbyor ba'i go rims te /
anupūrvaprayoga ityarthaḥ
# mthar gyis sbyor zhes bya ba'i don to /
saptama ekakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ / so 'syāṃ prayoganiṣṭhāḥ
# bdun pa skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni sbyor ba'i mthar phyin pa'o /
aṣṭamo dharmakāyaḥ / so 'syāṃ vipākaḥ / pradhānaphalamityarthaḥ
# brgyad pa chos kyi sku 'di ni de'i rnam par smin pa ste 'bras bu'i gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to / / yang bstan bcos las / / yul gyi rgyu ni gsum dag dang /
punaḥ śāstram- / 'viṣayastritayo hetuḥ prayogaścaturātmakaḥ / dharmakāyaḥ phalaṃ karmetyanyastredhārthasaṃgrahaḥ / athavā trayorthāḥ sutrasya / hetuḥ prayogaḥ phalaṃ ca / tatra trividhaḥ prayogaviṣayo hetuḥ / sarvākārajñatā mārgajñatā sarvajñatā ca / catvāro 'rthāḥ prayogaḥ prayogasāmānyāt / sarvākārābhisambodho mūrdhābhisamayo 'nupūrvābhisamaya ekakṣaṇābhisambodhaśceti
# sbyor ba bzhi yi bdag nyid dang / / chos sku phrin las 'bras bu ni / / don bsdus gzhan te rnam pa gsum / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / yang na mdo'i don ni gsum ste / / rgyu dang sbyor ba dang 'bras bu'o / / de la sbyor ba'i yul ni rgyu rnam pa gsum ste / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid dang thams cad shes pa nyid do / / thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir bzhi ni sbyor ba'i don te / / rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa dang mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa dang skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'o /
(RSt_194) phalaṃ dharmakāyaḥ karma ca / vināpi tenārthagateḥ
# chos kyi sku ni 'bras bu'o / / phrin las dang zhes bya ba'i sgra med kyang gang gi don du rtogs par bya'o /
arthasaṃgrahaḥ sakalasūtrārthasya saṃkṣepaḥ / tatra prathamo 'ṣṭadhā / dvitīyaḥ ṣoḍhā / tṛtīyastredhā
# don bsdus ni mdo'i don rnams bsdus pa ste / / de la dang po ni brgyad do / / gnyis pa ni drug go / / gsum pa ni rnam pa gsum mo /
anugamasya vācakaḥ parivarto 'nugamaparivartaḥ
# rjes su rig par byed pa'i tshig gi le'u ni rjes su rig pa'i le'u'o /
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyā ekonatriṃśattamaḥ parivartaḥ / 30. sadāpraruditaparivarto nāma triṃśattamaḥ / aṣṭābhirabhisamayairbhagavatī nirdiṣṭā / sā yathā veditavyā tannoktam / atastabhdagavān vica(va)kṣurāha punaraparamityādinā / paryeṣṭavyeti icchateḥ prayogaḥ / paryeṣitā paryeṣamāṇeneti / eṣṛ ityasya bhauvādikasya prayogaḥ / kāyaklamathādimanasikārāṇāṃ pratiṣedho vīryātiśayārthaḥ / mā ca kvacidityādinā vikṣepapratiṣedhaḥ
# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i mngon par rtogs pa brgyad po de ji ltar btsal bar bya ba de ma gsungs te / / de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de 'chad par bzhed nas / / gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / yongs su btsal bar bya zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i sbyor ba'o / / lus ngal ba la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dgag pa ni brtson 'grus lhag pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig ces bya ba ni rnam par gyeng ba dgag pa'o /
mā praṇidhā iti mā niveśaya / kvacita ityuddeśaḥ
# smon par ma byed cig ces bya ba ni zhen par ma byed cig pa'o / / gang la yang zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā veti nirdeśaḥ
# nang dang phyi rol zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'o /
adhiśabdo 'dhikaraṇārthaḥ / tato vitarkyārthe 'vyayībhāvaḥ / ana ityac samāsāntaḥ ṭilopaḥ / bahirdheti bahirityarthaḥ / mā gā iti sambandhaḥ
# bdag gis dbang du byas pa'i don ni nang ste / / rnam par dbye ba bdun pa'i zad par mi 'gyur pa'i bsdu ba'o / / phyi rol zhes bya ba ni phyi'o / / ma byed cig pa ni song zhig pa dang sbyar ro /
māṅi luṅ, iṇo gā luṅi, gātisthetyādinā sico luk / na māṅyoga ityaḍāgamapratiṣedhaḥ / vāmena dakṣiṇeneti pārśveneti bhāvaḥ / pūrveṇetyādinā diśāṃ nirdeśaḥ / anuvidiśamiti vidiśām / anuśabdo vīpsāyām / vidiśi vidiśītyanuvidiśam / avyayībhāve śaratprabhṛtibhya ityac samāsāntaḥ / tathā ca kulaputretyādinā atattvamanasikārāṇāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ / nātmato na satkāyata iti / sīdatīti sat
# g yon dang gyas zhes bya ba ni logs zhes dgongs so / / shar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyogs bstan to / / phyogs mtshams zhes bya ba ni mtshams so / / yang zhes bya ba ni mtshams dang mtshams zhes bya bar zlos pa'i don to / / phyogs mtshams la yang zad par mi 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba bya'o / / rigs kyi bu ci nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dgag pa'o / / bdag las ma yin 'jig tshogs las kyang ma yin zhes bya ba la / / 'jig pas ni 'jig pa'o /
rāśitvātkāyaḥ / anityo rūpādirāśiḥ satkāya ityucyate
# lus yin pas na tshogs te mi rtag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la 'jig tshogs zhes brjod do /
satkāye pudgalaḥ prajñapyate / ataśca nātmato na satkāyataścalasīti / na dravyasatā pudgalarūpeṇa nāpi prajñaptisatā / ubhayoranupalambhādityarthaḥ / na rūpataścetyādi / nāpi rūpādibhiḥ skandhaiḥ / dharmāṇāmapyanupalabdheriti bhāvaḥ
# 'jig tshogs la gang zag tu 'dogs so / / des na bdag las ma yin / / 'jig tshogs las kyang ma gyos zhes bya ba ni gang zag rdzas su yod pa yang ma yin btags par yod pa yang ma yin te / / gnyi gyang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to / / ci nas gzugs la sogs pa la ma yin te zhes bya ba la / / gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so zhes dgongs so /
ataścalatīti ebhiścalati / eṣāṃ samāropeṇa vitiṣṭhat iti nivartate
# de'i phyir gyos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gis gyos pa'o / / 'di dag la sgro 'dogs pa ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
śeṣaṃ sugamam / vaiśabdo 'vadhāraṇe / evamevetyarthaḥ / ālokamiti mokṣamārgasya deśanām / samudānetukāma iti / ātmani samyagutpādayitukāmaḥ / adhimuktimiti
# ldog pa'o / / lhag ma ni rtogs sla'o / / de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de bzhin du nges par gzung ba zhes bya ba'i don to / / snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i lam ston pa'o / / sgrub par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la yang dag par skyes par 'dod pa'o /
evamevaitadityavadhāraṇam / kva? sarvadharmeṣu / kīdṛśeṣu? śūnyānimittāpraṇihiteṣu
# mos pa bskyed la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'di nges par gzung ba gang las she na / / chos thams cad la'o / / ji lta bu zhe na / / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dag la ste /
yathāpratibhāsamarthābhāvācchūnyeṣu
# ji ltar snang ba don med pa'i stong pa dag la'o /
tasya ca pratibhāsasya bhrāntinimittasya prakṛtinirodhādanimitteṣu
# de yang 'khrul pa snang ba'i mtshan ma rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa'i phyir ro / / mtshan ma med pa de dag la'o /
(RSt_195) ataśca bhrāntimātratayā dṛṣṭe traidhātuke praṇidhānābhāvādapraṇihiteṣu / śūnyatāśabdaḥ kvacitpaṭhyate
# des na 'khrul pa tsam du mthong ba'i khams gsum pa dag la smon pa med pa'i phyir smon pa med pa dag la'o / / kha cig tu stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'don te /
tatra svārthe tal / nimittaparivarjitenetyuddeśaḥ
# der ni rang gi don la dngos po'i rkyen bya'o / / mtshan ma yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
bhrāntinimittayorvastvabhiniveśastadiha nimittam
# 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma can gyis dngos po la mngon par zhen pa de ni 'dir mtshan ma ste /
tatparivarjitena bhāvaparivarjitena sattvadṛṣṭiparivarjitena ceti nirdeśaḥ
# de yongs su spangs pas so / / dngos po yongs su spangs pa dang sems can du lta ba yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'o /
bhāvo dharmadṛṣṭi sattvadṛṣṭirātmadṛṣṭiḥ
# dngos po ni chos su lta ba'o / / sems can du lta ba ni bdag tu lta ba ste /
tābhyāṃ parivarjitenetyarthaḥ
# de dag yongs su spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
yānītyādi / yāni dharma deśayantīti sambandhaḥ / śūnyānimittāpraṇihitāḥ pūrvavat
# dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhes bya ba ni chos ston pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro / / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni snga ma bzhin no /
niḥsvabhāvasya notpādo na jātirna nirodhaḥ / yasya notpādanirodhau so 'bhāvaḥ / tasmād anutpādā ajātā anirodhā abhāvāḥ sarvadharmā ityevaṃ yāni dharmaṃ deśayanti tāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi
# dngos po med pa ni ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'o / / gang ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa de ni dngos po med pa ste / / de bas na ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa dang dngos po med pa'i chos rnams so / / de ltar chos ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
arthādgamyate tadviparītaṃ dharma yāni deśayanti tāni pāpamitrāṇi / pratipadyamāno anutiṣṭhan / kṛtajña śrutajñānāt
# de las bzlog pa'i chos ston pa ni sdig pa'i grogs por don gyis rtog par bya'o / / bsgrubs na zhes bya ba ni gnas na'o / / byas pa gzo pa ni thos pa byas pa'i phyir ro /
kṛtavedī śrutaphalajñānāt
# byas pa tshor ba ni thos pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'i phyir ro /
paritulayamāneneti cintayatā
# yongs su rtogs la zhes bya ba ni sems pas so /
lokāmiṣaṃ annapānavastrādi / tena pratisaṃyuktā tadabhilāṣiṇī
# 'jig rten gyi zang zing zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang btung ba dang gos la sogs pa'o / / ldan pa zhes bya ba ni de mngon par 'dod par bya ba'o /
anubaddhavyo 'nugantavyaḥ / asti hīti / asti khalvetat / sevitumityādeḥ padatrayasya paribhoktumityarthaḥ
# 'brang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro bar bya ba'o / / yod de zhes bya ba ni 'di yod pa'o / / bsnyen pa la sogs tshig gsum gyis ni kun nas bsten pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
abhibhūyeti nirdoṣīkṛtya / sattvavinayeneti sattvānāṃ cittarakṣārtham
# zil gyis mnan nas zhes bya ba ni nyes pa med par byas pas so / / sems can gdul bya zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ro /
parigrahamupādāyeti parigrahārtham
# rab tu gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni yongs su gzung ba'i don to /
saṅgastṛṣṇā / ārambaṇamupalambhaḥ / bhūtanaya paramārthaprabhedaḥ
# chags pa ni sred pa'o / / sgrib pa ni dmigs pa'o / / yang dag pa'i tshul ni don dam pa'i bye brag go /
saṃkleśābhāvād asaṃkleśāḥ / vyavadānābhāvād avyavadānāḥ
# kun nas nyon mongs pa med pas na kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin no / / rnam par byang ba med pas na / / rnam par byang ba ma yin no /
niḥsattvādipadaiḥ pudgalanairātmyamāha / māyopamādipadairdharmanairātmyam
# chos thams cad ni sems can med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni gang zag la bdag med pa gsungs so / / sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni chos la bdag med pa gsungs so /
prativāṇiḥ prativacanam / aniviṇṇamakhinnam / anuśāsanī upadeśaḥ
# phyir bsngo ba zhes bya ba ni lan gyi tshig go / / yid mi skyo ba zhes bya ba ni mi skyo ba'o /
auṇādiko 'nirdharaṇīvat / rudan aśrupātena / krandan dīnasvaraiḥ / śocan utkaṇṭhamānaḥ / paridevamāno vilapan anubaddha iti samanvitaḥ / kvacillyapaḥ pāṭhaḥ / tasyāpi pūrvādikkarma / anuparikṣiptā pariveṣṭitā / parikhāḥ khātayaḥ / ṛddhā dhanasampattyā / sphītā gṛhodyānādiśobhayā / kṣemā nirupadravatvāt / subhikṣā sulabhānnapānatvāt / ākīrṇo vistīrṇaḥ / bahu nānāvidho janaḥ parivāro yeṣāṃ te tathā / tādṛśā manuṣyā yasyāṃ sā tathā
# bstan pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar bstan pa'o / / du [?] zhing ni mchi ma 'byin pas so / / chos de ni dman pa'i sgras so / / mya ngan ni 'dod pa'i yid do / / smra ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs smra ba'o / / rjes su 'brang ba ni ldan pas so / / bskor ba ni yongs su bskor ba'o / / 'o bas ni 'o bas so / / 'byor pa ni nor phun sum tshogs pa'o / / rgyas pa ni shing dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pas so / / bde ba ni 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir ro / / lo legs pa ni bza' ba dang btung ba rnyed sla ba'i phyir ro / / gang ba ni rgya che ba'o / / mang po ni skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs so / / gang dag la 'khor de lta bu yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
antarasyāntare āpaṇaḥ krayavikrayasthānam / tasmin vithīśatāni / taiḥ pañcabhiḥ nirviddhā niḥśeṣaṃ viddhā
# gang na mi de lta bu yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o / / bar ni nang ngo / / srang ni nyo tshong gi gnas te / / de ni srang lnga brgya dag gis nges par gtams pa ni ma lus par gtams pa ste /
vithīnāmā prakārāntamubhayato gamanāt / ālekhyena vicitrāṇi ca tāni citrāṇi cādbhūtatvāt
# lam srang ra ba'i mthar thug par ri mor bris pa lta bur gtams pa'o / / ri mo yang yin la bris pa yang yin pas ri mor bris pa'o / / bris pa ni ngo mtshar ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
sadṛśāni ca purānurūpatvāt
# bzhin du zhes bya ba ni grong dang rjes su mthun par ro /
taiḥ anutpīḍamasaṃbādhaṃ janayugyayānānāṃ saṃkramasthānāni saṃbhūya gamanasthānāni vistīrṇarathyāḥ
# des nyam mi nga ba na mnyam zhing gsal ba'o / / skye bo dang khri dang bzhon pa rnams 'dus nas 'gro ba'i gnas ni yang dag par 'dus nas 'gro ba'i gnas te /
teṣāṃ sthāpitāni sthāpanāni / bhāve ktaḥ / taiḥ sumāpitā suracitā / tatra janaḥ padikādilokāḥ
# lam srang rgya che ba'o / / de dag gzhag pa ni gnas pa'o / / legs par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni legs par brgyan pa'o / / de la skye bo la sogs pa ni 'jig rten no /
(RSt_196) yugyāni vāhanāni / yānāni rathāḥ / anantaratvātparasparatulyatvācca samasamaiḥ
# khri ni khyogs so / / bzhon pa ni shing rta'o / / gong na med pa'i phyir dang phan tshun mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'o /
khoḍakaśīrṣāṇi kramaśīrṣāṇi / upodgatānīti prākārādativistīrṇāt kiñcinnirgatyodgatāni
# mda' yab rnams ni ka zhu la sogs pa'o / / mtho ba ni ra ba las shin tu rgya che ba cung zad mtho zhing phyir 'dor ba'o /
pramāṇavantīti pṛthūni tuṅgāni ca
# tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yangs shing mtho ba'o /
nānāvicitrarityanyathānyathā vicitraiḥ
# rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o /
sarvataśca khoḍakavṛkṣānnirgatā vṛkṣāntaram / yathābhavati tathāvasaktam / sarvamasyāmastīti sarvāvanī / kiṅkiṇījāleneti catuṣprākārakhoḍakavṛkṣāvasaktamaṇisūtracatuṣṭayāvavaddhānekamaṇisūtravalambinā
# mda' yab las skyes pa'i shing thams cad kyang mda' yab gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang ji ltar yod pa de bzhin du 'brel pa'o / / thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la thams cad yod pas na thams cad dang ldan pa'o / / g yer ka'i dra ba zhes bya ba ni ra ba'i ngos bzhi'i mda' yab dang 'brel pa'i shing nor bu'i skud pa bzhis sbrel ba la nor bu'i skud pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'phyang ba'o /
valguḥ / śrotrasukhatvāt / rañjanīyo manoharatvāt / pañcāṅgāni vīṇāvaṃśādīni / gandharvā gāyanāḥ
# 'jam pa ni rnar snyan pa'i phyir ro / / yid du 'ong ba ni sems bde ba nyid kyi phyir ro / / snyan pa ni yid 'phrog pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / yan lag lnga pa ni pi wang dang gling bu la sogs pa'o / / mkhas pa ni glu mkhan sna tshogs so / / rtse ba ni rna bas so /
krīḍanti śrotreṇa, ramante manasā, paricārayanti kāyavākparispandaiḥ
# dga' ba ni sems kyis so / / rab tu rgyu pa ni lus dang ngag gi kun du gyo ba'o /
parikhāḥ khātayaḥ / anusārivārivāhinya iti vātādyanusāriṇā jalapravāheṇa yuktāḥ
# 'obs ni 'obs so / / chu rjes su mthun par 'bab pa zhes bya ba ni rlung la sogs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chu'i rgyun dang ldan pa'o /
padmaṃ raktakamalam / puṇḍarīkaṃ sitapadmam / abhijātābhijātariti praṇītapraṇītaiḥ / sugandhaśabdaḥ surabhiparyāyaḥ
# padma ni padma dmar po'o / / pu nda r'i ka ni padma dkar po'o / / rigs che zhing che ba zhes bya ba ni gya nom pa bas gya nom pa'o / / dri zhim po'i sgra ni dri zhim po'i rnam grangs so /
tatpuṣkariṇīnāmityudyānapuṣkariṇīnāṃ pramāṇam / samantāditi sarvapārśveṣu / krośaḥ krośa iti vīpsā
# rdzing bu de dag ces bya ba ni skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing bu'o / / khor yug gi tshad ces bya ba ni chos thams cad du'o / / rgyang grags rgyang grags zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa'o /
nīlādipadāni prāgvyākhyātāni / upanikūjitā buddhanetrī prajñāpāramitā
# mthing ga la sogs pa'i tshig ni snga ma bshad pa'o / / sgra 'byin pa ni sgra sgrogs pa'o / / sangs rgyas kyi tshul ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
tasyā citrīkāraḥ paraḥ prasādaḥ / tenānugataṃ sugatebhyaḥ śrutacittaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā / teṣāṃ madhye śrṛṅgāṭakasyeti sambandhaḥ / samantāditi pratipārśvam
# de la gus par byed pa ni mchog tu dang ba ste / / des rjes su 'gro ba'o / / gang dag la bde bar gshegs pa dag las thos pa bsams pa dag la ste / / de ltar de rnams kyi'o / / grong khyer gyi dbus na bzhi mdo zhes bya bar sbyar ro / / khor yug ces bya ba ni ngos so sor ro /
gṛhaparibhoga iti gṛhasya pariveṣṭaḥ / kimarthamityāha / upabhogaribhogāyeti
# khang ba'i longs spyod ni bskor ba'o / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / nye bar longs spyod pa dang yongs su longs spyod pa'o /
upabhogaḥ phalapuṣpādīnām
# nye bar longs spyod pa ni 'bras bu dang me tog la sogs pa'o /
paribhogaḥ sākalyena bhogo vanavihārādinā / vivaraṃ sandhiḥ
# yongs su longs spyod pa ni ma lus pa ste / / 'chag sar 'chag pa la sogs pa'o /
tasminnantaraṃ avakāśaḥ / samarpitaḥ saṅgamitaḥ / tairavakāśaguṇaiḥ / sarvendriyāṇāmanugrahaḥ samanvaṅgaḥ
# bar zhes bya ba ni mtshams te / / phyi nang gi skabs so / / ldan pa ni 'byor pa'o / / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis dbang po thams cad rjes su 'dzin pas na dbang ngo /
tadyogāt samanvaṅgī krīḍati vācā / ramate manasā / paricārayati kāyena / tāvatkālamiti parimitakālam / tata iti krīḍādikālādūrdhvam
# de dang ldan pa ni dbang du gyur pa'o / / rtse ba ni dag gis so / / dga' ba ni yid kyis so / / kun du spyod pa ni lus kyis so / / dus re zhig ces bya ba ni dus thung ba'o / / de nas zhes bya ba ni rtse ba la sogs pa'i dus kyi 'og tu'o /
trikālamiti prāṇhamadhyānhāparānheṣu
# dus gsum zhes bya ba ni snga dro dang nyi ma phyed dang phyi dro dag tu'o /
āsanasya viśeṣaṇaṃ suvarṇapādakamityādi / ardhakrośamuccastveneti yāvat
# khri'i khyad par ni gser gyi rkang pa dang zhes bya ba nas 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bsham par bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so / / shing bal bting ba'am /
tūlikayā vā āstīrṇaṃ goṇikayā vā garbholikācīnāṃśukapratyāstaraṇam / upari sā asyeti uparigarbholikama
# go ni ka'i stan nas zhes bya ba la / / go ni ka ni rgya'i gos kyi stan no / / 'di la steng na yod pas ni steng snying po can du byas pa'o /
kāśikavastraṃ vārāṇaseyakaṃ divyaṃ vā / tat pratyāstaraṇamasyeti tathoktam / samaṃ yathā bhavati na viṣamaṃ tathā dhārayanti pramāṇavabhdiḥ stambhaiḥ
# ka shi ka'i gos bting ba ni ka shi ka'i gos sam lha'i gos so / / 'di la de lta bu yod pas na de skad ces bya'o / / mnyam pa ni ji lta ba bzhin yin te / / de ltar 'dzin par byed pas na ka ba tshad dang ldan pa'o /
sahitāḥ samagrāḥ / niratāḥ sāvadhānāḥ / kathamityāha / kimayaṃ saṃsthita iti
# lhan cig pa ni ma lus pa'o / / nyams dga' ba ni rtse gcig tu'o / / ji ltar zhe na / / ji 'di legs par gnas pa'o zhes gsungs so /
kuta ityāha / susaṃsthitetyādi / muktāvicitritaṃ paryanteṣu hārārddhahārāṇāṃ pralambanāt, madhye ca sthūlamuktākalāpasya / abhyavakiranti purastāt
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / legs par yang dag par smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / mu tig gi phreng bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' ma dag tu dra ba dang dra phyed 'phyang ba dang dbus su mu tig 'brum bu'i rigs gang la yod pa'o / / mngon par gtor ba ni mdun nas so /
prakaranti triṣu pārśveṣu
# rab tu gtor ba ni logs gsum nas so /
saṃpravikiranti punaścaturṣvapi (RSt_197) pārśveṣu / dharmāśayaviśuddhyeti dharme yā teṣāṃ śraddhācchandayoḥ śuddhiḥ
# yang dag par gtor ba ni yang sgo bzhi'i ngos nas so / / chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pas zhes bya ba ni chos la gang de dag dad pa dang 'dun pa dag pa'o /
dharmāya gauravaṃ kalyāṇamitratvāt
# chos la gus pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
sanniśrayatā bhājanatā / śraddhārhe yā śraddhadhānatā tayā / vinipāto durgatigamanam / aviṣṭitaṃ avicchinnam / tuṣṭa iti prītaḥ / udagra iti tayā prītyā unnatapūrvakāyaḥ
# bsten pa ni yang dag par bsten pa nyid do / / dad par 'os pa la dad pa dang ldan pa'o / / log par ltung ba ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba'o / / gnas pa ni rgyun chad par ro / / dga' ba ni mgu pas so / / mgu pa zhes bya ba ni mgu ba des ro stod mtho bar gyur par byed pa'o /
tadekatānatvāt āttamanaskaḥ / prīterutkarṣāt pramuditaḥ
# de nyid la gcig tu sems pa'i phyir yi rangs pa'o / / dga' ba khyad par du gyur ba ni rab tu mgu ba'o /
prītisahagataḥ prasādaḥ prītisaumanasyam / tajjātamasyeti tathoktaḥ / tasya śrṛṇoti smeti sambandhavivakṣayāpādāne ṣaṣṭhī / sarvadharmeṣvaniśritasaṃjñāmiti / yathaitarhi me dharmodgatadeśanayā pratibhāsaḥ sanidhā(dā)namanāśritaḥ / evaṃ hetuniyamamanāśritāḥ sarvadharmā ityenāṃ saṃjñāmatyantasamāhitām / asyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ prabhāvātkimabhūdityāha / tasyetyādi
# dga' ba dang ldan pa'i dang ba ni dga' ba dang yid bde ba'o / / skyes pa 'di la yod pa de skad ces bya ba ste thos so zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro / / chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i 'du shes zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bdag chos 'phags chos ston par snang ba dang nye bar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du / / chos thams cad kyi rgyu nges par mi gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di la 'du shes shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o / / 'du shes 'di'i mthu zhig 'byung zhe na / / de ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
samādhaya eva mukhāni mahopāyatvāt
# ting nge 'dzin nyid sgo ste thabs chen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇāni / teṣāṃ vyavalokano draṣṭā
# chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni mtshan nyid thams cad do / / de dag la lta ba ni rnam par lta ba'o /
teṣāṃ anupalabdhirasattāniścayaḥ
# de mi dmigs pa ni med par nges pa'o /
sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirnānātvaṃ samatā svalakṣaṇānāmabhāvāt / tadālambanaḥ samādhistathoktaḥ / sā ca samatā tathatā / tayā nirvikārānsarvadharmān paśyatīti sarvadhamanirvikāradarśī
# de dag gi shes pa la nges par 'byung ba ni gtan du med par nges pa'o / / chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa ni mnyam pa nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis med pa'i phyir te / / de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o / / mnyam pa nyid de yang de bzhin nyid do / / des chos thams cad 'byung ba med par mthong ba yin te / / de bas na thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba'o /
evaṃ yāvatsarvatathāgatadarśī samādhirveditavyaḥ
# de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar su rig bar bya'o /
eṣu samādhiṣviti krameṇa sarveṣu sthitaḥ san
# ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin la rim gyis gnas pa'o /
daśadiśo 'sminniti daśadiglokaḥ sarvalokadhātava ityarthaḥ
# 'di la phyogs bcu yod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten te / / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ces bya ba'i don te /
tatra buddhān bhagavato 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyān paśyati sma
# deng sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa dag mthong ba'o /
naikasmin kāle 'nekastathāgata ekasyaiva sarvasattvārthakriyāsu śakteriti cet
# gal te dus gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa du ma yin te / / gcig kho na sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad par spyod pa yin no zhe na /
nityameka eva buddhastasyaivānantamāyuradhiṣṭhātuṃ śakteriti kinneṣyate? hetubalādanyepi bhavantīti cet / hetubalādeva tarhi yugapadananteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantāstathāgatā jāyanta iti ko virodhaḥ? yathā buddhau cakravartinau sakṛdekatra caturdvīpake lokadhātau notpadyete niḥsapatnakarmakāritvāt tathā tathāgatau trisāhasre lokadhātāviti mahārathaiḥ kṣuṇṇametat / gatiṃ gatā iti / gatirapratidyātaḥ / tāṃ prāptāḥ / śikṣāpita iti śikṣāṃ prāpitaḥ / tatkṛtamiti / yadeva tena purva kṛtam / dhārayitavyaṃ cetasi na vismartavyam / celaṃ vastram / tasya uṇḍukaḥ śiraśāṭaka ityarthaḥ / utkaṇṭhā śokaḥ / paritasanaṃ duḥkhāsikā / kāṣṭhāgatā prītiḥ prema / guṇavatsu cetaso 'kāluṣyaṃ prasādaḥ / tadguṇeṣu vismayaḥ citrīkāraḥ / arbhyahaṇaṃ gauravam / katamaṃ śabdamityata āha / ghoṣamityādi / katamaṃ bhoṣamiṃtyāha / kaḥ pureṣeṇetyādi / atikrāmayiṣyatīti mitāṃ hrasvo na bhavati / "vā cittavirāge" (RSt_198) ityato vāśabdānuvṛttervyavasthitavibhāṣā / vijñānācca / atiśabdaścātra apaśabdārthe vartate / ataḥ pañcamī yuktā bhavati / yannuśabdastasmādarthe / paryutthāpayāmāseti vyagrīkṛtavān / yatheti yataḥ / asthimajjayāśceti / majjanśabdasya liṅgavyatyayena striyāṃ ḍāp sīmāvat / kalyacitta iti tenaiva harṣeṇa karmaṇyacittaḥ / tataśca dviguṇībhūtaharṣatvāt pramuditacittaḥ / guṇajātiḥ manuṣyasāmānyo guṇaḥ / viśeṣastu manuṣyātikrānto guṇaḥ / kṣamante ceti svayaṃ kartavyatayāpi rocanāt / viṣayiteti śaktiḥ
# rtag tu sangs rgyas gcig kho nas sku tshe mtha' yas par byin gyis rlob pa yod na / / ci'i phyir mi 'dod / / gal te rgyu'i stobs kyis gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhe na / / de lta na ni rgyu'i stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa dag cig car 'byung ba la 'gal ba ci yod / / dper na 'khor los sgyur ba gnyis gling bzhi pa gcig tu cig car mi skye ste / / the tshom med par gcig gi las byed pa'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa gcig 'byung bar shing rta chen po rnams kyis brtags nas gzhag go / / rtogs par khong du chud ces bya ba ni rtogs pa ni thogs pa med par de khong du chud pa'o / / bslabs so zhes bya ba ni bslab par byas pa'o / / ji skad bsgo zhes bya ba ni des sngar khyod la gang byas pa bzhin du zung shig ces bya ba ni sems la brjed pa med par bya'o / / mgo'i gos ni gos so / / de'i thod ni mgo'i gos kyi thod do / / rab tu gdung ba ni mya ngan no / / mi dga' bar 'gyur ba ni sdug bsngal bar gnas pa'o / / mthar phyin pa'i dga' ba ni rangs pa'o / / yon tan dang ldan pas sems rnyog pa med pa ni dang ba'o / / de'i yon tan la ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni ri mo byed pa'o / / gus pa ni mchod pa'o / / sgra ji lta bus she na / / mi su 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pas so / / bar chad bya'o snyam mo zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to / / de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so zhes bya ba ni gyeng bar byas pa'o / / ji ltar na ci nas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to / / sems bde zhes bya ba ni dga' ba de nyid kyis sems las su rung ba'o / / de las nyis 'gyur du gyur pa'i dga' ba yin pa'i phyir sems bar tu dga' ba'o / / yon tan gyis rnam pa mi rnams kyi yon tan gyi spyi'o / / yon tan gyi khyad par ni mi'i las 'das pa'o / / bzod do zhes bya ba ni rang nyid byed par yang 'dod pa'i phyir ro / / yul zhes bya ba ni bus pa'o /
viditābhiprāya āha / alpotsuka ityādi
# bsam pa rig par byas nas brtson pa chung bar gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa smras so /
utsuka autsukyam / yattat kṣaṇaṃ lavamapi tat / tanmuhūrtamapi tat / trayāṇāmupādānaṃ tu śrotṛṇāṃ śraddhabhedāt / niṣpratibhāna ityuddeśaḥ
# brtson pa chung ba ni brtson 'grus chung ba'o / / gang skad cig de nyid dang thang cig de nyid dang yul tsam nyid la yang zhes bya ba ni nyan pa rnams kyi dad pa'i bye brag gis gsum smos pa yin no / / spobs pa med par gyur te zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o /
sadāpraruditasyetyādinirdeśaḥ / uttara iti uttaranimiuttam
# byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o /
apratipadyamāno 'labhamānaḥ / daddhvamiti dad dāne / vādyaprakṛtayo vādyaprakārāḥ / prabhūtāḥ prakārabāhulyāt / vipulāḥ pratiprakāramānantyāt / bhogā arthāḥ / sarvalokaviśiṣṭā iti sarvalokātikrāntāḥ / upariṣṭānmūrdhna iti upari śirasaḥ / prātiṣṭhata iti praśabdaḥ praterarthe / vihāyasītyantarikṣe
# lan glan pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan gyi bdun pa'o / / spobs pa ma skyes pa ni spobs pa med pa'o / / mang po ni rnam pa mang po'o / / rgya che ba ni rnam pa mang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro / / longs spyod ni nor ro / / 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o / / spyi bo'i steng ni dbu'i steng ngo / / gyur te zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i don to / / nam mkha' la zhes bya ba ni bar snang la'o /
prāñco 'ñjalayaḥ prāñjalayaḥ / sphuṭa iti prāptaḥ
