# mdun du byas pa'i thal mo ni thal mo'o / / khyab pa ni thob pa'o /
sahadarśanāditi darśanātkāraṇāddarśanena sahaivaityarthaḥ
# mthong ma thag ces bya ba ni mthong ba'i rgyus mthong ba dang lhan cig gcig ces bya ba'i don to /
sadāpraruditopalakṣitaḥ parivartastatparivartaḥ / āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāṃ triśattamaḥ parivartaḥ
# rtag tu des mtshon pa'i le'u ni de'i le'u'o / / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u sum cu pa'o /
31. dharmodgataparivarto nāmaikatriśattamaḥ / evamukta ityādi / na khalvityādi pratijñā / acalitā hi tathateti hetuḥ / tathāgatānāṃ kimāgatamiti cedāha / yā cetyādi / evamuttarepi hetavaḥ sasamarthanā veditavyāḥ
# de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dam bca' ba'o / / de bzhin nyid las ma gyos so zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so / / gal te ci de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa yin nam zhe na / / de bzhin du 'og ma'i gtan tshigs dag kyang 'thad pa dang bcas par rig par bya ste /
sarve caite hetavaḥ śūnyatāparyāyā nimittabhedāttu bhedaḥ
# gtan tshigs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam grangs mtshan ma'i dbye bas phye ba'o /
ākāśadhāturākāśasādharmyāttathataiva / nanu dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanavirājitavigrahastathāgato na punastathatādaya ityata āha
# nam mkha'i khams ni de bzhin nyid de / / nam mkha' dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro / / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par brgyan pa'i sku ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas de bzhin nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin nam zhe na /
na hi kulaputrānyatretyādi / tathataiva suviśuddhā tathāgata iti bhāvaḥ
# rigs kyi bu chos de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / de bzhin nyid kho na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes dgongs te /
sa hi teṣāṃ svābhāvikaḥ kāya iti nyāyaḥ
# de ni de dag gi ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa'o /
evaṃ tathatāditathāgatayorabhedamuktvātyantābhedaṃ darśayitumāha / yā cetyādi
# de ltar de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa dag tha ni dad pa bstan nas / / shin tu tha dad pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
eṣāmeva dharmāṇāmiti tathatādīnāṃ tathateti parikalpitarūpaśūnyatā
# chos 'di dag ces bya ba ni de bzhin nyid la sogs pa ste / / de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni kun brtags pa'i ngo bos stong pa nyid do /
yā ca sarvadharmāṇāmiti skandhadhātvādīnāṃ yā ca tathāgatasya
# chos thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
ekaivetyādiruddeśaḥ / punarekaivetyādi nirdeśaḥ / hetumāha / yadutāsattvāditi / adravyatvānna (RSt_199) punaryathālakṣaṇamabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / punastathāgatānāmagatigatyorabhāvaṃ yathākalpanamasattvāt
# de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o / / rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o / / 'di lta ste / / med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gtan tshigs gsungs te / / rdzas su med pa'i phyir yin gyi / / mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa ni ma yin no zhes dgongs so / / yang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud pa med par ni ji ltar btags pa ltar med pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
bhāvakalpanā tu saṃjñāviparyāsāditi dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pratipādayitumāha / tadyathāpītyādi / madhyānhakālasamaya iti / madhyānhaścāsau kālaśca / tasya samayaḥ / āgamanaṃ yathā ca grāmaṃ praviṣṭa iti viśaterarthasya gativiśeṣatvāt kartari ktaḥ / tathehāpi tathāgatam abhiniviṣṭā iti
# dngos por rtogs pa yang 'du shes phyin ci log pa la sogs pa'i dpes bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste / / dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe zhes bya ba la / / 'di ni nyi ma gung yang yin la dus kyang yin pas nyi ma gung gi dus so / / de la bab pa 'ong ba na 'jug pa'o / / de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs su mngon par chags par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
dharmākāyā iti dharmatākāyāḥ / hastikāyasyetyādau kāyaḥ samūhaḥ
# chos kyi sku ni chos nyid kyi sku'o / / glang po che'i tshigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tshigs ni 'dus pa'o /
pariniṣpattiriti bhūtatvam / muṣāvādastatsādharmyān vañcaka ityarthaḥ
# grub pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa nyid do / / de ni brdzun pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir slu ba zhes bya ba'i don to /
ata evāha abhūta iti / amoghaṃ dāyakasya mahāphalahetutvāt / ata eva dakṣiṇīyāḥ
# de nyid kyi phyir yang dge ba ma yin zhes gsungs so / / don yod pa ni sbyin pa po'i 'bras bu chen po'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir sbyin gnas so /
prabhāvyante upalabhyante / kāyapariniṣpattiḥ caramabhavasaṃgṛhītā / nāpi kvacidgacchatīti parinirvāṇakāle
# rab tu dbye ba ni dmigs pa'o / / sku mngon par 'grub pa ni srid pa tha ma 'dzin pa'o / / gang du 'gro ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pa'i dus na ste /
na kvacidastīti parinirvāya yatra gacchati / hetarūpādānakāraṇaṃ pratyayāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ / tatra śabdasyopādānaṃ śabdaparamāṇava ityeke
# mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gnas ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no / / rgyu ni nye bar len pa ni rgyu'o / / rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'o / / de la sgra'i nye bar len pa ni sgra'i rdul phra rab bo zhes kha cig zer ro /
vāyuparamāṇava ityapare
# gzhan dag ni rlung gi rdul phra rab po zhes zer ro /
tatra upadhānī tantrīveṣṭanaṃ cakulikā
# de la shing bu zhes bya ba ni rgyud dkri ba'i shing bu'o /
upavāṇyo apradhānatantrayaḥ / ādyantayoḥ na śabdo niścaratīti vacanaṃ madhye sarvatra sambandhanārtham
# rgyud rten ni rgyud kyi gtso bo'o / / dang po dang tha ma las sgra ma byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni bar ma dag tu 'ang sbyar ba'i don to /
nirhetukāśabdāt svārthe 'ṇa nairhetukī / saṃkṣobhitāni saṃpracalitāni / jihmībhūtāni naṣṭacchāyāni / utsṛjanti smeti muñcanti sma / vihāyasamiti ākāśam / svakena kāyena dharmodgatamabhicchādayati smeti tasyāgrataḥ sarvakāyena bhūmau patati smetyarthaḥ / kiyantaṃ kālamityata āha saptavarṣāṇīti
# yang dag par dkrogs pa ni yang dag par rab tu bskyod pa'o / / snga bkong ba ni gzi byin nyams par byas ba'o / / 'thor zhing zhes bya ba ni 'thor bar byed pa'o / / bar snang ni nam mkha'o / / bdag gi lus kyis chos 'phags mngon par bkab ste zhes bya ba ni de'i mdun du lus thams cad kyis sa la phab pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / de'i dus ji tsam gyi bar du zhe na / / lo bdun gyi bar du zhes bya ba gsungs so /
avakrāmaṇaṃ praveśanam / yadvayamiti yadā vayam
# dus 'da' bar byed ces bya ba ni snyoms par zhugs pas so / / gang bdag kyang zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bdag kyang ngo /
anuvartamānā ityanukurvatyaḥ
# rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su byed pa'o /
divyamityākāśabhavam
# lha'i zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' las byung ba'o /
cittasyānyathātva pṛthivīsekavaimukhyam
# sems gzhan nyid du zhes bya ba'i sa phyogs chag chag gdab pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o /
iti pratisaṃkhyāyeti evaṃ nirūpya sarvāṇi tānīti dārikāśatāni
# de ltar bsams nas zhes bya ba ni de ltar nges par brtags nas so / / de dag thams cad kyis kyang zhes bya ba ni bu mo lnga brgya po dag go /
tāni tānīti śastraviśeṣaṇam
# de dang de dag ces bya ba ni mtshon gyi khyad par ro /
avatāramavakāśaḥ / adhyatiṣṭhadityakarot / gandhamityatra adhyatiṣṭhaditi cakāreṇānukṛṣyate / parīṣṭiḥ paryeṣaṇā / kīdṛśī tatrāryasya dharmodgatasya dharmadeśanābhūdityata āha
# glags ni skabs so / / byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba ni byas pa'o / / 'dir dris khyab bo zhes bya ba ni byin gyi rlabs so zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro / / yongs su tshol pa ni kun du tshol ba'o / / 'phags pa chos 'phags chos ji lta bu ston pa yin zhe na / / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasyetyādi sugamam / yadutaśabdaḥ sāmānyenoddiṣṭasya viśeṣaṃ dyotayati
# rtogs sla'o / / 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / 'di lta ste'i sgras ni spyir bstan pa khyad par du bsal bar byed /
ebhistriṃśatā ākārairityarthaḥ
# sum cu po 'di dag rnam pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
ata evāsyāḥ śrutabalenotpannā
# de nyid kyi phyir 'di la thob pa'i stobs kyis skyes pa sum cu pa'o /
(RSt_200) ebhireva triṃśatākāraiḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasyotpannāstriṃśatsamādhayaḥ paṭhiṣyante / prajñāpāramitāyāḥ samatā sarvadharmeṣu
# rnam pa 'di dag nyid kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu la skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to / / chos thams cad la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid de /
kutaḥ? sarvadharmasamatayā / sā hi dharmadhātvālambanā / sa ca samānaḥ sarvadharmeṣu / prajñāpāramitāyā viviktatā / kutaḥ? sarvadharmaviviktatayā / yataḥ sarvadharmāḥ svalakṣaṇairviviktāḥ / ataḥ sāpi viviktā svalakṣaṇapratibhāsaiḥ / sā kadācidasmādvivekāccalatīti cedāha / prajñāpāramitāyā acalanatā / kutaḥ? sarvadharmācalanatayā / yataḥ sarvadharmā na vivekāccalanti / tataḥ sāpi na vivekāccalati / mananāccalatīti cedāha / prajñāpāramitāyā amananatā / kutaḥ? sarvadharmāmananatayā / amananā hi sarvadharmāḥ / na te kiñcinmanyante niḥsvabhāvatvāt / tataḥ sāpyamananā / kimasau kenāpi stambhitā yato na calatīti cedāha / prajñāpāramitāyā astambhitatā / kutaḥ? sarvadharmāstambhitatayā / na hi vivekāccalanti sarvadharmāḥ kenāpi stambhitāḥ / kiṃ tarhi? prakṛtyaiva viveke sthirāstataḥ prajñāpāramitāpi sthirā
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas te / / de ni chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pas de yang mnyam pa'o / / chos thams cad la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid de / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / chos thams cad ben pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / gang gi phyir chos thams cad rnag gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dben pa de'i phyir / / gal te nam zhig na rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba 'di las gyos par 'gyur ro zhe na / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gyo ba med pa nyid do zhes pa gsungs te / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / chos thams cad gyo ba med pa ste / / gang gi phyir chos thams cad rnam par dben pas na gyo ba med pa nyid do / / de bas na de yang rnam par dben pa las mi gyo ba nyid do / / gal te slom sems kyis gyos par 'gyur ro zhe na / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid ces bya ba gsungs te / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid las so / / rlom sems med pa ni chos thams cad de / / de dag la ni rlom sems cung zad kyang med de / / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / des na de la yang rlom sems med do / / gal te yang 'di ci zhig gis khengs par byas pas gyo ba med pa yin no zhe na / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do zhes gsungs so / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / chos thams cad khengs pa med pas so / / chos thams cad dben pa las gyo ba med de / / gang gis kyang khengs pa med do / / 'on kyang rang bzhin kho nas dben par gnas pa yin te / / des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par gnas pa yin no / / dang por mnyam pa nyid tsam bstan gyi /
ādau samatāmātramuktaṃ naikarasatā / tāmapyāha / prajñāpāramitāyā ekarasatā sarvadharmeṣu / kutaḥ? sarvadharmāṇāmekarasatayā tathataikarasā hi sarvadharmāḥ svalakṣaṇānāmabhāvāt / tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi svalakṣaṇānāmapratibhāsāt / prajñāpāramitāyā aparyantatā
# ro gcig pa nyid ma yin pas de'i phyir chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par to gcig pa nyid de / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas te / / chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa yin te / / rang gi mtshan nyid rnams med pa'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin yod ste / / rang gi mtshan nyid mi snang ba'i phyir ro / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid de /
kutaḥ? sarvadharmāṇāmaparyantatayā
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas te /
tathā hi dvau paryantau pūrvā ca koṭiraparā ca
# 'di ltar mu ni gnyis te / / sngon gyi mu dang phyi ma'i mu'o /
tau ca na staḥ sarvadharmāṇām / atītānagatayorasattvāt / tasmādaparyantāḥ sarvadharmāḥ
# de dag med de chos thams cad kyi 'das pa dang / / ma 'ong pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / de'i phyir chos thams cad mu med pa'o /
tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi / prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādatā / kutaḥ? sarvadharmānutpādatayā / tathāhi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ / tasmānnotpadyante kharaviṣāṇavat / tasmādanutpādāḥ / tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi / anirodhā prajñāpāramitā
# de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid de / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa nyid pas te / / de ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa ste / / de'i phyir skye ba med de ri bong gi rva bzhin no /
kutaḥ? sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhatayā / na hyamī nirudhyante 'sattvāt kharaviṣāṇavat / tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi / prajñāpāramitāyā aparyantatā / kenopamānena? gaganāparyantatayā / tathāhi gaganasya nāsti paryanto daśasu dikṣu triṣu cādhveṣu / evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / [yā] daśadiktraiyadhvikā sarvadharmatathatāmātraprathanāt
# de'i phyir skye ba med pa'o / / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid dang mu med pa nyid de / / dpe gang gis she na nam mkha' mu med pas so / / de ltar na phyogs bcu 'am dus gsum du nam mkha' la mu med pa'o / / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid tsam snang ba'i phyir ro /
samudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantateti / yathā hyākāśasya nāstyantastathaiva daśadiglokadhātūnāṃ kimpunarananteṣu lokadhātuṣu samudrāṇām / tataḥ siddhā samudrāparyantatā / tadvatprajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tathā hi yā teṣāṃ samudrāṇāṃ tathatā yā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ yā ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ, ekaivaiṣā tathatā
# ji ltar nam mkha' mu med pa de bzhin du / / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mu med na / / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mu med pa lta smos kyang ci dgos / / de bas na rgya mtsho mu med pa yang grub ste / / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin yang ste / / 'di ltar gang rgya mtsho de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig ste /
tathatālambanā ca prajñāpāramitā
# de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
tasmātsamudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantateti siddham
# de'i phyir rgya mtsho mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa zhes bya bar grub po /
nanu svapnopamatayāpi jñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā gaganopamatayāpi
# rnam par shes pa yang rmi lam lta bu yin la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang nam mkha' lta bu yin na /
tatra pūrvā vicitrapratibhāsā uttarā nirābhāsā / kathamanayorekārthatetyata āha / meruvicitratayā prajñāpāramitāvicitrateti
# de sngar rnam pa sna tshogs su sangs ba dang ji ltar don gcig par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / / de'i phyir ri rab sna tshogs nyid yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do zhes gsungs te /
yathā hyekarasamākāśaṃ prakṛtyā tathāpi (RSt_201) merupārśvānāṃ vicitrāṇāmādhipatyāttadvadeva vicitraṃ khyāti
# ji ltar nam mkha' ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de bzhin du ri rab kyi ngos rnam pa sna tshogs su mu med kyang rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo /
evamekarasaiva tathatā na vicitrā
# de bzhin nyid ni ro gcig pa ste / / de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs ni ma yin no /
tathatālambanā ca prajñāpāramitā
# de bzhin nyid las dmigs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
yastu svapnopamādijñāne vicitrapratibhāsaḥ so 'bhūtaparikalpadharmaḥ
# gang yang smi lam la sogs par snang ba'i shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos la kun tu rtog pa'o /
tasmātsvapnopamamāyopamādijñānaṃ saṃvṛtiḥ
# de'i phyir rmi la dang sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i shes pa ni kun rdzob ste /
nirābhāse yā ca parimārthike jñāne sattvanāmavatāraṇāya nirdiśyate, nirābhāsapṛṣṭhabhāvī cāvikalpoyaṃ tadanubhūtaniścayārthaḥ / tasmātsiddhamidaṃ meruvicitratayā prajñāpāramitāvicitrateti
# snang ba med pa don dam pa'i shes pa la sems can gzung par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no / / yang na snang ba med pa'i rjes las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang myong ba nges par bya ba'i don du'o / / de'i phyir 'dod pa'i don grub ste / / ri rab sna tshogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid ces bya'o /
nanu saiva nirābhāsā prajñāpāramitā svayamanubhūyamānaṃ paramārthamitthaṃ niścinoti niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti / tatkathamasau nirvikalpetyata āha / gaganākalpanatayā prajñāpāramitākalpanateti
# snang ba med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid rang gis myong ba na don dam par chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes ston par byed pa yin no / / de ji ltar rnam par mi rtog pa yin zhe na / / de'i phyir nam mkha' rtog pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do zhes gsungs te /
prajñāpāramitāyā yākalpanatā na sā kiñcidvikalpayati vikalpapāragatatvāt / tadyathā gaganaṃ na kiñcidvikalpayati jaḍatvāt / ajaḍā prajñāpāramitā kinna vikalpayatīti cet / uktamatra / vikalpaśca bhrāntirabhrāntā ca sā
# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa med pas de la rnam par rtog pa cung zad kyang med de pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / gal te dper na blun pa nyid kyi phyir de ji ltar rnam par mi rtog pa yin zhe na / / de'i phyir nam mkha' la dngos por rnam par rtog pa yin na / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin blun pa ma yin na ji ltar rtog par mi byed can / / 'dir rnam par rtog pa ni 'khrul pa yin la /
tasmānna vikalpayatīti siddham / rūpāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantateti
# de ni 'khrul pa ma yin no zhes bstan to / / gzugs su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do zhes bya ba la /
yathā hyākāśamaparyantaṃ tathārūpaskandhopi
# 'di ltar nam mkha' mu med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi phung po yang ngo /
yatrānyadrūpaṃ nāsti tatrāvaśyaṃ tamaḥ prakāśo vāsti
# gang yang gzugs las gzhan med pa de la nges par snang ba dang mun pa yang med do /
tadvattadīyatathatāpratibhāsinī prajñāpāramitāpyaparyantatā
# de bzhin du de'i de bzhin nyid snang ba na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do /
yathaiva samudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatāsmābhirvyākhyātā tathaiva sattvānāmānantyāt vedanāparyantatayāpi saṃskāraparyantatayāpi vijñānāparyantatayāpi pṛthivīdhātvaparyantatayāpi apdhātvaparyantatayāpi tejodhātvaparyantatayāpi vāyudhātvaparyantatayāpi ākāśadhātvaparyantatayāpi vijñānadhātvaparyantatayāpi vyākhyātavyā / atha yā vijñānaskandhāparyantatayā yā ca vijñānadhātvaparyantatayā tayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ? skandhadhātuśabdābhyāṃ prayogakṛtaḥ
# ji ltar bdag gis rgya mtsho mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par bshad pa de bzhin du gzhan sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba mu med pa nyid dang 'du shes mu med pa nyid dang 'du byed mu med pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid dang sa'i khams mu med pa nyid dang chu'i khams mu med pa nyid dang me'i khams mu med pa nyid dang rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid dang nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa nyid kyang bshad par bya'o / / ji ste gang rnam par shes pa'i phung po mu med pa nyid dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa de dag la khyad par ci yod ci na / / phung po dang khams kyi sgra dag gis bye brag tu byas pa yin no /
vajropamadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamateti
# rdo rje sta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba la /
cittadhāraṇāddharmaḥ samādhiḥ
# sems 'dzin pas na chos te ting nge 'dzin to /
tasya yā sarvadharmeṣu samatā tayomānena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ samatā sarvadharmeṣu sarvadharmāsambhedanatayā prajñāpāramitāsambhedanateti sarvadharmāṇāmasambhedo abhedaḥ / bhedakānāṃ svalakṣaṇānāmabhāvāt / tadvatprajñāpāramitāyā api na bhedaḥ / samvedyamānenaiva rūpeṇa teṣāṃ tasyāmabhāvāt / sarvadharmānupalabdhitayā prajñāpāramitānupalabdhiteti / sarvadharmā na kiñcidupalabhante / rūpasya jaḍatvāt / śeṣāṇāmapyātmani paratra vā grāhakatvāyogāt / nāpyupalabhyante grāhakābhāvāt / tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi nopalabhate nāpyupalabhyate / tasmātteṣāṃ tasyāścānupalabdhitā / sarvadharmāvibhāvanāsamatayā prajñāpāramitāvibhāvanāsamateti / vibhāvanāṃ parebhyo (RSt_202) vācā deśanā / sā sarvadharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmādavibhāvanayā samatā teṣām / tadvatsarvālambaneṣu prajñāpāramitāyā avibhāvanāsamatā / sarvadharmaniśceṣṭatayā prajñāpāramitāniśceṣṭateti / ceṣṭā īhāvyāpāraḥ / avyāpāraḥ sarvadharmāḥ / kathaṃ tarhi kaścitkutaścidutpadyate? idaṃpratyayamātreṇa / asmin satīdaṃ bhavati, asati na bhavatītyetāvatā hetuphalabhāvaḥ / tasmādamī niśceṣṭāḥ tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi
# rdo rje lta bu'i chos ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to / / de chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do / / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do zhes bya ba la / / chos thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa nyid ni ma 'dres pa ste / / 'byed par byed pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams med pa'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma mu med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi phung po yang ngo / / gang yang gzugs las gzhan med pa de la nges par snang ba dang mun pa yang med do / / de bzhin du de'i de bzhin nyid snang ba na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do / / ji ltar bdag gis rgya mtsho mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par bshad pa de bzhin du gzhan sems shing 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dmigs par bya ba dang dmigs par byed pa ma yin te / / de'i phyir de dag dang de mi dmigs so / / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba la rnam par 'jig pa ni gzhan dag la tshig gis ston pa de chos thams cad la med de / / de'i phyir rnam par 'jig pa med pas de dag mnyam pa nyid do / / de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'jig pa med pa ni mnyam pa nyid do / / chos thams cad byed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do zhes bya ba la byed pa med pa zhes bya ba ni byed pa ni 'dir bya ba ste / / chos thams cad bya ba med pa'o / / de ltar gang zhig ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhe na / / 'di yod pa'i rkyen gyis 'di yod na ni 'di 'byung la 'di med na ni 'di mi 'byung zhes bya ba 'di tsam gyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'o / / de'i phyir 'di rnams ni byed pa med pa ste / / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo /
sarvadharmācintyatayāpi prajñāpāramitācintyateti
# chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
yathā hi dharmāḥ parebhyo na deśyante nirviṣayatvādvācaḥ
# ji ltar chos ni gzhan dag la bstan du med de / / tshig gi yul med pa'i phyir ro /
tathā svayamapi na cintyante na nirūpyante vāgvikalpayorekārthatvāt
# de bzhin du rang gis kyang bsam du med cing brtag tu med pa ste / / de dag dang rnam par rtog pa dang don gcig pa'i phyir ro /
tadvatprajñāpāramitāpyacintyā
# de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o /
veditavyetyante yat paṭhyate tatsarvadharmasamatādivākyeṣu sarveṣu sambadhyate 'ntardīpakatvāt / atha khalvityādi
# rigs par bya'o zhes gang mthar brjod pa de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i tshig dag la sbyar te / / med na mi 'byung pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba las sogs pa gsungs pa la /
atheti deśanāparisamāptau
# de nas zhes bya ba ni bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o /
tathā niṣaṇṇasvaṃveti śrutāsanādanutthitasya / athetyuddeśaḥ / kṛtaḥ / tasyaiva nirdeśaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmiti / yenaiva krameṇa yairevākāraiḥ prajñāpāramitā deśitā tenaiva krameṇa tairevākāraistriṃśatsamādhaya utpannā iti samudāyārthaḥ
# de ltar 'dug bzhin du zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i stan las ma langs pa ro / / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan pa'o / / de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o / / de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rim pa gang dang rnam pa gang nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i rim pa de nyid dang rnam pa de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin su cu skyes so zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to /
tatra sarvadharmasamatādyākāratvātsamādhayastathā vyapadiśyante
# de la chos thams cad mnyams pa nyid kyi rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin du yang bstan na /
kathamamī ākārāḥ? ebhi prakārairvastujñānāt / yathoktam- / vastujñānaprakārāṇāmākāra iti lakṣaṇam / iti / kiṃ tarhyālambanam? tadeva vastu yathāsvam / athavā sarvadharmasamatādirevālambanam
# ji ltar 'di dag rnam pa yin zhe na / / rnam pa 'di dag gis te / / bzhi dang ye shes rnam pa yi / / rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / de lta mod kyi rang rang gi dmigs pa ni de nyid kyi gzhi ji lta ba bzhin no / / yang na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa nyid dmigs pa ste /
tadālambanatvātsamādhayastathoktāḥ / vastūnyadhiṣṭhāni / ākāro yathāsvaṃ nirnimittatādiḥ
# de'i dmigs pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir de skad ces brjod do / / gzhi la gnas pa mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa ni rang rang gi ji lta ba'i rnam pa'o /
evaṃ pramukhānīti triṃśatsamādhipramukhāni
# de dag la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin sum cu la sogs pa'o /
kathameṣāṃ pramukhatvam? ebhiravaśeṣāṇāmākṣepāt / śatasahasrāṇīti lakṣāṇi
# ji ltar de dag la sogs pa yin zhe na / / 'di dag nyid kyis lhag ma bsdus pa'i phyir te / / brgya phrag stong zhes bya ba ni 'dum mo /
dharmodgatena lakṣitaḥ parivartastatparivartaḥ / āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāmekatriṃśattamaḥ parivartaḥ / 32. parīnandanāparivarto nāma dvātriṃśattamaḥ / sahapratilabdhānāmityādi / anena labdhānāṃ samādhīnāṃ tatkālajamanuśaṃsamāha / ata eva sahaśabdaḥ samānakālatārthaḥ / pratilabdhānāmiti (RSt_203) pratilabdheṣu satsu / ebhireva nayeriti yathoktavastubhiraṣṭābhirabhisamayaiḥ / ebhireva nāmabhiriti sarvākārajñatādibhiḥ / sarvāsu ca jātiṣu na jātu buddhavirahito 'bhūdityuddeśaḥ / asya nirdeśa uttaro granthaḥ svapnāntaragatopīti yāvat
# chos 'phags kyis mtshon pa'i le'u ni de'i le'u'o / / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o / / thob ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dis thos pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi phan yon de'i dus su skyes pa ni de nyid kyi phyir de ma thag pa'i sgras ni dus mnyam du thob po zhes brjod de / / thob pa yod na'o / / tshul 'di lta bu nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi dngos pos so / / ming 'di nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pas so / / gar skyes pa thams cad du sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o / / 'di ni 'og tu bstan pa'i gzhung las 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar ni bshad pa'o /
tatra khalvityādirupodghātaḥ parīndanāyāḥ / tadanenāpi paryāyeṇaiti sadāpraruditavṛttāntenāpi
# des zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yongs su gtad pa'i gleng bslang ba'o / / des rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes bya ba ni rtag tu ngu'i ji ltar byung pas kyang ngo /
tasmāttarhītyādinā anuśāsanīśabdaparyantena prathamā parīndanā / atra ca tathāgatādhiṣṭhāneneti vacanaṃ kimartham? mahārthatvābhdagavatī bavhantarāyā ca vinā buddhādhiṣṭhānena likhitumapi [na] śakyeti pradarśanārtham / iyamasmākamanuśāsanītīyamasmākaṃ parīndanā / yathā asyāḥ śravaṇādikaṃ na vicchidyate tathā tvayā kartavyamityarthaḥ
# kun dga' bo de lta bas na zhes bya ba nas / / 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go zhes bya ba'i bar ni gtad pa dang po'o / / 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i tshig ci'i phyir zhe na / / don chen po yin pa'i phyir / / bcom ldan 'das yum la bar du gcod pa ni mang du yod pas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs med par bri bar yang mi nus so zhes bstan to / / 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go zhes bya ba la 'di ni nga'i gtad pa ste / / ji ltar 'di nyan pa la sogs pas rgyun mi 'chad par de ltar khyod kyis bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
tatkasya hetoriti / tatparīndanaṃ kena prayojanenetyarthaḥ / ata āha / atra hītyādi / tatkathamityādinā dvītīyaparīndanāyā upodghātaḥ / asmin mama samucchaya iti mama śarīre / tathataditi / etatpremādikam
# de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni de yongs su gtad pa la dgos pa ci yod ces bya ba'i don to / / de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtad pa gnyis pa'i gleng ba'o / / gnas pa 'di la zhes bya ba ni sku 'di la'o / / de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni dga' ba la sogs pa 'di dag go /
etenopādghātena dve parīndane / yata āha dvirapi trirapīti / parīndāmīti samarpayāmi
# gleng bslang ba 'di dag byas nas yongs su gtad pa'i phyir kun dga' po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / lan gnyis lan gsum du zhes bya ba la yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba ni yang dag par gtad pa'o /
anuparīndamītyānukūlyaṃ samarpayāmi
# rjes su yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba ni mthun par yongs su gtad pa'o /
kathaṃ parīndanetyata āha yatheyamityādi / anyaḥ puruṣa ityabhaktaḥ / kasmādasyāmetāvadgauravamityata āha / yāvadityādi bahuvidhāśca pūjābhiriti yāvat / bhagavatyāḥ parisamāptimudyotayan saṅgītikāra āha / idamavocadityādi / idamiti prajñāpāramitāsūtram
# ji ltar yongs su gtad pa yin zhe na / / de'i phyir ci nas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / skyes bu tha ma zhes bya ba ni ma gus pa'o / / gang gi phyir 'di la dga' ba dang gus par bya zhe na / / de'i phyir du dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba nas / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung ni spyod par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so / / bcom ldan 'das yum yongs su rdzogs par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sdud pa pos bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / de skad ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'o /
avocaditi bhāṣitavān
# bka' stsal ba dang zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o /
bhagavāniti śāstā / parārtharasikāstathāgatāḥ
# bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa'o / / gzhan gyi don la dgyes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o /
parārtha ca parārthakriyā bhagavatyā deśanā
# gzan gyi don mchog tu mdzad pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'o /
tata āha / āttamanā iti / niruttaradharmadeśanayā prītaḥ sannityarthaḥ
# de'i phyir yi rangs te zhes gsungs te / / bla na med pa'i chos bstan pas dga' par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
śrotāraḥ kimukurvannityāha / bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti / abhipūrvo nandiḥ sakarmakaḥ / sa kadācidabhilāṣe vartate / kadācitprītau / yadā prītau tadā tadālambanamevāsya karma bhavati / tatpunaḥ karma bhagavato bhāṣitam
# nyan pa pos ci zhig byas pa yin zhe na / / de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes gsungs so / / bstod pa'i sngon rol du mngon par 'brel pa ni las dang bcas pa yin te / / de ni la lar ni 'dod pa la 'jug la / / la lar ni dga' ba la 'jug pa ste / / de la dmigs pa nyid ni 'dir las yin te las de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i bstan pa 'di nyid do /
eṣaiva deśanā / ke punaste śrotāra ityāha / te cetyādi / lokaḥ sattvasamūhaḥ / sa ca śrotṝṇāṃ rājagṛhasya ca prakṛtatvānmanuṣyasamūha eva kevalo gamyeta / tathā mā bhūditi viśeṣaṇaṃ kriyate / sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśceti / te ca bodhisattvādayaḥ sadevādiśca loka iti samuccayaḥ
# nyan pa po dag kyang gang zhe na / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / 'jig rten ni sems can gyi tshogs so / / nyan pa po dag kyang rgyal po'i khab kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir mi'i tshogs so / / 'di 'ba' zhig gis rtog pa rnam par bcad pa'i phyir khyad par du byas pa ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa zhes gsungs te / / byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa dang lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten zhes bsdus so /
parīndanābhidhāyī parivartaḥ parīndanāparivartaḥ / nānāvibhramalāñchanavyapagamādagrāhyamagrāhakam
# yongs su gtad pa brjod pa'i le'u ni yongs su gtad pa'i le'u'o / / 'khrul pa'i dri ma sna tshogs rnam bral gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs /
bhātyetattathatātmanā samarasaṃ yasyāmaśeṣaṃ jagat / prajñāpāramitā vikalpataraṇī sā bodhisattvasya dhīḥ
# 'gro ba gang dag de bzhin nyid du ro gcig de ni rnam par mdzes / / rnam rtog las sgrol shes rab pa rol phyin de byang chub sems dpa'i blo /
dhīraiḥ saiva viśuddhipāragamane tāthāgatī kathyate / (RSt_204) / sa(śa)satyaṣṭau yadabhisamayān yatsahasrāṇi cāṣṭau
# de nyid rnam par dag pa'i thar phyin dpa' po de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod / / gang zhig mngon rtogs brgyad dang stong phrag brgyad du bstan pa yi /
sūtraṃ tatte bhagavati mayā yaśca labdho vibhajya
# rgyu dang mdo ni bdag gis rnam phyes thob pa'i bsod nams kyi /
puṇyaskandhaḥ phalatu sa yathā yuktimuktiṃ prajānām / niḥsīmānāṃ mama ca vaśitāṃ viśvakāryakriyāsu
# phung po'i 'bras bu des ni skyed ci rigs grol gyur cig / / bdag kyang sna tshogs bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i dbang thob shog /
anupamaguṇamṛṣṭā nirmalāśeṣavarṇā / harati bhavaratiṃ vo bhāratī gautamasya / bhavati mahati(?) vartiryā dayā snehapūrṇe / janamanasi tadantarjjyotiṣaḥ saṃkramāya / prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramitāyā daśaśatībhiraṣṭābhiḥ / sāratametyabhisamaye sphuṭā ghanā pañjikeyaṃ me / ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat / teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ / ?(?) samvat ā to rājñaḥ śrīharṣadevarājye śrīgaṇḍigulmaviṣaye
# ji srid 'dir ni mar me'i snying po chen po rdzogs yod gyur / / skye kho rnams kyi yid kyi nang der snang ba 'byung 'gyur te / / yon tan dpe med ston cing ma lus dri med bsngags pa yin / / goo ta ma'i gsung des srid pa'i mun pa sel gyur cig / / shes rab pha rol phyin bsdus pa / / brgya phrag bcu pa brgyad dag gi / / dka' 'grel snying po mchog ces pa / / tshig gsal 'di ni bdag gis byas / / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel la snying po mchog ces bya ba rgyal po'i slob dbon mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
